data.title: Range precision prediction model for three-dimensional laser gated range-intensity correlation imaging
data.author: Bo Song, Yue Zhang, Xinwei Wang, Liang Sun, Yurun Zhang, Yan Zhou
data.summary: <jats:p>Three-dimensional laser gated range-intensity correlation imaging (GRICI) can obtain long-range 3D images in real time with high resolution by suppressing backscatter and background noise outside the 3D depth of field. Range precision is crucial for evaluating the performance of 3D GRICI. However, traditional range precision models can only estimate it from experimental results, or cannot accurately predict it theoretically due to over-simplified analysis or insufficient theoretical modeling capability. In this paper, we present a range precision prediction model for 3D GRICI based on the law of error propagation and stochastic process analysis. Particularly, we take into account the photo-electronic process and the temporal jitter of a 3D GRICI system. Based on the classic laser range-gated imaging model, the signal-to-noise model, and the compound random distribution, the mean intensity value and the shot noise can be solved. Thus, the range precision within the 3D depth of field can be accurately predicted. We conducted experiments to validate this model. The results demonstrate that its predictions are more consistent with the experimental results compared to the traditional models. The relative error of the traditional models at 13.45 m is 76.9%, while the relative error of the proposed prediction model is only 3.1%. This research can support the design of 3D gated imaging systems.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 三维激光门控距离-强度相关成像距离精度预测模型
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>三维激光门控距离-强度相关成像（GRICI）可以通过抑制3D景深之外的后向散射和背景噪声，实时获得高分辨率的长距离3D图像。距离精度对于评估 3D GRICI 的性能至关重要。然而，传统的距离精度模型只能根据实验结果进行估计，或者由于分析过于简化或理论建模能力不足而无法从理论上准确预测。在本文中，我们提出了一种基于误差传播定律和随机过程分析的 3D GRICI 距离精度预测模型。特别是，我们考虑了 3D GRICI 系统的光电过程和时间抖动。基于经典的激光测距选通成像模型、信噪比模型以及复合随机分布，可以求解平均强度值和散粒噪声。因此，可以准确预测3D景深内的距离精度。我们进行了实验来验证这个模型。结果表明，与传统模型相比，其预测与实验结果更加一致。传统模型在13.45米处的相对误差为76.9%，而本文提出的预测模型的相对误差仅为3.1%。这项研究可以支持 3D 门控成像系统的设计。</jats:p>

data.title: Analysis of the impact of timing jitter on dual-comb ranging
data.author: Yuetang Yang, Runkun Zhao, Haochen Tian, Jiayang Chen, Xu Zheng, Guanhao Wu
data.summary: <jats:p>Dual-comb ranging is a typical absolute-distance measurement method. Noise in ranging systems limits improvements in ranging precision. Timing jitter is a primary noise source, and its relationship with ranging precision remains to be explored. In this study, we established a model to describe this relationship from the perspective of the noise power spectral density (PSD). We propose a corresponding simulation method and analyze the coupling between the timing jitter and intensity noise. Furthermore, we validated this model using dual combs with different noise levels, including the measurement of timing jitter PSD and analysis of ranging precision, which confirms the correctness of our model. The proposed model for timing jitter and ranging precision can help comprehend the mechanism and design dual-comb ranging systems for practical applications.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 时序抖动对双梳测距的影响分析
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>双梳测距是一种典型的绝对距离测量方法。测距系统中的噪声限制了测距精度的提高。定时抖动是主要噪声源，其与测距精度的关系仍有待探索。在本研究中，我们建立了一个模型，从噪声功率谱密度（PSD）的角度来描述这种关系。我们提出了相应的仿真方法并分析了定时抖动和强度噪声之间的耦合。此外，我们使用不同噪声水平的双梳验证了该模型，包括定时抖动PSD的测量和测距精度的分析，这证实了我们模型的正确性。所提出的定时抖动和测距精度模型有助于理解其机制并设计实际应用的双梳测距系统。</jats:p>

data.title: Dual-band dual-circularly polarized and orbital angular momentum multiplexed reflectarray
data.author: Yuhui Ren, Yutian Ma, Kejuan Li, Lehu Wen, Bohang Zhang, Mingyang Gao, Wu Zhao, Handong Wu
data.summary:
<jats:p>
                    In this letter, a dual-band dual-circularly polarized (CP) orbital angular momentum (OAM) multiplexed reflectarray (RA) is proposed, capable of generating vortex electromagnetic beams with distinct polarizations, mode numbers (
                    <jats:italic>l</jats:italic>
                    ), and radiation directions across different bands. First, it presents an innovative approach to achieving dual-band dual-CP decoupling. Second, the proposed RA integrates multiple multiplexing techniques, including frequency, polarization, and OAM. Specifically, a low-profile metasurface unit cell is designed, utilizing only a dielectric substrate and a metal patch, achieving a bandwidth ranging from 10.6 GHz to 18.1 GHz (52.2%). Furthermore, an RA constructed from these units fulfills the duplex communication requirements of Ku-band satellite systems. It generates a left-handed CP OAM beam with
                    <jats:italic>l</jats:italic>
                    =+1 in the downlink band (10.7-12.75 GHz), and a right-handed CP beam with
                    <jats:italic>l</jats:italic>
                     = -2 in the uplink band (12.75-18.1 GHz), with each beam exhibiting a distinct radiation direction.
                  </jats:p>
data.title_cn: 双波段双圆偏振和轨道角动量复用反射阵列
data.abstract_cn:
<贾茨：p>
                    在这封信中，提出了一种双频带双圆偏振（CP）轨道角动量（OAM）复用反射阵列（RA），能够产生具有不同偏振、模式数（
                    <jats:斜体>l</jats:斜体>
                    ），以及不同频段的辐射方向。首先，它提出了一种实现双频双CP解耦的创新方法。其次，所提出的 RA 集成了多种复用技术，包括频率、极化和 OAM。具体来说，设计了一种薄型超表面单元，仅利用介电基板和金属贴片，实现了 10.6GHz 至 18.1GHz (52.2%) 的带宽。此外，由这些单元构建的RA满足Ku波段卫星系统的双工通信要求。它产生左手 CP OAM 光束
                    <jats:斜体>l</jats:斜体>
                    =+1，在下行链路频段（10.7-12.75 GHz），右手CP波束
                    <jats:斜体>l</jats:斜体>
                     = -2，在上行链路频段（12.75-18.1 GHz），每个波束表现出不同的辐射方向。
                  </贾茨：p>

data.title: Efficient geometric modeling and joint calibration for biaxial MEMS-based fringe projection profilometry
data.author: Yupei Miao, Ziwei Wang, Xiaojie Zhang, Qijian Tang, Xiaoli Liu
data.summary: <jats:p>Fringe projection profilometry (FPP) enables high-precision 3D shape measurement and is increasingly deployed with biaxial micro-electro-mechanical system (MEMS) laser-scanning projectors for large-range projection. However, the fast and slow axes of a biaxial MEMS mirror exhibit coupled and nonlinear motion, causing the actual scanning trajectory to deviate from an ideal separable sweep. Consequently, points sharing the same phase no longer lie on straight lines or planar isophase surfaces, but instead follow curved spatial loci, making accurate calibration challenging. This work introduces a phase-angle-ray model (PARM) that establishes a bivariate polynomial mapping between the phase and MEMS deflection angles, from which projected rays are analytically derived. Two calibration frameworks based on pinhole and ray-based imaging models are developed by integrating geometric constraints from a standard plane and multiple standard spheres. Experiments demonstrate that the proposed method achieves high calibration accuracy, improved metric consistency, and precise 3D reconstruction.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 基于 MEMS 的双轴条纹投影轮廓测量的高效几何建模和联合校准
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>条纹投影轮廓仪 (FPP) 可实现高精度 3D 形状测量，并且越来越多地与双轴微机电系统 (MEMS) 激光扫描投影仪一起部署以进行大范围投影。然而，双轴MEMS反射镜的快轴和慢轴表现出耦合和非线性运动，导致实际扫描轨迹偏离理想的可分离扫描。因此，共享相同相位的点不再位于直线或平面等相面上，而是遵循弯曲的空间轨迹，这使得精确校准具有挑战性。这项工作引入了相位角射线模型 (PARM)，该模型在相位和 MEMS 偏转角之间建立二元多项式映射，并从中分析导出投影射线。通过集成标准平面和多个标准球的几何约束，开发了两种基于针孔和基于射线的成像模型的校准框架。实验表明，该方法具有较高的标定精度、提高的度量一致性和精确的3D重建。</jats:p>

data.title: Counter-diabatic driving in a bent mode-evolution coupler
data.author: Yu-Kai Lee, Yue Ban, Xi Chen, Shuo-Yen Tseng
data.summary:
<jats:p>
                    We present an implementation of counter-diabatic (CD) driving in mode-evolution couplers through axis bending, enabling compact and robust photonic devices. Using coupled-mode theory, we derive an analytical framework that reveals how geometric deformation introduces an effective Hamiltonian term, allowing the CD protocol to be realized in a physically feasible bent waveguide system. Beam propagation method (BPM) simulations confirm complete light transfer and minimal nonadiabatic transitions in a 500
                    <jats:italic toggle="yes">μ</jats:italic>
                    m bent coupler, validating the theoretical predictions. Beyond reducing length, the approach offers deterministic design rules and paves the way for shortcuts to adiabaticity photonic components that maintain robustness to structural perturbations.
                  </jats:p>
data.title_cn: 弯曲模式演化耦合器中的反绝热驱动
data.abstract_cn:
<贾茨：p>
                    我们提出了一种通过轴弯曲在模式演化耦合器中实现反绝热（CD）驱动的方法，从而实现紧凑而坚固的光子器件。利用耦合模式理论，我们推导出了一个分析框架，揭示了几何变形如何引入有效的哈密顿项，从而允许 CD 协议在物理上可行的弯曲波导系统中实现。光束传播方法 (BPM) 模拟证实了 500 秒内的完整光传输和最小非绝热跃迁
                    <jats：斜体切换=“是”>μ</ jats：斜体>
                    m 弯曲耦合器，验证了理论预测。除了减少长度之外，该方法还提供了确定性设计规则，并为绝热光子组件的捷径铺平了道路，以保持对结构扰动的鲁棒性。
                  </贾茨：p>

data.title: High-resolution Dante spectrometer based on quasi-monochromatic multilayer mirror array for soft X-ray spectral measurement in plasma diagnostics
data.author: Hao Xu, Ke Dong, Ermeng Zhang, Huiyao Du, Haoxuan Si, Jun Chen, Yongtang Liu, Zhe Zhang, Zhanshan Wang, Bo Tang, Shengzhen Yi
data.summary: <jats:p>Soft X-ray spectroscopic diagnostics based on Dante spectrometers are essential for evaluating plasma conditions driven by Z-pinch or laser fusion. A Dante spectrometer configuration capable of achieving low spectral measurement uncertainty remains a bottleneck problem at present. This paper develops a quantitative uncertainty-analysis framework for Dante spectrometers employing an array of quasi-monochromatic multilayer mirrors. Accordingly, we further developed a set of practical methods, including the precise synchrotron radiation calibration and optimized spectrometer installation, to effectively suppress these measurement uncertainties. For implementation, we developed a Dante spectrometer covering 100–1000 eV and validated it on a Z-pinch platform. The relative expanded uncertainty of individual channels was maintained within 2%–3%, and the reconstructed spectral-distribution uncertainty was better than 3.2%.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 基于准单色多层镜阵列的高分辨率 Dante 光谱仪，用于等离子体诊断中的软 X 射线光谱测量
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>基于 Dante 光谱仪的软 X 射线光谱诊断对于评估 Z 箍缩或激光聚变驱动的等离子体条件至关重要。能够实现低光谱测量不确定度的 Dante 光谱仪配置目前仍然是一个瓶颈问题。本文为采用准单色多层镜阵列的 Dante 光谱仪开发了一种定量不确定性分析框架。因此，我们进一步开发了一套实用的方法，包括精确的同步辐射校准和优化光谱仪安装，以有效抑制这些测量不确定性。为了实现这一点，我们开发了覆盖 100–1000 eV 的 Dante 光谱仪，并在 Z 夹点平台上对其进行了验证。各通道相对扩展不确定度保持在2%~3%以内，重建光谱分布不确定度优于3.2%。</jats:p>

data.title: Multifunctional chip-scale plasmonic optical tweezers enabled by a polarization- and wavelength-dependent metasurface
data.author: Ying Yu, Cheng Chi, Lanqi Lian, Dan Wang, Qiao Jiang
data.summary: <jats:p>The ability of surface plasmons to confine light at a subwavelength scale enables new perspectives and opportunities in the field of nanotechnology. Making use of this unique advantage, plasmonic trapping techniques have been developed to tackle new challenges in a wide range of areas from physics to biology. However, it is still a challenge to achieve multifunctional chip-scale manipulation of small particles in a single plasmonic device. Here, we proposed a polarization- and wavelength-dependent plasmonic metasurface to realize multifunctional plasmonic optical tweezers. By fully utilizing the polarization and wavelength of light, it is shown that different kinds of SPP fields can be generated, which leads to integration of more than four optical manipulation functions, including plasmonic trapping as well as plasmonic spanner that can control both the rotation direction and radius of trapped particles. Furthermore, the metasurface also enables double-well optical trapping under linear polarization incidence. The proposed multifunctional metasurface facilitates diverse manipulation, which may open up new opportunities in biology, photonics, sensing, and related fields.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 由偏振和波长相关的超表面实现的多功能芯片级等离子体光镊
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>表面等离子体将光限制在亚波长范围内的能力为纳米技术领域带来了新的视角和机遇。利用这一独特优势，等离子体捕获技术已被开发出来，以应对从物理学到生物学等广泛领域的新挑战。然而，在单个等离子体装置中实现小颗粒的多功能芯片级操控仍然是一个挑战。在这里，我们提出了一种偏振和波长相关的等离子体超表面来实现多功能等离子体光镊。通过充分利用光的偏振和波长，可以产生不同类型的SPP场，从而集成四种以上的光学操纵功能，包括等离子体捕获以及可以控制捕获粒子的旋转方向和半径的等离子体扳手。此外，超表面还能够在线性偏振入射下实现双阱光捕获。所提出的多功能超表面有利于多样化的操作，这可能会在生物学、光子学、传感和相关领域开辟新的机遇。</jats:p>

data.title: Directional Smith-Purcell radiation via coupled high-index gratings
data.author: Thomas Delplace, Ilyes Bouanati, Gilles Rosolen, Bjorn Maes
data.summary: <jats:p>The emission of light when an electron passes by a periodic photonic structure, called Smith–Purcell radiation (SPR), creates new types of adjustable light sources. Here, we investigate directional or asymmetric SPR from a high-index dielectric double-grating structure. By introducing a lateral shift between the two gratings, we break the symmetry and enable directional emission through interference between coupled Bloch modes, thus without the need for a mirror-type structure as in previous designs. Using full-wave simulations and eigenmode analysis, we identify the modes responsible for radiation and describe their coupling properties. A coupled mode theory (CMT) model is developed to capture the transition between symmetric and asymmetric regimes, offering fast and intuitive insight into the emission behavior. This work highlights a compact and efficient approach for controlling SPR directionality in dielectric photonic structures.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 通过耦合高折射率光栅的定向史密斯-珀塞尔辐射
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>当电子通过周期性光子结构时发出的光，称为史密斯-珀塞尔辐射 (SPR)，创造了新型的可调光源。在这里，我们研究了高折射率介电双光栅结构的定向或非对称 SPR。通过在两个光栅之间引入横向位移，我们打破了对称性，并通过耦合布洛赫模式之间的干涉实现定向发射，因此不需要像以前的设计那样使用镜式结构。通过全波模拟和本征模分析，我们确定了导致辐射的模式并描述了它们的耦合特性。开发了耦合模式理论 (CMT) 模型来捕获对称和不对称状态之间的转变，从而提供对发射行为的快速直观的了解。这项工作突出了一种紧凑而有效的方法来控制介电光子结构中的 SPR 方向性。</jats:p>

data.title: Machine learning assisted authentication using chaotic diversity index modulation for data centers
data.author: Xinshuai Liang, Chongfu Zhang, Wenjun Zeng, Jiebing Xia, Yue Lin, Yanwei Li
data.summary:
<jats:p>
                    We propose a data center secure communication scheme that uses chaotic diversity index modulation for identity authentication, and design a neural network (NN) that balances decryption and detection for the receiver. Chaotic diversity is obtained from a randomly partitioned standard 16QAM constellation. The watermark is subsequently embedded into the symbol index by leveraging this diversity. Finally, the constructed data frames composed of symbols across different time slots and subcarriers is disrupted, and the watermark is concealed within the massive data transmission. The receiver takes the received signal and chaotic diversity as inputs for the NN to obtain the watermark, and achieves identity authentication by comparing it with the locally stored watermark. The 56.37Gb/s transmission verification was conducted on a 10 km standard single-mode fiber (SSMF), and the results showed that the scheme has high security. The total key space can reach 10
                    <jats:sup>90</jats:sup>
                    . The watermark is hidden in the index of the symbol, making it difficult for eavesdroppers to detect. The combination of chaotic diversity and NN can cause data pollution to eavesdroppers, making it difficult to steal the correct NN. The accuracy of NN detection exceeds that of the log-likelihood ratio (LLR) detector, and it can reduce the time complexity of detection by 4 orders of magnitude. The recognition accuracy of watermarks can reach 100% under high optical power, and the legitimate and illegitimate parties can be effectively distinguished, making identity disguise attacks difficult to achieve.
                  </jats:p>
data.title_cn: 使用混沌多样性指数调制的数据中心机器学习辅助身份验证
data.abstract_cn:
<贾茨：p>
                    我们提出了一种使用混沌分集索引调制进行身份认证的数据中心安全通信方案，并设计了一个平衡接收器解密和检测的神经网络（NN）。混沌分集是从随机划分的标准 16QAM 星座中获得的。随后通过利用这种多样性将水印嵌入到符号索引中。最后，跨不同时隙和子载波的符号构成的数据帧被打乱，水印隐藏在海量数据传输中。接收器将接收到的信号和混沌分集作为神经网络的输入来获取水印，并通过与本地存储的水印进行比较来实现身份认证。在10 km标准单模光纤(SSMF)上进行了56.37Gb/s传输验证，结果表明该方案具有较高的安全性。总的密钥空间可以达到10个
                    <贾茨：sup>90</贾茨：sup>
                    。水印隐藏在符号的索引中，使得窃听者难以察觉。混沌多样性与神经网络的结合会对窃听者造成数据污染，使得窃取正确的神经网络变得困难。 NN检测的精度超过了对数似然比（LLR）检测器，并且可以将检测的时间复杂度降低4个数量级。高光功率下水印识别准确率可达100%，可有效区分合法与非法双方，身份伪装攻击难以实现。
                  </贾茨：p>

data.title: Interferometric modal splitting enables broadband, dual-polarization on-chip spectroscopy
data.author: Karl Johnson, Vladimir Fedorov, Dmitrii Belogolovskii, Andrew Grieco, Noah A. Rubin, Yeshaiahu Fainman
data.summary: <jats:p>The modal dispersion of waveguides typically limits integrated photonic devices to operation with a single polarization state. In this work, we propose a generic mode separation technique we call “interferometric mode splitting” (IMS), which enables guided modes to be separated over wide bandwidths with a large extinction ratio. To demonstrate the general principle of IMS, we show that an unmodified thermally driven silicon photonic Fourier transform spectrometer exhibits a polarization-separating effect in the frequency domain, even though only one polarization-insensitive detector is used. Using this effect, we experimentally demonstrate a simple on-chip spectrometer capable of extracting two-polarization spectra over a wide 1480–1630 nm bandwidth with a greater than 20 dB polarization extinction ratio. These specifications would be highly challenging to achieve using existing, conventional on-chip polarization-splitting techniques. Though we focus on this specific realization of IMS, we also show that IMS is general to various on-chip spectrometer architectures, other spatial modes, and technologies other than thermally driven Fourier transform spectrometers. Interferometric mode splitting shows promise as a general approach for robust and fundamentally broadband detection of orthogonal modes in guided-wave sensing.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 干涉模态分裂可实现宽带、双偏振片上光谱
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>波导的模态色散通常限制集成光子器件只能在单一偏振态下运行。在这项工作中，我们提出了一种称为“干涉模式分离”（IMS）的通用模式分离技术，该技术能够在宽带宽上以大消光比分离导模。为了演示 IMS 的一般原理，我们证明未经修改的热驱动硅光子傅里叶变换光谱仪即使只使用一个偏振不敏感探测器，也能在频域中表现出偏振分离效应。利用这种效应，我们通过实验证明了一种简单的片上光谱仪，能够提取 1480-1630 nm 宽带宽内的双偏振光谱，偏振消光比大于 20 dB。使用现有的传统片上偏振分离技术来实现这些规格将极具挑战性。尽管我们重点关注 IMS 的具体实现，但我们也表明 IMS 对于各种片上光谱仪架构、其他空间模式以及热驱动傅里叶变换光谱仪以外的技术是通用的。干涉模式分裂显示出作为导波传感中正交模式的鲁棒且基本宽带检测的通用方法的前景。</jats:p>

data.title: Dynamic Windkessel autoregulation for optical hemodynamic imaging: quantifying microcirculation, oxygen diffusion, and vascular autoregulation from low-frequency hemodynamic oscillations
data.author: Yansen Hu, Yang Zheng, Kangyuan Yu, Ruobing Zhang, Mengdi Ma, Tinghua Gao, Jianmin Yang, Xin Jin, Weihao Lin, Min Xu
data.summary:
<jats:p>
                    Hemodynamic-based neuroimaging and non-neuroimaging techniques are widely used in neuroscience and functional studies. Probing spontaneous or induced hemodynamic oscillations by light, such as coherent hemodynamics spectroscopy (CHS), has emerged as an effective approach for quantifying cerebral microcirculation and vascular autoregulation. We introduce dynamic Windkessel autoregulation, which enables noninvasive quantification of microcirculation, oxygen diffusion rates, and vascular autoregulation from low-frequency oscillations (LFOs). The model incorporates arteriole vasomotor responses to blood pressure variations and quantifies autoregulatory capacity using a dimensionless autoregulation gain index
                    <jats:italic>n</jats:italic>
                    , which decreases with impaired autoregulation. The model accurately reproduced observed microcirculation and arterial blood flow and volume LFO responses, enabling straightforward quantification of vascular autoregulation. Furthermore, we integrate the model into WK-PIPE CHS and demonstrate recovery of key hemodynamic parameters, including the local tissue oxygen diffusion rate (α=0.179 ± 0.049s
                    <jats:sup>-1</jats:sup>
                    ) and vascular autoregulation (
                    <jats:italic>n</jats:italic>
                     = 4.68 ± 0.59) on five healthy human subjects imaged with visible structured light under paced breathing. Dynamic Windkessel autoregulation, as a mechanistic framework for vascular autoregulation, offers potential applications in monitoring cerebrovascular and cardiovascular health and early detection of their dysfunction using optical hemodynamic imaging.
                  </jats:p>
data.title_cn: 用于光学血流动力学成像的动态 Windkessel 自动调节：量化低频血流动力学振荡的微循环、氧扩散和血管自动调节
data.abstract_cn:
<贾茨：p>

data.title: Anisotropic dual-band mid infrared absorber using graphene–black phosphorene nanocrescents
data.author: Zeinab Zanbouri, Mohammad Sabaeian
data.summary: <jats:p>We propose and numerically investigate an anisotropic dual-band infrared absorber based on a hybrid graphene–black phosphorus nanocrescent architecture. The designed metastructure exhibits two spectrally distinct and polarization-dependent absorption peaks with efficiencies exceeding 85%, arising from strong plasmon–polariton hybridization and anisotropic charge carrier dynamics. Graphene contributes tunable surface plasmon resonances through electrostatic gating, while black phosphorus provides in-plane anisotropy and broadband light–matter interaction. Finite-element method (FEM) simulations reveal that the absorption response can be actively modulated by adjusting the graphene Fermi level and the geometric parameters of the nanocrescent, enabling dynamic control over the resonance wavelengths. The proposed absorber operates in the mid-infrared range, making it highly promising for applications in molecular sensing, photodetection, and tunable optoelectronic devices. Our results highlight the potential of combining two-dimensional materials with engineered plasmonic nanostructures to realize multifunctional, reconfigurable, and polarization-sensitive infrared photonic devices.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 使用石墨烯-黑磷烯纳米月牙的各向异性双波段中红外吸收体
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>我们提出并数值研究了一种基于混合石墨烯-黑磷纳米月牙结构的各向异性双波段红外吸收器。设计的元结构表现出两个光谱上不同且与偏振相关的吸收峰，其效率超过 85%，这是由强等离激元-极化子杂化和各向异性电荷载流子动力学产生的。石墨烯通过静电门控提供可调谐的表面等离子体共振，而黑磷则提供面内各向异性和宽带光-物质相互作用。有限元法（FEM）模拟表明，可以通过调整石墨烯费米能级和纳米月牙的几何参数来主动调制吸收响应，从而实现对共振波长的动态控制。所提出的吸收器在中红外范围内工作，使其在分子传感、光电检测和可调谐光电器件中的应用非常有前景。我们的研究结果凸显了将二维材料与工程等离子体纳米结构相结合以实现多功能、可重构和偏振敏感的红外光子器件的潜力。</jats:p>

data.title: Wearable frequency-domain near-infrared spectroscopy (FD-NIRS) system
data.author: Shashikant Lahade, Siavash Yazdi, Nicholas Ross, Delaney Smith, Saba Mohammadi, Michael M. Green, Thomas D. O’Sullivan
data.summary:
<jats:p>
                    Frequency-domain near-infrared spectroscopy (FD-NIRS) is a noninvasive in vivo sensing and imaging technique that is used to quantify tissue composition and oxygen metabolism in the brain, muscle, and other tissues. However, the size and complexity of FD-NIRS instrumentation have largely limited its use to laboratory and clinical research settings. To expand the use of FD-NIRS into continuous monitoring applications and in naturalistic environments, we report a novel real-time multi-frequency (50–350 MHz) wearable FD-NIRS system based on a custom application-specific integrated circuit (ASIC). The wearable device includes 685 nm and 850 nm laser diodes and a silicon photomultiplier (SiPM) detector. The system has an optical property accuracy of 0.0007 mm
                    <jats:sup>−1</jats:sup>
                    for absorption and 0.08 mm
                    <jats:sup>−1</jats:sup>
                    for reduced scattering at a 14.7 Hz measurement rate, evaluated using tissue-simulating phantoms, and is capable of capturing single-frequency measurements up to 1 kHz with both wavelengths. Without a battery, it weighs 37 grams and measures less than 7 x 3 x 3 cm in size. For proof-of-concept, we demonstrate measurement of an arteriovenous occlusion of the human forearm. Overall, this work demonstrates the feasibility of quantitative FD-NIRS tissue optical spectroscopy for wearable health monitoring.
                  </jats:p>

data.title: Nano-enhancement of the machine learning assisted laser-induced breakdown spectroscopic analysis of human blood serum samples for breast cancer detection
data.author: Ayesha Israr, Hafeez Anwar, Sajid Bashir, Muhammad Zahid, Yasir Jamil
data.summary: <jats:p>Detecting cancer early is crucial for successful therapy and improved survival rates. In our study, we classified cancerous and non-cancerous blood serum samples using ML and nano-enhancement techniques. Both supervised (decision tree, discriminant analysis, regression, ensemble, SVM, KNN, and NN) and unsupervised (PCA) ML algorithms were employed for elemental detection and classification. The blood used for LIBS analysis was intravenous blood from patients. The serum was separated by centrifuging the blood at 4000 rpm for 15 minutes. Additionally, we applied nano-enhanced LIBS (NE-LIBS) to achieve higher accuracy. Au-nanoparticles were synthesized through laser ablation. SPR and band gap of Au-nanoparticles were measured from their UV absorption spectrum. Using micro-drops of these nanoparticles, we significantly enhanced the detection of trace elements in the LIBS signal of serum samples. Notably, the testing accuracy improved across various ML algorithms: decision tree (87.3% to 93.9%), discriminant analysis (85.5% to 99.1%), logistic regression (86.8% to 98%), naïve Bayes (85.1% to 93.9%), SVM (86.6% to 99.3%), KNN (90.1% to 98.5%), Ensemble Learning (85.5% to 98.7%), and neural networks (91.4% to 98.7%). Furthermore, our unsupervised approach by applying PCA revealed distinct clusters for both serum types. This innovative approach will assist physicians in making treatment recommendations for patients with various cancers in the early stages.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 机器学习辅助激光诱导击穿光谱分析的纳米增强用于乳腺癌检测
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>早期发现癌症对于成功治疗和提高生存率至关重要。在我们的研究中，我们使用机器学习和纳米增强技术对癌性和非癌性血清样本进行分类。元素检测和分类采用有监督（决策树、判别分析、回归、集成、SVM、KNN 和 NN）和无监督 (PCA) ML 算法。用于LIBS分析的血液是来自患者的静脉血。将血液以4000rpm离心15分钟，分离血清。此外，我们应用纳米增强型 LIBS (NE-LIBS) 来实现更高的精度。通过激光烧蚀合成金纳米颗粒。 Au 纳米颗粒的 SPR 和带隙是通过其紫外吸收光谱测量的。使用这些纳米颗粒的微滴，我们显着增强了血清样品 LIBS 信号中微量元素的检测。值得注意的是，各种机器学习算法的测试准确性均有所提高：决策树（87.3% 至 93.9%）、判别分析（85.5% 至 99.1%）、逻辑回归（86.8% 至 98%）、朴素贝叶斯（85.1% 至 93.9%）、SVM（86.6% 至 99.3%）、KNN（90.1% 至 90.1%） 98.5%）、集成学习（85.5% 至 98.7%）和神经网络（91.4% 至 98.7%）。此外，我们通过应用 PCA 的无监督方法揭示了两种血清类型的不同簇。这种创新方法将帮助医生为各种早期癌症患者提出治疗建议。</jats:p>

data.title: High-speed narrow linewidth All-PM dispersive swept source for real-time FBG sensor interrogation
data.author: N. Vaish, P. Long, M. R. K. Soltanian, F. Légaré, L. R. Chen
data.summary: <jats:p>We present an environmentally stable, all-polarization-maintaining (PM) dispersion-based swept source system optimized for narrow linewidth and high-speed wavelength scanning, specifically tailored for fiber Bragg grating (FBG) sensor interrogation. The system integrates a chirped fiber Bragg grating (CFBG) as a highly dispersive element to balance scan speed and spectral resolution, enabling a compact cavity design and stable lasing. The laser achieves precise wavelength tuning over a 40 nm range in the telecom C-band, linewidth around 12 MHz, and an impressive scanning speed exceeding 3 MHz with stable output power of over 20 mW, outperforming mechanically tuned lasers. The all-PM design ensures robustness against environmental perturbations. We validate the performance through static and dynamic characterization, including linewidth narrowing via the spatial hole burning effect. Furthermore, we demonstrate its application in the interrogation of FBG sensor arrays in wavelength division multiplexing (WDM), time division multiplexing (TDM), and hybrid modes, as well as real-time dynamic strain sensing up to 1kHz. These results position the system as a scalable and robust solution for applications requiring rapid spectral acquisition and fine resolution, such as border security, biomedical imaging, and structural health monitoring.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 用于实时 FBG 传感器询问的高速窄线宽全保偏色散扫频源
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>我们提出了一种环境稳定、基于全保偏 (PM) 色散的扫频光源系统，针对窄线宽和高速波长扫描进行了优化，专为光纤布拉格光栅 (FBG) 传感器询问而定制。该系统集成了啁啾光纤布拉格光栅（CFBG）作为高色散元件，以平衡扫描速度和光谱分辨率，从而实现紧凑的腔体设计和稳定的激光发射。该激光器在电信 C 波段实现了 40 nm 范围内的精确波长调谐，线宽约为 12 MHz，扫描速度超过 3 MHz，稳定输出功率超过 20 mW，性能优于机械调谐激光器。全 PM 设计确保了对环境扰动的鲁棒性。我们通过静态和动态表征来验证性能，包括通过空间烧孔效应缩小线宽。此外，我们还展示了其在波分复用 (WDM)、时分复用 (TDM) 和混合模式中询问 FBG 传感器阵列以及高达 1kHz 的实时动态应变传感中的应用。这些结果使该系统成为一种可扩展且强大的解决方案，适用于需要快速光谱采集和精细分辨率的应用，例如边境安全、生物医学成像和结构健康监测。</jats:p>

data.title: Comparative study of the green-pumped LBO crystal type-I and type-II phase-matched optical parametric oscillator
data.author: Aonan Zhang, Zhenling Li, Rang Zeng, Jingya Zhang, Ke Liu, Yading Guo, Lin Han, Xiaojun Wang
data.summary:
<jats:p>
                    The study examines two LBO phase-matched (PM) configurations for near-infrared optical parametric oscillators (OPOs) pumped by a 532 nm laser. The type-I PM LBO OPO generated an 1118 nm idler with an 11.4 ns pulse duration and an output power of 635 mW. The conversion efficiency was 27.6%, and the spectral linewidth was ∼23.2nm. The temperature tuning range was 3.5°C, corresponding to an average wavelength tuning rate of ∼22nm/
                    <jats:sup>∘</jats:sup>
                    C. The beam quality factor
                    <jats:italic>M</jats:italic>
                    <jats:sup>2</jats:sup>
                    was measured to be about 3.05. The type-II PM LBO OPO generated an 1116 nm idler with an 8.0 ns pulse duration and an output power of 424 mW, achieving an 18.4% conversion efficiency and a spectral linewidth of ∼1.3nm. The temperature tuning range was 130°C, corresponding to an average wavelength tuning rate of ∼0.77nm/
                    <jats:sup>∘</jats:sup>
                    C, and the beam quality factor
                    <jats:italic>M</jats:italic>
                    <jats:sup>2</jats:sup>
                    was measured to be about 2.50. The experiments reported in this paper indicate that type-I PM LBO OPOs offer higher efficiency and a broader wavelength tuning range than type-II configurations, whereas the type-II PM LBO OPO may be more favorable for achieving narrower spectral linewidths.
                  </jats:p>

data.title: Simultaneous measurement with multiple targets via laser feedback interferometry: an algorithm and application in absolute distance sensing
data.author: Alexis Loupias, Mengkoung Veng, Aude Bouchier, Julien Perchoux
data.summary: <jats:p>Laser feedback interferometry (LFI) is a compact and highly sensitive technique for non-contact sensing, typically limited to configurations involving a single external target. Extending LFI to simultaneous multi-target measurement remains a significant challenge due to the increased complexity introduced by multiple optical feedback paths. In this work, we present a unified theoretical and computational framework for modeling and solving the excess phase equation in LFI systems with one or more external reflectors. The proposed approach accommodates both weak and moderate/strong optical feedback regimes, enabling robust analysis for diverse operating conditions. To validate the model, we perform experimental measurements of absolute distances to two consecutive targets using a single laser source. The results show a strong agreement between simulation and measured LFI signals across a broad range of optical feedback strengths.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 通过激光反馈干涉测量多目标同时测量：绝对距离传感的算法和应用
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>激光反馈干涉测量 (LFI) 是一种紧凑且高灵敏度的非接触式传感技术，通常仅限于涉及单个外部目标的配置。由于多个光学反馈路径带来的复杂性增加，将 LFI 扩展到同时多目标测量仍然是一个重大挑战。在这项工作中，我们提出了一种统一的理论和计算框架，用于建模和求解具有一个或多个外部反射器的 LFI 系统中的多余相位方程。所提出的方法适应弱和中/强光学反馈机制，从而能够对不同的操作条件进行稳健的分析。为了验证该模型，我们使用单个激光源对两个连续目标的绝对距离进行实验测量。结果表明，在广泛的光反馈强度范围内，仿真和测量的 LFI 信号之间具有很强的一致性。</jats:p>

data.title: 3D-printed doped optical waveguides for sensing applications: graphite- and zinc-doped structures
data.author: Juan J. Soto-Bernal, Nancy L. Robles-Macias, Ahiza Martínez-romo, Iliana Rosales-Candelas, Rosario González-Mota, Claudia Sifuentes-Gallardo
data.summary: <jats:p>This study reports the design, fabrication, and optical characterization of stereolithography-printed waveguides doped with graphite and zinc oxide (ZnO). Effective refractive indices were predicted using the Bruggeman effective medium approximation and experimentally validated. The doped structures exhibited total internal reflection and were evaluated as optofluidic sensors for detecting variations in alcoholic beverages and telomeric DNA concentrations. Raman spectroscopy further confirmed molecular discrimination between male and female samples. The results demonstrate a reproducible approach for producing low-cost, application-specific optical waveguides suitable for chemical and biological sensing platforms, with tunable performance enabled through dopant selection.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 用于传感应用的 3D 打印掺杂光波导：石墨和锌掺杂结构
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>这项研究报告了掺杂石墨和氧化锌 (ZnO) 的立体光刻印刷波导的设计、制造和光学特性。使用布鲁格曼有效介质近似来预测有效折射率并进行实验验证。掺杂结构表现出全内反射，并被评估为光流控传感器，用于检测酒精饮料和端粒 DNA 浓度的变化。拉曼光谱进一步证实了男性和女性样本之间的分子区别。结果证明了一种可重复的方法，用于生产适用于化学和生物传感平台的低成本、特定于应用的光波导，并通过掺杂剂选择实现可调性能。</jats:p>

data.title: Toward the perfect representation of the scattering process using optically oriented field augmentation
data.author: Wenkang Li, Shu Guo, Wenjing He, Xiaoyun Gou, Jiale Tang, Hong Zhang, Wenxue Li, Lin Pang
data.summary: <jats:p>This paper proposes an optically oriented field augmentation (OOFA) technique for the robust retrieval of the scattering process in the presence of environmental noise. In the OOFA method, the signal level is significantly augmented through controlled scattering field interactions, enabling the transmission matrix of the scattering medium to be evaluated under a substantially improved signal-to-noise ratio. Furthermore, OOFA achieves differential amplification of orthogonal signals, thereby effectively suppressing noise interference and yielding an ideal representation of the scattering matrix. The proposed OOFA method is particularly valuable for imaging through scattering media, where noise typically dominates the scattering process, making the accurate acquisition of the ideal system response, which seem an unachievable goal in the past.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 使用光学定向场增强完美地表示散射过程
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>本文提出了一种光学定向场增强 (OOFA) 技术，用于在存在环境噪声的情况下稳健地检索散射过程。在 OOFA 方法中，通过受控的散射场相互作用显着增强信号水平，从而能够在显着提高的信噪比下评估散射介质的传输矩阵。此外，OOFA实现了正交信号的差分放大，从而有效地抑制了噪声干扰，并得到了散射矩阵的理想表示。所提出的 OOFA 方法对于通过散射介质进行成像特别有价值，其中噪声通常在散射过程中占主导地位，从而可以准确获取理想的系统响应，这在过去似乎是无法实现的目标。</jats:p>

data.title: Saturated absorption spectroscopy for spatially resolved flow velocimetry
data.author: Swapneel Roy, Ryan J. Thomas, John D. Close, Sean O’Byrne
data.summary: <jats:p>This work develops a numerical model to present the potential of saturated absorption spectroscopy as a non-intrusive, spatially resolved diagnostic technique for velocity measurements in low-density rubidium-seeded gas flows. Lamb dips, formed by counter-propagating laser beams, act as sensitive markers of the local velocity distribution within the beam overlap region. By adjusting the intersection angle between the beams, the spatial extent of the overlap region can be controlled, enabling control over the sensitivity and spatial resolution of the measurement. Additionally, detuning the pump laser relative to the probe wavelength allows the measurement sensitivity to be optimized for specific velocity regimes. This technique proposes a precise and flexible approach for probing embedded flow structures in complex gaseous environments.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 用于空间分辨流动测速的饱和吸收光谱
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>这项工作开发了一个数值模型，展示了饱和吸收光谱作为一种非侵入式空间分辨诊断技术的潜力，用于低密度铷籽气流中的速度测量。由反向传播的激光束形成的兰姆倾角充当光束重叠区域内局部速度分布的敏感标记。通过调整光束之间的交叉角度，可以控制重叠区域的空间范围，从而能够控制测量的灵敏度和空间分辨率。此外，相对于探头波长失谐泵浦激光器可以针对特定速度范围优化测量灵敏度。该技术提出了一种精确而灵活的方法来探测复杂气体环境中的嵌入式流动结构。</jats:p>

data.title: How many stars appear colored to the naked eye?
data.author: Michael Vollmer
data.summary:
<jats:p>Naked eye studies of the clear night sky reveal that a certain
					percentage of all observable stars can be perceived as having color.
					Subjective estimates differ widely, ranging from just a few to a
					maximum of above two hundred. Explanations are based on the emission
					spectra of the stars, which are modified by interstellar dust clouds,
					the Earth atmosphere, and mostly the inverse square law. Color changes
					occur not only for variation of the star’s angular elevation above the
					horizon, but as well for decreasing nighttime sky brightness due to
					the transition from photopic via mesopic to scotopic vision. The
					maximum number of stars showing color to the naked eye depends on star
					illuminances on Earth and the background sky luminance. The limit of
					observing color is found to correspond to apparent visual magnitudes
					around m=3, defining the number of colored
					stars. This also means that naked eye perception of stars with color
					is only possible for a certain star distance range, which is well
					below the maximum naked eye visual range of stars.</jats:p>

data.title: Sub-pixel detection method for an aviation plug based on Zernike moments
data.author: Li Ji, Si Long Qin, Gang Han, Wei Zhao, Huai Jiang Yin
data.summary: <jats:p>To address the multi-aperture detection requirements for aviation plugs in complex aerospace manufacturing environments, a sub-pixel edge detection method based on Zernike moments was proposed. First, a linear ramp edge detection model is constructed on the basis of traditional Zernike moments. By precisely deriving edge parameters in the fuzzy transition region via orthogonal critical moments and integrating an adaptive extraction algorithm to optimize threshold judgment criteria, the sub-pixel localization accuracy is significantly improved. Second, a local optimization mechanism and dynamic parameter adjustment strategy were introduced to refine the RANSAC fitting algorithm. Finally, a high-precision visual inspection system for aviation plugs was developed, integrating the Zernike moment-based sub-pixel edge detection algorithm. The experimental results show that the absolute error between the proposed method and the coordinate measuring machine measurements is ±10µm, with a root mean square error of 2.99 µm and a detection time of 1.016 s, demonstrating high accuracy and excellent real-time detection performance in complex industrial environments.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 基于Zernike矩的航空插头亚像素检测方法
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>针对复杂航天制造环境下航空插头的多孔径检测需求，提出了一种基于Zernike矩的亚像素边缘检测方法。首先，在传统Zernike矩的基础上构建线性斜坡边缘检测模型。通过正交临界矩精确推导模糊过渡区域的边缘参数，并结合自适应提取算法优化阈值判断标准，显着提高了亚像素定位精度。其次，引入局部优化机制和动态参数调整策略来完善RANSAC拟合算法。最后，开发了高精度航空插头视觉检测系统，集成了基于Zernike矩的亚像素边缘检测算法。实验结果表明，该方法与三坐标测量机测量值的绝对误差为±10μm，均方根误差为2.99μm，检测时间为1.016s，在复杂的工业环境中表现出高精度和优异的实时检测性能。</jats:p>

data.title: Optical robust zero-watermarking scheme based on chaotic facial phase masks and diffractive imaging
data.author: Yonggang Su, Yuewei Wu, Fei Li, Qingshun Zhang
data.summary:
<jats:p>Currently, most optical watermarking schemes adopt an embedding
					strategy, which often leads to a trade-off between watermark
					imperceptibility and robustness. Additionally, the encryption keys
					used are typically not linked to user identity, posing significant
					security risks in the event of key leakage. To address these issues,
					this paper proposes an optical robust zero-watermarking scheme based
					on chaotic facial phase masks and diffractive imaging. In the proposed
					optically robust zero-watermarking scheme, the original watermark is
					first encoded into a noise-like diffraction intensity image using a
					chaotic facial phase mask and diffraction imaging. This encoded
					watermark is then XORed with the texture features extracted from the
					host image via variational image decomposition, thereby generating the
					zero-watermark. During the decoding process, the original watermark
					can be approximately losslessly recovered from the zero-watermark
					using the texture features of the host image, an iterative phase
					retrieval algorithm, and the authenticated user’s facial image. Since
					the encryption and decryption keys are tied to the user’s facial
					features, which do not require storage or transmission, the proposed
					scheme offers a high level of security. Moreover, extensive
					experimental results and analyses demonstrate that the proposed
					optical zero-watermarking method exhibits strong robustness against
					both image processing operations and geometric attacks.</jats:p>

data.title: CNN-based nonlinearity correction and background radiation suppression of an infrared spectral radiance measurement system
data.author: Shufang He, Shuai Li, Caihong Dai, Yanfei Wang, Jinyuan Liu, Ruoduan Sun, Guojin Feng, Jinghui Wang
data.summary:
<jats:p>
                    To support the infrared radiance calibration needs in fields such as
					remote sensing, climate change monitoring, and aerospace, the National
					Institute of Metrology of China has built up an infrared spectral
					radiance measurement system (ISRMS) in the 2.0–14.0 µm
					wavelength range. In this study, two main improvements were
					implemented in the ISRMS. The first is the nonlinearity correction of
					the measurement system. A one-dimensional convolutional neural network
					(1D-CNN) method was employed to correct nonlinearity by modeling the
					relationship between the measured spectral response of a standard
					blackbody and its theoretical radiance derived from Planck’s law at
					each wavelength; validation results demonstrated that, compared to
					both piecewise linear interpolation and polynomial fitting methods,
					the 1D-CNN model achieved smaller deviations from the theoretical
					values, suggesting its effectiveness. The second is the suppression of
					the background stray radiation. A constant-temperature water-cooled
					plate was designed and installed at the entrance of the relay optics
					in the ISRMS, and results showed that the repeatability and
					reproducibility of the system were effectively improved. Furthermore,
					the measurement uncertainty of the ISRMS was evaluated. At a
					temperature of 798 K, the expanded measurement uncertainty
					(with a coverage factor
                    <jats:italic>k</jats:italic>
                    =2) was 2.74–1.26% in the
					2.0–5.0 µm range, 1.26–0.54% in the 5.0–8.0 µm range,
					and 0.54–0.42% in the 8.0–14.0 µm range.
                  </jats:p>

data.title: Experimental research on visible light–inertial integrated navigation
data.author: Zhanke Zhu, Peijie Wu, Xizheng Ke
data.summary:
<jats:p>Indoor positioning technology is very important in modern intelligent navigation
					systems, but the accuracy of traditional indoor visible light
					positioning methods is reduced due to signal occlusion, signal
					reflection, and environmental noise. In this paper, a visible light
					localization method based on a convolutional neural network optimized
					by thermal map is proposed. The discrete fingerprint coordinates are
					transformed into continuous probability distribution through Gaussian
					kernel function and trained combined with the characteristics of light
					intensity, so as to achieve accurate visible light localization. The
					adaptive federated integrated navigation algorithm is adopted, which
					combines the autonomous advantages of visible light positioning
					technology and inertial navigation system. The experimental results
					show that the average positioning error of the single visible light
					positioning method based on the thermal map optimization convolutional
					neural network is 5.8 cm while the average positioning error of
					the adaptive federated integrated navigation algorithm combined with
					inertial navigation is reduced to 3.7 cm. The integrated
					navigation algorithm can effectively overcome the environmental
					interference of inertial navigation, such as cumulative drift error
					and visible light signal interruption, and enhance the robustness of
					the system in complex environments.</jats:p>

data.title: Fourier-basis active structured illumination sensing lidar imaging using crossed acousto-optic devices
data.author: Kai-Ting Ting, Channing P. Philbrick, Daniel Feldkhun, Kelvin H. Wagner
data.summary:

                    We detail the experimental demonstration and mathematical formulation of a computational lidar remote-imaging scheme—Fourier-basis active structured illumination sensing (
                    <jats:italic>F</jats:italic>
                    -BASIS)—that utilizes structured-light traveling-fringe projection from a nearly non-redundant array of frequency-shifted beams emitted simultaneously from a single aperture. Pairwise interference between elements within a
                    <jats:italic>K</jats:italic>
                    ×
                    <jats:italic>K</jats:italic>
                    nearly non-redundant array of doubly-diffracted, Doppler-shifted beams—produced by a pair of cascaded orthogonal crossed acousto-optic deflectors (XAO) driven by appropriately scaled non-redundant sets of radio-frequency (RF) tones—produces, to our knowledge,
                    <jats:italic>O</jats:italic>
                    {
                    <jats:italic>K</jats:italic>
                    <jats:sup>4</jats:sup>
                    } unique traveling-wave sinusoidal interference fringes. Each traveling fringe probes a matched spatial Fourier component, whose amplitude and phase are encoded in the corresponding RF temporal beat note. Detection of the backscattered return, followed by a temporal Fourier transform, enables the complex demodulation of the temporal beat notes. The resulting amplitudes and phases provide the corresponding Fourier coefficients in the 2D spatial Fourier domain, from which a 2D lidar image is reconstructed via spatial Fourier synthesis.

data.title: LR-8 optical demultiplexers based on silicon nanowires targeted for 400  GbE in datacenter applications
data.author: Seokhwan Jeong, Heuk Park, Joon Ki Lee
data.summary: <jats:p>We propose and experimentally validate a novel, to the best of our knowledge, LR-8 optical demultiplexer architecture based on a four-stage multiple delayed interferometer employing discrete path-length differences and multimode-interference couplers to achieve spectral flatness and suppress crosstalk. An intentional half-length offset path difference in the third stage breaks the inherent spectral periodicity in the wavelength domain, while interferometer-type band-rejection filters in the fourth-stage further suppress out-of-band noise without any penalty for the main signals, thereby improving the crosstalk extinction ratio (XER). Fabricated silicon-nanowire devices exhibit flat-topped, non-periodic LR-8 passbands under TE-polarized input, with a measured XER of >11dB in good agreement with analytical predictions. We further experimentally investigate the impact of statistical random phase errors, arising from fabrication imperfections and/or intentional waveguide design variations, on the spectral degradation of the LR-8 device. With its compact footprint, flat spectral response, and high integrability, the proposed device shows strong potential for next-generation 800-GbE-class data-center interconnects.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 基于硅纳米线的 LR-8 光解复用器，适用于数据中心应用中的 400  GbE
data.abstract_cn: 据我们所知，我们提出并通过实验验证了一种新颖的 LR-8 光解复用器架构，该架构基于四级多重延迟干涉仪，采用离散路径长度差和多模干涉耦合器来实现光谱平坦度并抑制串扰。第三级中有意的半长偏移路径差打破了波长域中固有的光谱周期性，而第四级中的干涉仪型带阻滤波器进一步抑制带外噪声，而不会对主信号造成任何损失，从而提高串扰消光比（XER）。制造的硅纳米线器件在TE偏振输入下表现出平顶、非周期性LR-8通带，测量的XER>11dB，与分析预测非常一致。我们进一步通过实验研究了由制造缺陷和/或故意波导设计变化引起的统计随机相位误差对 LR-8 器件光谱退化的影响。凭借其紧凑的占地面积、平坦的光谱响应和高集成度，所提出的设备显示出下一代 800 GbE 级数据中心互连的强大潜力。</jats:p>

data.title: Short-wave infrared digital holographic microscope: application to optical characterization of phase and amplitude of metasurface optics
data.author: J. Kent Wallace, Skyler Palatnick, Max Millar-Blanchaer, Tobias Wenger, Dylan McKeithen, Eugene Serabyn
data.summary:
<jats:p>
                    In this work, we describe the design, implementation, and operation of
					a digital holographic microscope and apply it to quantitative phase
					measurements of precise optical components. This digital holographic
					microscope instrument operates in the short-wave infrared
					(1.550 µm) and has a spatial resolution of 4.2 µm with a
					field of view ∼500µm
                    <jats:sup>2</jats:sup>
                    . It is well suited for the
					characterization of diffraction-limited coronagraphic and
					phase-contrast focal plane masks, which operate on the scale of the
					point-spread function. Historically, these focal plane masks have been
					characterized indirectly, a process that involves integrating the
					individual components into larger optical systems and determining the
					system level performance. Thus, the direct measurement of the optical
					properties at these spatial scales enables their characterization
					before such integration into larger systems, thereby speeding both
					component and instrument development. Here, we present the use of the
					digital holographic microscope (DHM) that is tailored to the testing
					and characterization of these masks. We illustrate the operation of
					this new DHM instrument with data from two different metasurface
					devices—one scalar and one vector—to showcase the application and
					utility of the device.
                  </jats:p>
data.title_cn: 短波红外数字全息显微镜：应用于超表面光学相位和振幅的光学表征
data.abstract_cn:
<贾茨：p>
                    在这项工作中，我们描述了设计、实现和操作
					数字全息显微镜及其应用于定量相
					精密光学元件的测量。这个数字全息
					显微镜仪器在短波红外线下工作
					(1.550 µm)，空间分辨率为 4.2 µm
					视场~500μm
                    <贾茨：sup>2</贾茨：sup>
                    。它非常适合
					衍射极限日冕的表征和
					相衬焦平面掩模，其工作范围为
					点扩散函数。从历史上看，这些焦平面掩模已被
					间接表征，一个涉及整合的过程
					将单个组件集成到更大的光学系统中并确定
					系统级性能。因此，直接测量光学
					这些空间尺度的特性使其能够表征
					在集成到更大的系统之前，从而加速
					组件和仪器开发。在这里，我们介绍一下使用
					专为测试而定制的数字全息显微镜 (DHM)
					以及这些掩模的特性。我们举例说明操作
					这个新的 DHM 仪器具有来自两个不同超表面的数据
					设备（一个标量和一个向量）来展示应用程序和
					设备的效用。
                  </贾茨：p>

data.title: Enabling a 16K high-resolution large-sized holographic display system
data.author: Heliang Wu, Jiahao Wei, Chenxiao Wei, Xiaohui Ye, Chao Li, Yongtian Wang, Juan Liu
data.summary:
<jats:p>
                    The spatial multiplexing technique using multiple spatial light modulators is an effective scheme to improve the space-bandwidth product (SBP) of holographic display systems. However, due to these challenges, such as complexity, high cost, and limited data transmission bandwidth, the implementation of ultra-high resolution for sufficient SBP presents bottlenecks. To overcome these problems, we propose a synergistic hardware–software method to achieve 16K amplitude-only holographic display using only a single liquid crystal display (LCD). In the proposed method, only need to generate and transmit the precoding data which is eight times smaller than the original required data, so that holograms with ultra-high resolution can be directly obtained on LCD through data replication and extension based on the extended mapping technique (EMT). Meanwhile, to counteract amplitude errors introduced by extension and LCD non-idealities, we develop a least-squares pre-encoding method (LSPM) to pre-optimize the input hologram via least-squares inversion, ensuring high-fidelity wavefront reconstruction. Demonstrated experimentally, the combined EMT and LSPM framework achieves, for the first time, to our knowledge, a 16K holographic display with SBP of 9.42×10
                    <jats:sup>7</jats:sup>
                    using a single commercial LCD panel.
                  </jats:p>
data.title_cn: 实现16K高分辨率大尺寸全息显示系统
data.abstract_cn:
<贾茨：p>
                    使用多个空间光调制器的空间复用技术是提高全息显示系统空间带宽积（SBP）的有效方案。然而，由于复杂性、高成本和有限的数据传输带宽等挑战，实现足够SBP的超高分辨率存在瓶颈。为了克服这些问题，我们提出了一种协同硬件软件方法，仅使用单个液晶显示器 (LCD) 即可实现 16K 仅振幅全息显示。该方法只需生成并传输比原始所需数据小八倍的预编码数据，就可以通过基于扩展映射技术（EMT）的数据复制和扩展在液晶显示器上直接获得超高分辨率的全息图。同时，为了抵消扩展和LCD非理想性引入的幅度误差，我们开发了一种最小二乘预编码方法（LSPM），通过最小二乘反演对输入全息图进行预优化，确保高保真波前重建。据我们所知，经实验证明，结合的 EMT 和 LSPM 框架首次实现了 SBP 为 9.42×10 的 16K 全息显示
                    <贾茨：sup>7</贾茨：sup>
                    使用单个商用液晶面板。
                  </贾茨：p>

data.title:
Compressed sensing 3D ISAR imaging method integrating multi-angle
				observations and a physical scattering model embedding
data.author: Yufeng Yang, Qing Wei
data.summary:
<jats:p>Traditional inverse synthetic aperture radar imaging suffers from the
					loss of three-dimensional (3D) target information and geometric
					distortion caused by fixed rotation axes in single-view observations.
					To address these limitations, this study proposes a multi-angle,
					physically precise enhancement method. By constructing 80
					collaborative observation perspectives to achieve full-angle coverage,
					structural occlusion is resolved using 3D point-cloud fusion and
					registration techniques. By linking the rotation center to the radar
					line of sight in real time, rather than using a preset fixed axis, the
					rotation center offset error is fundamentally eliminated while a
					motion-imaging coupling mechanism suppresses cross-resolution unit
					migration. In addition, a parameterized target-component scattering
					model embedded with physically accurate differentiated radar
					cross-section characteristics is introduced to ensure feature
					consistency through multi-channel joint reconstruction. Application
					results show that this method improves target-structure recognition to
					92%, increases 3D reconstruction efficiency by 40%, and reduces
					geometric distortion by 62%, thereby meeting the requirements of
					high-precision military target recognition.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 集成多角度观测和物理散射模型嵌入的压缩感知 3D ISAR 成像方法

					为了解决这些局限性，本研究提出了多角度、
					物理精确增强方法。通过建造80
					协同观察视角，实现全角度覆盖，
					使用 3D 点云融合解决结构遮挡问题
					注册技术。通过将旋转中心连接到雷达
					实时视线，而不是使用预设的固定轴，

<jats:p>
                    Given the distinctive optical scattering and surface plasmon resonance properties of silver nanocrystals, which can effectively manipulate the propagation path of incident light and enhance the local field effect, this study innovatively designed and fabricated a series of violet-excitable phosphor films embedded in (Sr,Ca)AlSiN

data.title: Multiband phase-coded chirp microwave pulse generation for improving range-Doppler resolution
data.author: Difei Shi, Xiangyan Meng, HanXin Chen, Wei Li
data.summary: <jats:p>A photonic approach for generating pulsed phase-coded chirp microwave waveforms is proposed. The main component of the system is a dual-polarization dual-drive Mach–Zehnder modulator (DP-DDMZM). Two same linearly chirped signals andtwo differential electrical 13-bit Barker coding signals are applied to the DP-DDMZM. By adjusting the voltage biases of the modulator, multiband pulsed phase-coded chirp signals with multiplied center frequencies and bandwidths can be generated. To the best of our knowledge, the main novelty of the work is that, by phase coding the linearly chirped signal, waveforms with thumbtack-like ambiguity function can be achieved, which improve the range-Doppler resolution. Additionally, a compact and stable structure is realized since only one modulator is employed. The generated microwave waveforms can be used to implement the communicating and sensing simultaneously. The multiband phase-coded chirp signals with fundamental, double, triple, and quadruple center frequencies are obtained. In addition, pseudo-random (PN) sequences with longer bit length are further examined to demonstrate the improvement of ambiguity functions and −3dB contour maps. The approach is well theoretically analyzed and numerically verified.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 用于提高距离多普勒分辨率的多频带相位编码线性调频微波脉冲生成
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>提出了一种用于生成脉冲相位编码线性调频微波波形的光子方法。该系统的主要部件是双偏振双驱动马赫-曾德尔调制器（DP-DDMZM）。两个相同的线性调频信号和两个差分电气 13 位巴克编码信号应用于 DP-DDMZM。通过调整调制器的电压偏置，可以生成具有倍增中心频率和带宽的多频带脉冲相位编码线性调频信号。据我们所知，这项工作的主要新颖之处在于，通过对线性调频信号进行相位编码，可以获得具有图钉状模糊度函数的波形，从而提高了距离多普勒分辨率。此外，由于仅采用一个调制器，因此实现了紧凑且稳定的结构。生成的微波波形可用于同时实现通信和传感。获得具有基频、二倍、三倍和四倍中心频率的多频带相位编码线性调频信号。此外，进一步检查了具有较长位长的伪随机（PN）序列，以证明模糊度函数和-3dB等值线图的改进。该方法经过了很好的理论分析和数值验证。</jats:p>

data.title: Checkerboarded spherical phase-based computational optical scanning holography
data.author: Takanori Nomura, Shunsuke Furuya, Yusuke Saita
data.summary: <jats:p>Computational optical scanning holography (COSH) is a single-pixel imaging technique that projects structured interference fringes onto an object using a polarization-dependent spatial light modulator. A hologram is obtained by arranging the total transmitted or reflected light that is measured by a single-pixel detector. After numerical reconstruction of the hologram, three-dimensional imaging is available. However, conventional COSH requires a four-step phase-shifting method to suppress unwanted components, resulting in a long measurement time. To overcome this, we propose a method using a checkerboarded spherical phase distribution in COSH, which combines a binary checkerboarded phase and a spherical phase. This design allows four phase-shifted holograms to be recorded simultaneously through multiplexed diffraction, reducing measurement time to one-fourth. Numerical simulations and optical experiments are given to confirm the proposed method.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 基于棋盘状球面相位的计算光学扫描全息术
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>计算光学扫描全息术 (COSH) 是一种单像素成像技术，它使用偏振相关的空间光调制器将结构化干涉条纹投影到物体上。全息图是通过排列单像素探测器测量的总透射光或反射光来获得的。对全息图进行数值重建后，可以获得三维成像。然而，传统的 COSH 需要四步相移方法来抑制不需要的成分，导致测量时间较长。为了克服这个问题，我们提出了一种在 COSH 中使用棋盘式球形相位分布的方法，该方法结合了二元棋盘式相位和球形相位。这种设计允许通过多重衍射同时记录四个相移全息图，将测量时间减少到四分之一。数值模拟和光学实验验证了所提出的方法。</jats:p>

data.title: Comparative analysis of diode-pumped 3-μm Er:YLF lasers at cryogenic and room temperatures
data.author: Nikolay Ter-Gabrielyan, Viktor Fromzel, Mark Dubinskii
data.summary: <jats:p>The performances of the diode-pumped CW and free running pulsed (Q-CW) 3-μm Er:YLF lasers, operating at room and cryogenic temperatures (RT and LNT), were compared theoretically and experimentally. It is shown that cryogenic cooling considerably enhances laser output power and efficiency in both modes of operation. On the other hand, our prediction for a Q-switched mode is that cryogenic performance can be so severely limited by amplified spontaneous emission (for some gain element designs) that the RT Q-switching may result in substantially higher pulse energies, albeit at lower efficiency.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 低温和室温下二极管泵浦 3 μm Er:YLF 激光器的比较分析
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>对在室温和低温（RT 和 LNT）下工作的二极管泵浦 CW 和自由运行脉冲 (Q-CW) 3-μm Er:YLF 激光器的性能进行了理论和实验比较。结果表明，低温冷却在两种操作模式下都显着提高了激光输出功率和效率。另一方面，我们对 Q 开关模式的预测是，低温性能可能会受到放大自发发射（对于某些增益元件设计）的严重限制，以至于 RT Q 开关可能会导致更高的脉冲能量，尽管效率较低。</jats:p>

data.title: Supercontinuum generation in 1-decanol
data.author: Nathan G. Drouillard, Jacob A. Stephen, Chathurangani Jayalath Arachchige, Jeet Shannigrahi, T. J. Hammond
data.summary:
<jats:p>
                    Although solids have been recently used in ultrafast experiments for spectral broadening due to their relatively high nonlinearity, their sensitivity to damage limits their long-term stability. Liquids are a possible alternative to solids as a nonlinear medium because of their comparable nonlinearity and resistance to permanent damage. We generate a supercontinuum in 1-decanol that spans from approximately 450 nm to 950 nm. We measure the nonlinear index of refraction of 1-decanol and find a significant
                    <jats:italic toggle="yes">n</jats:italic>
                    <jats:sub>4</jats:sub>
                    contribution. This contribution leads to a nonlinearity comparable to CS
                    <jats:sub>2</jats:sub>
                    (a frequent reference for nonlinear optics) in high-intensity regimes while being significantly less volatile and toxic. We find this supercontinuum spectrum to be stable for at least 30 minutes.
                  </jats:p>
data.title_cn: 1-癸醇中的超连续谱产生
data.abstract_cn:
<贾茨：p>
                    尽管固体最近由于其相对较高的非线性而被用于超快光谱展宽实验，但它们对损伤的敏感性限制了它们的长期稳定性。液体作为非线性介质可能替代固体，因为它们具有相当的非线性和抗永久损坏的能力。我们在 1-癸醇中生成了一个跨度约为 450 nm 至 950 nm 的超连续谱。我们测量了 1-癸醇的非线性折射率并发现了显着的
                    <jats：斜体切换=“是”> n</ jats：斜体>
                    <贾茨：子>4</贾茨：子>
                    贡献。这种贡献导致了与 CS 相当的非线性
                    <贾茨：子>2</贾茨：子>
                    （非线性光学的常见参考）在高强度状态下，同时挥发性和毒性显着降低。我们发现这个超连续谱至少可以稳定 30 分钟。
                  </贾茨：p>

data.title:
Multi-mode vector vortex beams generation enabled by a rotatable D
                    <sup>2</sup>
                    NN
data.author: Huijun Hu, Gongyuan Wang, Le Wang, Shengmei Zhao
data.summary:
<jats:p>
                    In this work, we introduce a rotatable diffractive deep neural network (R-D
                    <jats:sup>2</jats:sup>
                    NN) architecture that enables the generation of multi-mode vector vortex beams (VVBs) through controlled rotation of its diffractive layers. This reconfigurable design allows a single physical device to transform an input Gaussian beam into diverse VVB outputs without the need for retraining. The system simultaneously produces orthogonally polarized optical fields carrying distinct orbital angular momentum (OAM) modes, which are coherently superposed to form target VVBs. The vectorial nature and topological charges of the generated beams are verified via Stokes parameter measurements. Numerical simulations demonstrate the generation of up to 16-mode VVBs with a mode purity exceeding 99% using five diffractive layers. Furthermore, we experimentally realize a proof-of-concept two-layer system using a single spatial light modulator (SLM) with two specific architectures, achieving an average mode purity of 85%. The proposed architecture provides a training-free, single-element solution for high-fidelity dynamic VVBs generation, promising for applications in advanced optical communications and sensing.
                  </jats:p>
data.title_cn: 由可旋转 D <sup>2</sup> 神经网络实现的多模式矢量涡旋光束生成
data.abstract_cn:
<贾茨：p>
                    在这项工作中，我们引入了可旋转衍射深度神经网络（R-D
                    <贾茨：sup>2</贾茨：sup>
                    NN）架构，能够通过其衍射层的受控旋转来生成多模矢量涡旋光束（VVB）。这种可重新配置的设计允许单个物理设备将输入高斯光束转换为不同的 VVB 输出，而无需重新训练。该系统同时产生携带不同轨道角动量（OAM）模式的正交偏振光场，这些光场相干叠加形成目标VVB。所生成光束的矢量性质和拓扑电荷通过斯托克斯参数测量进行验证。数值模拟表明，使用五个衍射层可生成多达 16 模 VVB，其模式纯度超过 99%。此外，我们使用具有两种特定架构的单个空间光调制器 (SLM) 实验性地实现了概念验证的两层系统，实现了 85% 的平均模式纯度。所提出的架构为高保真动态 VVB 生成提供了免训练的单元件解决方案，有望在先进光通信和传感领域得到应用。
                  </贾茨：p>

data.title: Depth-of-field extension method for telecentric structured light based on dual-viewpoint stitching
data.author: Fanwei Jiao, Li Da, Xing Zhao
data.summary: <jats:p>Structured light technique is widely used in three-dimensional (3D) reconstruction and measurement with the advantages of high precision and efficiency. However, traditional telecentric structured light systems are limited by optical configurations and depth-of-field (DOF) constraints, making it difficult to achieve large-scale height reconstruction. To address this challenge, this paper proposes a dual-viewpoint stitching method to extend the DOF of the telecentric system. First, the two camera viewpoints are vertically shifted using a displacement stage while maintaining a common focal region to capture images and point clouds at different height positions. Then, we propose a pre-calibrated point cloud stitching method leveraging the geometric consistency of telecentric lenses, which determines and optimizes the stitching matrix for point clouds within the common focal region of the dual viewpoints using standard components. This pre-calibrated method effectively eliminates the need for object feature point clouds and multiple registrations. Finally, the point clouds obtained at different height positions are stitched together using the stitching matrix, thereby achieving dual-viewpoint stitching and extending the DOF range. Experiments demonstrate that the DOF is extended to 1.7 times the original range, with relative errors of repeated measurements within 0.12%. The proposed method extends the DOF range while preserving high measurement precision and significantly improving stitching efficiency, showing excellent engineering applicability.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 基于双视点拼接的远心结构光景深扩展方法
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>结构光技术以其高精度、高效率的优点，广泛应用于三维（3D）重建和测量。然而，传统的远心结构光系统受到光学配置和景深（DOF）的限制，难以实现大规模高度重建。为了应对这一挑战，本文提出了一种双视点拼接方法来扩展远心系统的自由度。首先，使用位移台垂直移动两个相机视点，同时保持公共焦点区域以捕获不同高度位置的图像和点云。然后，我们提出了一种利用远心镜头的几何一致性的预校准点云拼接方法，该方法使用标准组件确定和优化双视点公共焦点区域内的点云拼接矩阵。这种预校准方法有效地消除了对物体特征点云和多次配准的需要。最后，利用拼接矩阵将不同高度位置获得的点云拼接在一起，从而实现双视点拼接，扩展自由度范围。实验表明，自由度扩大到原来范围的1.7倍，重复测量相对误差在0.12%以内。该方法扩展了自由度范围，同时保持了较高的测量精度，显着提高了拼接效率，具有良好的工程适用性。</jats:p>

data.title: Is the orbital angular momentum spectrum of an optical vortex beam propagating in isotropic turbulence symmetrically distributed?
data.author: Yizhou Liu, Mulin Yu, Yakun Wang, Yonglei Liu, Yahong Chen, Dan Wu, Haiyun Wang, Fei Wang
data.summary:
<jats:p>
                    The propagation of optical vortex beams through atmospheric turbulence is pivotal for orbital-angular-momentum (OAM)-based free-space optical communications and remote sensing. It has long been known that owing to the turbulence-induced phase aberration, a propagating vortex beam results in modal scattering and distortions and its power will spread uniformly onto neighboring OAM modes. However, some studies reported a contradictory result that the scattering OAM modes take precedence over the side near the OAM mode with topological charge
                    <jats:italic toggle="yes">l</jats:italic>
                    = 0, resulting in the asymmetric distribution of the OAM spectrum. Here, we present a detailed theoretical analysis to explain the physical mechanism that leads to the above contradiction. We show that the asymmetry of the OAM spectrum of a vortex beam propagating in atmospheric turbulence is a universal phenomenon arising from the interaction between beam diffraction and turbulence, while neglecting the aforementioned interaction, the OAM spectrum becomes symmetrically distributed. We further carry out proof-of-principle experiments to demonstrate the validity of our theoretical analysis and find a good agreement between the experimental results and theoretical predictions. Our findings are of great help to the in-depth understanding of interactions of atmospheric turbulence and OAM beams.
                  </jats:p>
data.title_cn: 在各向同性湍流中传播的光学涡旋光束的轨道角动量谱是否对称分布？
data.abstract_cn:
<贾茨：p>
                    光学涡旋光束通过大气湍流的传播对于基于轨道角动量（OAM）的自由空间光通信和遥感至关重要。人们早就知道，由于湍流引起的相位畸变，传播的涡旋光束会导致模态散射和畸变，并且其功率将均匀地传播到相邻的 OAM 模式上。然而，一些研究报告了一个矛盾的结果，即散射OAM模式优先于靠近OAM模式的具有拓扑电荷的一侧
                    <jats：斜体切换=“是”> l</ jats：斜体>
                    = 0，导致OAM频谱分布不对称。在这里，我们提出了详细的理论分析来解释导致上述矛盾的物理机制。我们发现，在大气湍流中传播的涡旋光束的 OAM 谱的不对称性是由光束衍射和湍流之间的相互作用引起的普遍现象，而忽略上述相互作用，OAM 谱变得对称分布。我们进一步进行了原理验证实验，以证明我们理论分析的有效性，并发现实验结果与理论预测之间具有良好的一致性。我们的研究结果对于深入理解大气湍流与OAM光束的相互作用有很大帮助。
                  </贾茨：p>

data.title: L-Band widely tunable laser and high gain semiconductor optical amplifier based on heterogeneous integration of III-V on silicon
data.author: Guobiao Tang, Haibo Kuang, Yao Fu, Shiao Zhao, Yu Zhang, Jian Wang
data.summary: <jats:p>L-Band on-chip heterogeneous integration lasers and semiconductor optical amplifiers (SOA) are important silicon photonics components in many applications such as light detection and ranging (LiDAR) and optical communications in data center interconnects. In this work, we demonstrate an L-band widely tunable laser and a high gain SOA on a III-V/Si integration platform. The laser gives a tuning range of 43 nm with side-mode suppression ratio > 45 dB, and output power of 9.15 mW, while the SOA shows a small-signal gain of 21 dB and a saturation output power of 13 dBm. The SOA and laser share the same III-V epitaxial wafer structure and a common fabrication process, which benefits the high-density components integration and reduces costs greatly in many applications.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 基于硅上III-V族异质集成的L波段宽可调谐激光器和高增益半导体光放大器
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>L 波段片上异构集成激光器和半导体光放大器 (SOA) 是许多应用中重要的硅光子元件，例如光探测和测距 (LiDAR) 以及数据中心互连中的光通信。在这项工作中，我们在 III-V/Si 集成平台上演示了 L 波段宽可调激光器和高增益 SOA。该激光器的调谐范围为 43 nm，边模抑制比 > 45 dB，输出功率为9.15 mW，而SOA的小信号增益为21 dB，饱和输出功率为13dBm。 SOA和激光器共享相同的III-V族外延片结构和共同的制造工艺，这有利于高密度元件集成并在许多应用中大大降低成本。</jats:p>

data.title: Influence of mechanical resonances on the linearity of adiabatic frequency conversion in whispering gallery resonators
data.author: Alexander Mrokon, Till Wachweger, Dongsung Shin, Karsten Buse, Ingo Breunig
data.summary: <jats:p>Adiabatic frequency conversion enables fast and efficient tuning of laser light by coupling it into an optical resonator whose eigenfrequency is varied on a timescale shorter than its photon lifetime. In this regime, the optical frequency follows the cavity resonance, allowing frequency shifts of several hundred gigahertz within sub-microsecond time - independent of optical power and without phase-matching constraints. While a linear dependence of the cavity resonance on a control parameter (e.g., applied voltage) suggests that arbitrary temporal signals could be linearly transferred to optical frequency changes, we show that this assumption fails near mechanical resonances of the resonator. Using a millimeter-sized lithium niobate whispering gallery resonator with a pronounced mechanical mode at a center frequency of 10.5 MHz, we observe strong deviations from linearity even when higher harmonics of the control signal coincide with this resonance. The experimental results are in excellent agreement with theoretical predictions. They demonstrate that mechanical resonances impose intrinsic limits on the linearity of adiabatic frequency conversion and other frequency control schemes based on the variation of the eigenfrequency of an optical cavity.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 机械谐振对回音壁谐振器绝热变频线性度的影响
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>绝热频率转换通过将激光耦合到光学谐振器中来实现激光的快速有效调谐，该光学谐振器的特征频率在比其光子寿命更短的时间尺度上变化。在这种情况下，光频率遵循腔谐振，允许在亚微秒时间内实现数百千兆赫的频移 - 与光功率无关，并且没有相位匹配限制。虽然腔谐振对控制参数（例如施加电压）的线性依赖性表明任意时间信号可以线性转移到光学频率变化，但我们表明这种假设在谐振器的机械谐振附近失败。使用中心频率为 10.5 MHz 且具有明显机械模式的毫米级铌酸锂回音壁谐振器，即使控制信号的高次谐波与该谐振一致，我们也观察到线性度的强烈偏差。实验结果与理论预测非常吻合。他们证明，机械共振对绝热频率转换和其他基于光学腔本征频率变化的频率控制方案的线性度施加了内在限制。</jats:p>

data.title: Compressed-sensing enabled forward-viewing M-mode OCT for large field of view imaging
data.author: Aidan M. Therien, Jonah A. Majumder, Manuel J. Jerome, Danyang Cheng, Christine P. Hendon
data.summary: <jats:p>We present a method for generating large field of view three-dimensional images with a forward-viewing M-mode optical coherence tomography (OCT) probe that combines electromagnetic tracking with a compressed-sensing iterative soft-thresholding algorithm (CS-ISTA). Phantom and ex-vivo porcine studies demonstrate accurate 3D reconstruction of undersampled volumes and high-contrast tissue sample attenuation maps that delineate pulmonary vein from atrial tissue through blood, with an 88% compression rate with respect to Nyquist. This approach delivers the speed and image quality needed to guide radio-frequency ablation and other catheter-based interventions.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 用于大视场成像的压缩感知前视 M 模式 OCT
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>我们提出了一种使用前视 M 模式光学相干断层扫描 (OCT) 探头生成大视场三维图像的方法，该探头将电磁跟踪与压缩感知迭代软阈值算法 (CS-ISTA) 相结合。体模和离体猪研究证明了欠采样体积的精确 3D 重建和高对比度组织样本衰减图，描绘了从心房组织到血液的肺静脉，相对于奈奎斯特压缩率为 88%。这种方法提供了指导射频消融和其他基于导管的干预措施所需的速度和图像质量。</jats:p>

data.title: 3D focusing through scattered light using a binary hologram
data.author: Meigang Duan, Jing Wang, Xiaojin Yin, Naikui Ren, Jizhou Wu, Chenlong Zhang, Qifeng Zhang, Jie Ma
data.summary: <jats:p>Due to the support of scattering wavefront shaping technology, scattering medium (SM) have significant potential in large-capacity, high-fidelity and crosstalk-free three-dimensional (3D) holographic projections. Here, an accumulation of multiplication algorithm (AOMA) was proposed to calculate binary holograms, so that the intensity distribution of 3D space can be simultaneously modulated behind SM using a hologram. In particular, AOMA is free from the need for signal feedback. It is simple and efficient to generate binary holograms with multiplication and addition. Experiments demonstrate that the intensity of axial four planes can be controlled simultaneously with a binary hologram, and the proposed AOMA is able to achieve high-fidelity four-plane focusing in the different modulation elements. Moreover, a wide-angle holographic focusing on two planes is also presented with a binary hologram in the high-dimensional modulation elements. To explore the anti-noise ability of AOMA, we further demonstrate 3D focusing performance with high-dimensional binary holograms at different interference environment. These advancements are expected to be beneficial to generate holograms for 3D scattering-enabled holographic projections.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 使用二元全息图通过散射光进行 3D 聚焦
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>由于散射波前整形技术的支持，散射介质（SM）在大容量、高保真和无串扰的三维（3D）全息投影方面具有巨大潜力。这里，提出了乘法累积算法（AOMA）来计算二元全息图，以便可以使用全息图在SM之后同时调制3D空间的强度分布。特别是，AOMA 不需要信号反馈。通过乘法和加法生成二元全息图既简单又高效。实验表明，可以用二元全息图同时控制轴向四个平面的强度，并且所提出的AOMA能够在不同的调制元件中实现高保真四平面聚焦。此外，在高维调制元件中还以二元全息图呈现聚焦在两个平面上的广角全息。为了探索 AOMA 的抗噪声能力，我们进一步展示了高维二值全息图在不同干扰环境下的 3D 聚焦性能。这些进步预计将有利于为支持 3D 散射的全息投影生成全息图。</jats:p>

data.title: Deep learning enabled inverse design of ultracompact silicon metadevices for mode conversion
data.author: Weifeng Jiang, Lin Zhang, Zhengguo Han, Zihan Xiang, Yatai Gao, Zhongmao Cai, B. M. Azizur Rahman
data.summary: <jats:p>Deep learning has shown great potential for enabling the rapid inverse-design of high-performance photonic devices. In this work, we develop a forward prediction and inverse design platform for silicon metadevices for mode conversion using deep neural networks (DNNs). The performances of twenty silicon-based mode converters are predicted by using this platform, with a prediction time of just 5 ms and a root mean square error (RMSE) of less than 0.018. Five silicon-based mode converters were inverse-designed using DNN, achieving an ultracompact dimension of only 4.08 µm × 1.68 µm and a design time of only 10 ms. Experimental results verified the performance of the inversely designed devices and compared them with their forward predictions. The measured insertion losses deviated from the desired and predicted values by less than 0.887 and 0.878 dB, respectively. The DNN-based forward prediction and inverse design approach enables the rapid development of highly integrated and high-performance silicon-based mode converters, providing key components for mode-division multiplexing systems.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 深度学习实现了用于模式转换的超紧凑硅元器件的逆向设计
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>深度学习在实现高性能光子器件的快速逆向设计方面显示出了巨大的潜力。在这项工作中，我们开发了一个用于硅元设备的正向预测和逆向设计平台，用于使用深度神经网络（DNN）进行模式转换。利用该平台对20种硅基模式转换器的性能进行了预测，预测时间仅为5μms，均方根误差(RMSE)小于0.018。利用DNN对五个硅基模式转换器进行逆向设计，实现了仅4.08 μm × 1.68 μm的超紧凑尺寸和仅10 ms的设计时间。实验结果验证了逆向设计器件的性能，并将其与正向预测进行了比较。测量的插入损耗与期望值和预测值的偏差分别小于 0.887 和 0.878 dB。基于DNN的正向预测和逆向设计方法使得能够快速开发高集成、高性能的硅基模式转换器，为模分复用系统提供关键组件。</jats:p>

data.title: Calibration-free single-shot imaging of an axially moving object beyond the optical memory effect through a scattering medium
data.author: Liang Huang, Jiapeng Cai, Xiang Peng, Wenqi He
data.summary: <jats:p>Image degradation caused by light scattering makes it challenging to gather information about an object, especially when it extends beyond the region of the optical memory effect (OME), and even more so for a moving object rushing across a wide area. In the latter case, a speckle pattern is synthesized, which is usually regarded as a combination of a series of time-varying speckle patterns. Each of them is a convolution of the object’s ideal image and the point spread function (PSF) associated with a corresponding OME region. Specifically, suppose a small object moves axially over a relatively long distance under the illumination of a narrow-banded incoherent light. In this case, the imaging system is composed of a sequence of linear shift-invariant (LSI) systems. Theoretical analysis reveals that discarding the amplitude component of the dynamic system’s equivalent optical transfer function (E-OTF) enables calibration-free object retrieval while simultaneously reducing noise. This insight helps us to retrieve the shape of the rapidly moving object (though not its trajectory) from a synthesized speckle captured in a single shot. Note that we also further demonstrate the feasibility of retrieving an axially moving small object even under white light illumination.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 通过散射介质对超出光学记忆效应的轴向移动物体进行免校准单次成像
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>由光散射引起的图像质量下降使得收集有关物体的信息变得困难，特别是当它超出光学记忆效应 (OME) 区域时，对于冲过广阔区域的移动物体来说更是如此。在后一种情况下，合成散斑图案，通常将其视为一系列时变散斑图案的组合。它们中的每一个都是对象的理想图像和与相应 OME 区域相关的点扩散函数 (PSF) 的卷积。具体来说，假设一个小物体在窄带非相干光的照射下轴向移动相对较长的距离。在这种情况下，成像系统由一系列线性平移不变（LSI）系统组成。理论分析表明，丢弃动态系统等效光学传递函数（E-OTF）的幅度分量可以实现免校准目标检索，同时降低噪声。这种见解有助于我们从单次拍摄中捕获的合成散斑中检索快速移动物体的形状（尽管不是其轨迹）。请注意，我们还进一步证明了即使在白光照明下检索轴向移动的小物体的可行性。</jats:p>

data.title: Nonreciprocal quantum sensing via directional squeezing in two coupled microring resonators
data.author: Zhuang Xu, Chengdeng Gou, Guang-Ming Huang, Gao-Xiang Li
data.summary:
<jats:p>
                    We propose a scheme for nonreciprocal quantum rotation sensing in two coupled microring resonators, one of which rotates in a clockwise direction. Driving the rotating resonator in two directions induces the opposite Sagnac-Fizeau shifts. By pumping the other nonlinear resonator via classical field, directional squeezing is generated along the pump direction due to the phase-matching condition, which leads to an asymmetric detuning and chiral photon interaction between the two resonators. As a result, the estimation of the Sagnac-Fizeau shift is shown to be nonreciprocal, i.e., the estimation precision is dramatically enhanced for the forward-input case, where most of the accessible information is predominantly stored in the primary resonator, but not for the backward-input one. Further, we evaluate the performance of several Gaussian measurements and analyze how measurements of the second-order coherence
                    <jats:italic>g</jats:italic>
                    <jats:sup>(2)</jats:sup>
                    (0) can extract quantum-enhanced information and improve measurement precision. The proposed scheme offers what we believe to be a new perspective for the design of a nonreciprocal quantum gyroscope.
                  </jats:p>
data.title_cn: 通过两个耦合微环谐振器中的定向挤压进行非互易量子传感
