data.title: End-to-end snapshot metalens spectral imaging based on deep unfolding half-shuffle transformer network
data.author: Feng Huang, Yizhong Wu, Maijie Cao, Zhou Wu, Wen Tang, Jinping Li, Weijie Chang, Shengyao Xu
data.summary: <jats:p>End-to-end computational spectral imaging based on metalens, which enables compact spectral imaging systems by co-optimization of optical encoder and computational decoder, has attracted extensive attention. However, traditional end-to-end spectral imaging systems typically employ pure data-driven convolutional neural networks (CNN) that ignore physical priors of the imaging process and long-range dependencies, limiting high-precision spectral reconstruction. In this paper, we propose and experimentally demonstrate an end-to-end snapshot metalens spectral imaging based on a physics-driven deep unfolding half-shuffle Transformer network. By unfolding the iterative process of traditional optimization algorithms into a cascaded network structure, we not only integrate the advantages of adaptive feature learning neural network and physical model, but also introduce the physical priors of optical-encoder into the network to allow physically-consistent reconstruction process. Besides, a multi-head self-attention mechanism half-shuffle Transformer network is utilized to extract both local and global information. In this way, we achieve stronger generalization and higher reconstruction quality compared with traditional CNN-based reconstruction methods. We designed and fabricated the metalens, achieving high-fidelity spectral image reconstruction across 25 channels (430-670 nm) at a spatial resolution of 512 × 512 with an average peak signal-to-noise ratio (PSNR) of 42.87 dB, while preserving rich spatial details compared with state-of-the-art (SOTA) methods. Our proposed framework facilitates full interaction between the encoder and the decoder, boosting the power of joint optimization in end-to-end design, and paves a way for the design of miniaturized spectral imaging metalenes.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 基于深度展开半洗牌变压器网络的端到端快照超透镜光谱成像
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>基于超透镜的端到端计算光谱成像，通过光学编码器和计算解码器的共同优化实现紧凑的光谱成像系统，引起了广泛的关注。然而，传统的端到端光谱成像系统通常采用纯数据驱动的卷积神经网络（CNN），忽略成像过程的物理先验和远程依赖性，限制了高精度光谱重建。在本文中，我们提出并实验演示了一种基于物理驱动的深度展开半洗牌 Transformer 网络的端到端快照超透镜光谱成像。通过将传统优化算法的迭代过程展开为级联网络结构，我们不仅集成了自适应特征学习神经网络和物理模型的优点，还将光学编码器的物理先验引入到网络中，以实现物理一致的重建过程。此外，利用多头自注意力机制半洗牌变压器网络来提取局部和全局信息。通过这种方式，与传统的基于 CNN 的重建方法相比，我们获得了更强的泛化能力和更高的重建质量。我们设计并制造了超透镜，以 512 × 512 的空间分辨率实现了 25 个通道 (430-670 nm) 的高保真光谱图像重建，平均峰值信噪比 (PSNR) 为 42.87 dB，同时与最先进的 (SOTA) 方法相比保留了丰富的空间细节。我们提出的框架促进了编码器和解码器之间的充分交互，增强了端到端设计中联合优化的能力，并为小型化光谱成像亚烯的设计铺平了道路。</jats:p>

data.title: Continuous distributed temperature monitoring of a long laser-cooled rare-earth-doped glass rod
data.author: M. Aïssaoui, T. Meyneng, A. Roberge, Y. Messaddeq, R. Kashyap
data.summary: <jats:p>This study presents the continuous measurement of the temperature distribution along a length of rod-shaped glass sample cooled by anti-Stokes fluorescence. The technique uses a random optical grating by ultraviolet or ultrafast laser exposure (ROGUE) written in standard SMF-28, interrogated by optical frequency-domain reflectometry (OFDR). Milli-Kelvin resolution with millimeter spatial resolution is demonstrated over 15 cm of sensing length. Comparisons with an FLIR camera and a point fiber Bragg grating sensor show improved performance for monitoring long lengths of laser-cooled samples, and show its potential as a valuable tool for monitoring the temperature distribution in radiation-balanced or high-power fiber/rod lasers and amplifiers.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 长激光冷却稀土掺杂玻璃棒的连续分布式温度监测
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>这项研究提出了沿反斯托克斯荧光冷却的棒状玻璃样品长度方向的温度分布的连续测量。该技术使用以标准 SMF-28 编写的紫外或超快激光曝光 (ROGUE) 随机光栅，并通过光学频域反射计 (OFDR) 进行询问。在 15 厘米的传感长度上展示了毫开尔文分辨率和毫米空间分辨率。与 FLIR 相机和点光纤布拉格光栅传感器的比较表明，其在监测长长度激光冷却样本方面的性能得到了改善，并显示出其作为监测辐射平衡或高功率光纤/棒激光器和放大器中的温度分布的有价值工具的潜力。</jats:p>

data.title: Spatio-temporal microfluidic reconstruction via compressive dark-field digital holography
data.author: Zhou Ge, Chuchu Rong, Jingyuan Zhu, Famin Wang, Wenjing Zhou, Yingjie Yu
data.summary: <jats:p>Digital holography is a powerful technique for the four-dimensional (4D) spatio-temporal reconstruction of microparticles in microfluidic systems, which is crucial for applications in fluid dynamics and biology. However, the accuracy of conventional in-line holography is often hindered by significant background noise and artifacts. To overcome these limitations, we propose what is believed to be a novel compressive dark-field digital holography (CD-DH) method. This approach integrates a dark-field operation to enhance the signal-to-noise ratio (SNR) by suppressing background interference, and leverages compressed sensing (CS) with a total variation (TV) regularization constraint to computationally eliminate the twin image problem, enabling high-precision 4D reconstruction from a sequence of consecutively recorded holograms. We systematically validated the performance of our method through simulations and experiments. In simulations, CD-DH reduced the mean absolute error (MAE) and root mean square error (RMSE) of particle localization by approximately 67.9% and 67.5%, respectively, compared to the conventional back-propagation (BP) algorithm. Experimentally, when analyzing polystyrene microspheres in a uniform flow, our method achieved a velocity measurement error of 2%, a stark improvement over the error from the BP method. Furthermore, in a non-uniform flow within a Y-shaped microfluidic chip, our technique effectively removed background artifacts and accurately reconstructed particle trajectories and velocity fields that align well with Poiseuille flow theory. These results demonstrate that CD-DH is a robust and precise tool, providing powerful technical support for the quantitative visualization of complex micro-scale flow phenomena.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 通过压缩暗场数字全息术进行时空微流体重建
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>数字全息术是一种强大的技术，可用于微流体系统中微粒的四维 (4D) 时空重建，这对于流体动力学和生物学中的应用至关重要。然而，传统的同轴全息术的准确性常常受到显着的背景噪声和伪影的阻碍。为了克服这些限制，我们提出了一种被认为是新颖的压缩暗场数字全息（CD-DH）方法。该方法集成了暗场操作，通过抑制背景干扰来增强信噪比 (SNR)，并利用压缩感知 (CS) 和全变分 (TV) 正则化约束来通过计算消除孪生图像问题，从而能够从一系列连续记录的全息图进行高精度 4D 重建。我们通过模拟和实验系统地验证了我们方法的性能。在模拟中，与传统的反向传播（BP）算法相比，CD-DH 将粒子定位的平均绝对误差（MAE）和均方根误差（RMSE）分别降低了约 67.9% 和 67.5%。实验上，当分析均匀流动的聚苯乙烯微球时，我们的方法实现了 2% 的速度测量误差，比 BP 方法的误差有了明显的改善。此外，在 Y 形微流控芯片内的非均匀流动中，我们的技术有效地消除了背景伪影，并准确地重建了与泊肃叶流理论非常吻合的粒子轨迹和速度场。这些结果表明CD-DH是一种强大而精确的工具，为复杂微尺度流动现象的定量可视化提供了强大的技术支持。</jats:p>

data.title: Near-diffraction-limited, high-energy, electro-optically Q-switched Nd:YAG Innoslab laser based on a slab BBO Pockels cell
data.author: Jinxin Chen, Gang Cheng, Yajun Wu, Xi Chen, Xiaonan Zhao, Huihui Gao, Linhao Shang, Pan Liu, Yibin Fu, Guangqiang Fan, Tianshu Zhang, Xinhui Sun, Wenqing Liu
data.summary: <jats:p>For Pockels cells required by high-energy lasers, the current mainstream design adopts a square aperture. Pockels cells assembled with slab-shaped electro-optic crystals are a more suitable choice for Nd:YAG Innoslab hybrid cavities that directly output large single-pulse energies or for ring-cavity regenerative amplifiers with large cavity-mode size. This study constructs a Pockels cell using a single large slab-shaped BBO crystal, focusing on enhancing electric field uniformity within the crystal and reducing assembly stress, thereby achieving consistent optical field modulation across the entire aperture. The experiment first tested the extinction ratio, conoscopic interference pattern, and extracavity modulation characteristics of the electro-optic switch. The developed Pockels cell was then applied to a continuously pumped and pulsed-pumped Nd:YAG hybrid cavity laser. During continuous pumping, we attained an output power of 37.54 W, a repetition rate of 2 kHz, and a pulse width of 6.5 ns. During the pulsed pump, we also obtained an output energy of 21.3 mJ with a repetition rate of 100 Hz and a pulse width of 7.77 ns. Both of these results exhibited near-diffraction-limited beam output. Given the performance verification of the proposed packaging in our work, we expect this high-performance Pockels cell to provide support for the advancement of integrated optical laser systems and high-resolution metrology.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 基于平板 BBO 普克尔斯盒的近衍射极限、高能、电光 Q 开关 Nd:YAG Innoslab 激光器
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>对于高能激光器所需的普克尔斯盒，目前主流设计采用方形孔径。由板状电光晶体组装而成的泡克尔斯盒更适合直接输出大单脉冲能量的 Nd:YAG Innoslab 混合腔或具有大腔模尺寸的环腔再生放大器。本研究利用单个大板状BBO晶体构建了普克尔斯盒，重点是增强晶体内的电场均匀性并减少组装应力，从而实现整个孔径上一致的光场调制。实验首先测试了电光开关的消光比、锥光干涉图样和外腔调制特性。然后将开发的普克尔斯盒应用于连续泵浦和脉冲泵浦 Nd:YAG 混合腔激光器。在连续泵浦过程中，我们获得了 37.54 W 的输出功率、2 kHz 的重复频率和 6.5 ns 的脉冲宽度。在脉冲泵浦过程中，我们还获得了 21.3 mJ 的输出能量，重复频率为 100 Hz，脉冲宽度为 7.77 ns。这两个结果都表现出接近衍射极限的光束输出。鉴于我们工作中所提出的封装的性能验证，我们期望这种高性能普克尔斯盒能够为集成光学激光系统和高分辨率计量学的进步提供支持。</jats:p>

data.title: On-chip nonlinear optical physical unclonable function based on a thin-film lithium niobate array
data.author: Pengfa Chang, Tianqi Duan, Xinwei Li, Yuxi Lv, Zhenzhong Hao, Yuanyuan Guo, Longsheng Wang, Zhiwei Jia, Tong Zhao, Anbang Wang
data.summary: <jats:p>We propose and simulate an optical physical unclonable function (PUF) scheme that exploits nonlinear modulation in an integrated thin-film lithium niobate (TFLN) scattering array. The device consists of a silica grating structure, which randomly scatters components of different wavelengths, and a random lithium niobate array, which induces mutual temporal modulation among the input signals. First, simulations examine the wavelength-dependent scattering and the resulting nonlinear effects, confirming the theoretical basis for temporal encryption via mutual modulation in the lithium niobate pattern. Next, simulations verify the PUF’s unpredictability, reproducibility, and unclonability. By varying the challenge wavelength and its coding format, we further demonstrate a strategy for expanding the challenge-response pair (CRP) space, which is calculated to be approximately one million. Subsequently, an identity authentication scheme is proposed, and its security under link attacks is analyzed. This work lays the foundation for the design and implementation of TFLN PUF and provides a new security authentication solution for IoT devices.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 基于薄膜铌酸锂阵列的片上非线性光学物理不可克隆函数
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>我们提出并模拟了一种光学物理不可克隆函数 (PUF) 方案，该方案利用集成薄膜铌酸锂 (TFLN) 散射阵列中的非线性调制。该装置由一个二氧化硅光栅结构和一个随机铌酸锂阵列组成，二氧化硅光栅结构随机散射不同波长的成分，随机铌酸锂阵列在输入信号之间引起相互时间调制。首先，模拟检查了与波长相关的散射以及由此产生的非线性效应，证实了通过铌酸锂图案中的相互调制进行时间加密的理论基础。接下来，模拟验证了 PUF 的不可预测性、再现性和不可克隆性。通过改变挑战波长及其编码格式，我们进一步演示了扩展挑战响应对（CRP）空间的策略，计算得出约为一百万。随后提出了一种身份认证方案，并分析了其在链路攻击下的安全性。该工作为TFLN PUF的设计和实现奠定了基础，并为物联网设备提供了一种新的安全认证解决方案。</jats:p>

data.title: Efficient neural network equalization via automatic grouping-enabled non-uniform quantization for 120-Gb/s PAM-8 DML-based IM/DD links
data.author: Cancan Chen, Zhaopeng Xu, Qi Wu, Tonghui Ji, Honglin Ji, Zhongliang Sun, Linsheng Fan, Junpeng Liang, Jianwei Tang, Jinlong Wei, Yuan Jiang, Zhixue He, Weisheng Hu
data.summary: <jats:p>An automatic grouping-enabled non-uniform quantization (AGNQ) approach is proposed for efficient neural network (NN) equalization in a 120 Gb/s 10 km directly modulated laser (DML)-based PAM-8 intensity-modulation/direct-detection (IM/DD) system. Compared with traditional uniform quantized feedforward neural network (UQ-FNN) and the additive power-of-two quantized FNN (APoT-FNN) approaches, AGNQ-FNN achieves comparable bit error rate (BER) performance below the 7% hard-decision forward error correction (HD-FEC) threshold using only 4-bit weight and bias quantization, whereas UQ-FNN and APoT-FNN require 10-bit and 8-bit quantization, respectively. Furthermore, when approaching the BER performance of an un-quantized FNN baseline, AGNQ-FNN reduces weight and bias memory usage by 47.9% and 35.5% compared with UQ-FNN and APoT-FNN, respectively. These results highlight the potential of AGNQ-FNN as a hardware-friendly equalizer for high-speed short-reach optical communication systems.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 通过自动分组非均匀量化实现基于 120 Gb/s PAM-8 DML 的 IM/DD 链路的高效神经网络均衡
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>提出了一种支持自动分组的非均匀量化 (AGNQ) 方法，用于在基于 120 Gb/s 10 km 直接调制激光 (DML) 的 PAM-8 强度调制/直接检测 (IM/DD) 系统中实现高效神经网络 (NN) 均衡。与传统的均匀量化前馈神经网络 (UQ-FNN) 和加性二次幂量化 FNN (APoT-FNN) 方法相比，AGNQ-FNN 仅使用 4 位权重和偏置量化即可实现低于 7% 硬决策前向纠错 (HD-FEC) 阈值的可比误码率 (BER) 性能，而 UQ-FNN 和 APoT-FNN 需要 10 位和 8 位量化，分别。此外，当接近未量化 FNN 基线的 BER 性能时，AGNQ-FNN 与 UQ-FNN 和 APoT-FNN 相比，权重和偏差内存使用量分别减少了 47.9% 和 35.5%。这些结果凸显了 AGNQ-FNN 作为高速短距离光通信系统的硬件友好型均衡器的潜力。</jats:p>

data.title: High-gain U-band discrete Raman amplifier for multi-band optical transmission systems
data.author: Dini Pratiwi, Daniele Orsuti, Mingming Tan, Ben. J. Puttnam, Ruben S. Luis, Aleksandr Donodin, Ian Phillips, Luca Palmieri, Hideaki Furukawa, Wladek Forysiak
data.summary: <jats:p>We experimentally demonstrate a set of U-band discrete Raman amplifiers using backward incoherent pumping in 1 km HNLF, achieving up to 22.3 dB net gain, and 4.2–5.8 dB NF. Three different types of Raman gain fiber have been investigated, including 1 km HNLF, 0.51 km HNLDSF, 8 km and 7.6 km IDF. Using HNLF achieved the highest gain and the lowest NF, while using 8 km IDF yielded up to 16.2 dB net gain and a minimum of 6.3 dB NF due to its low Raman gain coefficient and higher fiber loss. Using 0.51 km HNLDSF gave up to 21 dB net gain, but at a cost of over 8.1 dB noise figure. These amplifiers were incorporated in a C + L + U-band coherent transmission system using 516 × 24.5GBd DP-64/256QAM channels over 50 km SSMF. We achieved a maximum decoded data rate of 123.5Tb/s across C + L + U bands, with 25.6Tb/s specifically in the U-band (1625–1650 nm).</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 用于多波段光传输系统的高增益 U 波段分立拉曼放大器
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>我们通过实验演示了一组在 1 km HNLF 中使用后向非相干泵浦的 U 波段离散拉曼放大器，实现了高达 22.3 dB 的净增益和 4.2–5.8 dB NF。研究了三种不同类型的拉曼增益光纤，包括1km HNLF、0.51km HNLDSF、8km 和7.6km IDF。使用 HNLF 实现了最高的增益和最低的噪声系数，而使用 8 公里 IDF 则由于拉曼增益系数较低和光纤损耗较高，可产生高达 16.2 分贝的净增益和最低 6.3 分贝的噪声系数。使用 0.51 公里 HNLDSF 可获得高达 21 分贝的净增益，但代价是超过 8.1 分贝的噪声系数。这些放大器被纳入 C + L + U 波段相干传输系统，在 50 km SSMF 上使用 516 × 24.5GBd DP-64/256QAM 通道。我们在 C + L + U 频段实现了 123.5Tb/s 的最大解码数据速率，特别是在 U 频段 (1625–1650 nm) 中达到了 25.6Tb/s。</jats:p>

data.title: Pinhole-free point-diffraction dynamic phase imaging using focused white-light Sagnac interferometry
data.author: Ana Karen Reyes, Jose Escamilla Angeles, Noel-Ivan Toto-Arellano
data.summary: <jats:p>In this research, we present a convergent-beam white-light Sagnac interferometer that produces point-diffraction-like interference without a pinhole, achieving single-shot quantitative phase imaging (QPI). A sample placed at the focal plane asymmetrically modifies the counter-propagating beams, intrinsically generating a quasi-spherical reference and a sample-modulated wave. This configuration recreates the behavior of point-diffraction interferometry while preserving common-path stability, broadband compatibility, and high throughput. A Michelson-type replicator produces single-shot capture of four spatially separated interferograms with controlled 2π/3 phase shifts, captured by a color CMOS sensor; statistical analysis confirmed the green channel as the most reliable. The system successfully retrieves static and dynamic phase distributions in thin films, alcohol evaporation, and candle flames, demonstrating a robust platform for single-shot, high-sensitivity QPI of transparent samples.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 使用聚焦白光萨格纳克干涉测量法进行无针孔点衍射动态相位成像
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>在这项研究中，我们提出了一种会聚光束白光萨格纳克干涉仪，它可以产生无针孔的点衍射式干涉，从而实现单次定量相位成像（QPI）。放置在焦平面上的样本不对称地修改反向传播的光束，本质上生成准球形参考和样本调制波。这种配置重现了点衍射干涉测量的行为，同时保留了公共路径稳定性、宽带兼容性和高吞吐量。迈克尔逊型复制器可单次捕获四个空间分离的干涉图，这些干涉图具有受控的 2π/3 相移，由彩色 CMOS 传感器捕获；统计分析证实绿色通道是最可靠的。该系统成功地检索了薄膜、酒精蒸发和蜡烛火焰中的静态和动态相位分布，为透明样品的单次、高灵敏度 QPI 展示了一个强大的平台。</jats:p>

data.title: Soliton self-frequency shift in hollow-core fiber for bright femtosecond radiation tunable across the short-wavelength infrared
data.author: Markus Lippl, Martin Butryn, Nicolas Y. Joly, Francesco Tani
data.summary: <jats:p>We report a fiber-based source of femtosecond radiation that is spectrally tunable in the short-wavelength infrared region, delivering average powers at the multi-watt level. The system utilizes self-soliton frequency shifting in a hydrogen-filled hollow-core fiber, producing pulse trains at 1.1 MHz with integrated relative intensity noise below 0.3% and a polarization extinction ratio of 30 dB. This source constitutes an efficient and valid fiber-based alternative to optical parametric amplifiers for a variety of applications, including THz generation, multiphoton imaging, and high-harmonic generation.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 空心光纤中的孤子自频移可在短波长红外范围内调谐明亮的飞秒辐射
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>我们报告了一种基于光纤的飞秒辐射源，该辐射源可在短波长红外区域进行光谱调谐，提供数瓦级别的平均功率。该系统利用充氢空芯光纤中的自孤子频移，产生 1.1MHz 的脉冲序列，集成相对强度噪声低于 0.3%，偏振消光比为 30dB。该光源构成了光学参量放大器的高效且有效的基于光纤的替代方案，适用于各种应用，包括太赫兹生成、多光子成像和高次谐波生成。</jats:p>

data.title:

data.author: Xincheng Cai, Zhenyu Zhang, Junjing Duan, Zhangyi Huang, Lexing Liang, Mao Deng, Linxuan Han, Xu Huang, Jianqi Qi, Tiecheng Lu
data.summary:
<jats:p>
                    While spherical powders are typically favored for enhanced sintering activity, highly transparent Y
                    <jats:sub>2</jats:sub>
                    O
                    <jats:sub>3</jats:sub>
                    –MgO ceramics have recently been fabricated using rod-like powders. The underlying mechanisms by which powder morphology influences the final microstructure and properties remain unclear. This study reveals that spherical powders yield spherical-phase domains and high mid-wave infrared transmittance (~84% at 3 μm). In contrast, rod-like powders promote elongated phase domains and a higher long-wave infrared transmittance (~82% at 8 μm) with a broader transmission window. Both composites exceed 85% (~6 μm) transmittance (theoretical maximum ~86%). Optical tailoring is attributed to the interplay of Mie scattering, carbon contamination, intrinsic phonon absorption mechanisms, and pinning effect. Composites from rod-like powders also exhibit finer grains and higher hardness (11.3 GPa vs. 10.2 GPa), consistent with the Hall–Petch relationship. This work demonstrates that powder morphology design enables concurrent optimization of performance in transparent materials, offering a general strategy for advanced ceramic engineering.
                  </jats:p>

data.title: An in-band pumped wavelength-tunable high-power narrow-linewidth Er/Yb co-doped fiber amplifier
data.author: Guanzhong Li, Yuexuan Cai, Guohao Fu, Weilong Yu, Pei Li, Dan Li, Qirong Xiao, Ping Yan
data.summary: <jats:p>We report a narrow-linewidth Er/Yb co-doped fiber (EYDF) amplifier tunable from 1570 to 1610 nm with an output power exceeding 330 W and a 3 dB linewidth below 150 pm. It is the highest, to the best of our knowledge, output power for the 1.5 μm-band tunable fiber lasers to date. The maximum output power reached 450 W with the optical efficiency of 35.3% when operating at 1570 nm. The main amplifier was in-band pumped by 1535 nm fiber lasers to avoid 1 μm-band amplified spontaneous emission (ASE). A piece of EYDF was inserted before the main amplifier to filter out the 1.5 μm-band ASE that originated from the pre-amplifiers, which permitted a powerful amplification for all tunable wavelengths without ASE damage. We demonstrated a robust approach for achieving high-power, tunable, narrow-linewidth 1.5 μm-band fiber lasers with high ASE suppression ratios.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 带内泵浦波长可调高功率窄线宽铒/镱共掺光纤放大器
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>我们报告了一种窄线宽铒/镱共掺光纤 (EYDF) 放大器，可在 1570 至 1610 nm 范围内调谐，输出功率超过 330 W，线宽低于 150 pm 3 dB。据我们所知，这是迄今为止 1.5μm 波段可调谐光纤激光器的最高输出功率。在1570nm工作时，最大输出功率达到450W，光效率为35.3%。主放大器由 1535nm 光纤激光器带内泵浦，以避免 1μm 带放大自发发射 (ASE)。在主放大器之前插入一块 EYDF，以滤除来自前置放大器的 1.5μm 波段 ASE，从而可以对所有可调谐波长进行强大的放大，而不会损坏 ASE。我们展示了一种稳健的方法，可实现具有高 ASE 抑制比的高功率、可调谐、窄线宽 1.5μm 波段光纤激光器。</jats:p>

data.title: Polarization-grating-filled Fabry–Perot resonators for optical imprinting of liquid crystals
data.author: Takuto Nakade, Hiroyuki Yoshida
data.summary: <jats:p>Patterned alignment of liquid crystals has been studied actively in recent years to control the behavior of light by the Pancharatnam–Berry phase. While the photoalignment technique easily allows directed alignment by linearly polarized light irradiation, single-exposure methods to achieve patterned alignment are limited. In this article, we propose the utilization of a Fabry–Perot resonator containing a patterned, uniaxially anisotropic medium as a wavelength-selective, polarization filter that duplicates the pattern in the resonator. We experimentally demonstrate single-exposure photoalignment of pattern period 3.5 µm and numerically show that pattern periods as small as 2 µm are feasible using an inexpensive LED light source. The proposed structure thus has application potential as photoalignment exposure masks.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 用于液晶光学压印的偏振光栅填充法布里-珀罗谐振器
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>近年来，人们对液晶的图案排列进行了积极的研究，以通过 Pancharatnam-Berry 相控制光的行为。虽然光对准技术很容易通过线偏振光照射实现定向对准，但实现图案对准的单次曝光方法受到限制。在本文中，我们建议利用包含图案化单轴各向异性介质的法布里-珀罗谐振器作为波长选择性偏振滤光片，以复制谐振器中的图案。我们通过实验证明了图案周期为 3.5μm 的单次曝光光对准，并通过数值表明，使用廉价的 LED 光源，小至 2μm 的图案周期是可行的。因此，所提出的结构具有作为光对准曝光掩模的应用潜力。</jats:p>

data.title: Active fiber-loop method for improved performance assessment of Brillouin OTDR systems
data.author: Tim Jungbluth, Jesper B. Christensen, Christian Buntebarth, Thibault North
data.summary: <jats:p>We report on what we belive to be a new fiber-optical measurement artifact used to assess the performance of Brillouin optical time-domain reflectometry (BOTDR) devices. In our proposed configuration, a fast optical switch is employed to significantly reduce the round-trip loss of a fiber loop probed by the BOTDR interrogator. Through a series of experiments, we demonstrate that our modified fiber artifact enables detailed characterization of BOTDR devices, allowing simultaneous assessment of distance-dependent spatial resolution, distance-dependent measurement biases, and system configuration anomalies. Our approach, which can be readily extended to other distributed optical fiber sensing modalities, provides a practical method for validating and benchmarking device performance.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 用于改进布里渊 OTDR 系统性能评估的有源光纤环路方法
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>我们报告了一种新的光纤测量工件，用于评估布里渊光时域反射计 (BOTDR) 设备的性能。在我们提出的配置中，采用快速光开关来显着降低 BOTDR 询问器探测的光纤环路的往返损耗。通过一系列实验，我们证明了我们改进的光纤工件可以对 BOTDR 设备进行详细表征，从而可以同时评估距离相关的空间分辨率、距离相关的测量偏差和系统配置异常。我们的方法可以很容易地扩展到其他分布式光纤传感模式，为验证和基准测试设备性能提供了一种实用的方法。</jats:p>

data.title: High-efficiency terahertz beam scanning based on topologically optimized freestanding metasurfaces
data.author: Qifan Ding, Jieyang Tang, Jierong Cheng, Shengjiang Chang
data.summary: <jats:p>Dynamic beam scanning is an indispensable technique in the terahertz band, as the terahertz radiation is highly directive to accommodate the path attenuation. Bi-layer passive metasurfaces offer a promising way to tune the beam direction through in-plane relative twisting. However, the energy efficiency is limited due to the doubled insertion loss from two metasurfaces, and the efficiency is unstable during scanning due to the diffraction sensitivity to the metasurface orientation. Here, we propose a pair of metasurfaces to address the efficiency issue through topological optimization and removal of the substrate for better impedance matching. The freeform and freestanding metasurfaces are rotated to generate various moiré patterns and scan the beam within ±55° field of view without apparent sidelobes. The average energy efficiency is 57% with efficiency fluctuation within 13%. The proposed metasurfaces hold broad application prospects in next-generation wireless communication technologies.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 基于拓扑优化独立式超表面的高效太赫兹光束扫描
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>动态光束扫描是太赫兹频段不可或缺的技术，因为太赫兹辐射具有高度定向性以适应路径衰减。双层无源超表面提供了一种通过面内相对扭曲来调整光束方向的有前途的方法。然而，由于两个超表面的双倍插入损耗，能量效率受到限制，并且由于对超表面方向的衍射敏感性，扫描过程中效率不稳定。在这里，我们提出了一对超表面，通过拓扑优化和去除基板以获得更好的阻抗匹配来解决效率问题。自由形式和独立式超表面旋转以生成各种莫尔图案，并在 ±55° 视场内扫描光束，没有明显的旁瓣。平均能源效率为57%，效率波动在13%以内。所提出的超表面在下一代无线通信技术中具有广阔的应用前景。</jats:p>

data.title: Elliptically polarized light obtained from tilted high-contrast grating VCSELs
data.author: Valerio Torrelli, Martino D’Alessandro, Alberto Gullino, Matteo G. C. Alasio, Alberto Tibaldi, Connie Chang-Hasnain, Pierluigi Debernardi
data.summary: <jats:p>We show that ultrathin elliptically polarized VCSELs can be realized with standard high-contrast gratings (HCGs) whose bars are tilted to the semiconductor crystalline axes on the transverse plane, without relying on any 2D chiral layer. Revisiting orthogonal polarization suppression ratio (OPSR) measurements, we demonstrate that the reduced OPSR for tilted gratings is related to elliptical lasing polarization rather than degraded polarization selectivity. Simulations confirm that the polarization state can be tuned by balancing intrinsic and HCG-induced anisotropies. These devices provide integrated elliptically polarized and wavelength-tunable sources for chip-scale atomic devices.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 从倾斜高对比度光栅 VCSEL 获得的椭圆偏振光
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>我们证明，超薄椭圆偏振 VCSEL 可以使用标准高对比度光栅 (HCG) 来实现，HCG 的栅条在横向平面上与半导体晶轴倾斜，而不依赖于任何 2D 手性层。重新审视正交偏振抑制比 (OPSR) 测量，我们证明倾斜光栅的 OPSR 降低与椭圆激光偏振有关，而不是与偏振选择性下降有关。模拟证实，可以通过平衡固有各向异性和 HCG 引起的各向异性来调节偏振态。这些器件为芯片级原子器件提供集成椭圆偏振和波长可调光源。</jats:p>

data.title: Deep learning for optical misalignment diagnostics in multi-lens imaging systems
data.author: Tomer Slor, Dean Oren, Shira Baneth, Tom Coen, Haim Suchowski
data.summary:
<jats:p>
                    In the rapidly evolving field of optical engineering, precise alignment
					of multi-lens imaging systems is critical yet challenging, as even
					minor misalignments can significantly degrade performance. Traditional
					alignment methods rely on specialized equipment and are time-consuming
					processes, highlighting the need for automated and scalable solutions.
					We present two complementary deep learning-based inverse-design
					methods for diagnosing misalignments in multi-element lens systems
					using only optical measurements. First, we use ray-traced spot
					diagrams to predict five-degree-of-freedom (5-DOF) errors in a 6-lens
					photographic prime, achieving a mean absolute error of 0.031 mm in
					lateral translation and 0.011
                    <jats:sup>∘</jats:sup>
                    in tilt. We also introduce a
					physics-based simulation pipeline that utilizes grayscale synthetic
					camera images, enabling a deep learning model to estimate 4-DOF,
					decenter, and tilt errors in both two- and six-lens multi-lens
					systems. These results show the potential to reshape manufacturing and
					quality control in precision imaging.
                  </jats:p>
data.title_cn: 多镜头成像系统中光学失准诊断的深度学习
data.abstract_cn:
<贾茨：p>
                    在快速发展的光学工程领域，精确对准
					多镜头成像系统的研究至关重要但又具有挑战性，因为即使
					轻微的错位会显着降低性能。传统
					对准方法依赖专用设备且耗时
					流程，突出了对自动化和可扩展解决方案的需求。
					我们提出了两种互补的基于深度学习的逆向设计
					诊断多元件透镜系统失准的方法
					仅使用光学测量。首先，我们使用光线追踪点
					预测 6 镜头中五自由度 (5-DOF) 误差的图表
					摄影定焦，平均绝对误差为 0.031 毫米
					横向平移和0.011
                    <贾茨：sup>∘</贾茨：sup>
                    处于倾斜状态。我们还介绍一个
					利用灰度合成的基于物理的模拟管道
					相机图像，使深度学习模型能够估计 4-DOF，
					两镜头和六镜头多镜头中的偏心和倾斜误差
					系统。这些结果显示了重塑制造业的潜力
					精密成像的质量控制。
                  </贾茨：p>

data.title: Light shift suppression in a CPT magnetometer using linear polarization and double frequency interrogation
data.author: M. A. Maldonado, Yang Li, James A. McKelvy, Andrey Matsko, Irina Novikova, Eugeniy E. Mikhailov, John Kitching, Ying-Ju Wang
data.summary: <jats:p>We demonstrate a suppression of the light shift in a Coherent-Population-Trapping (CPT) atomic magnetometer by using linearly polarized light and a differential measurement between magnetic resonances. The radio frequency that creates the optical sidebands for CPT quickly switches between two magnetic sensitive transitions, and the magnetic field is extrapolated from the difference of the center frequencies of the magnetic resonances. Light shifts and common drifts like collisional shifts can be suppressed through careful choice of measured resonances, and we show the light shift reduction by more than a factor of 20 compared to excitation with circularly-polarized light. Various limitations of the method are discussed.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 使用线性偏振和双频询问的 CPT 磁力计中的光移抑制
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>我们通过使用线偏振光和磁共振之间的差分测量来证明相干粒子捕获（CPT）原子磁力计中光位移的抑制。为 CPT 创建光学边带的射频在两个磁敏感跃迁之间快速切换，并且根据磁共振中心频率的差异推断出磁场。通过仔细选择测量的共振，可以抑制光位移和常见漂移（例如碰撞位移），并且我们发现与圆偏振光激发相比，光位移减少了 20 倍以上。讨论了该方法的各种局限性。</jats:p>

data.title: Ranging beyond synthetic wavelengths with an undersampled spectral signal using tunable wavelength laser interferometry
data.author: P. Harikrishnan, Dinesh N. Naik
data.summary: <jats:p>Range extension achieved beyond the longest synthetic wavelength is possible by continuous tuning of the source wavelength and with the use of tilted interference for excess fraction extraction from a spectrally undersampled signal. This allows for the unique measurement of the extended range. For a correctly assumed fringe order for the initial source wavelength, the non-divergence of the estimated range as a function of wavelength tuning provides the potential range locations. These are further zeroed in by repeating the analysis by varying the tuning steps. A cascaded Michelson interferometer is used to uniquely measure the extended range as well as the spatial profile of the sample from a single set of wavelength scan. The excess fraction is accurately measured using the Fourier transform method of fringe analysis by virtue of tilted interference. With the support of sub-nanometer resolution in wavelength tuning, precise centimeter-scale ranging, along with micrometer-level profile resolution, is achieved.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 使用可调谐波长激光干涉测量法，通过欠采样光谱信号超越合成波长
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>通过连续调谐光源波长并使用倾斜干涉从光谱欠采样信号中提取多余部分，可以实现超出最长合成波长的范围扩展。这允许对扩展范围进行独特的测量。对于正确假设的初始源波长的条纹阶数，作为波长调谐函数的估计范围的不发散提供了潜在的范围位置。通过改变调整步骤重复分析，可以进一步将这些归零。级联迈克尔逊干涉仪用于通过单组波长扫描独特地测量扩展范围以及样品的空间轮廓。利用条纹分析的傅立叶变换方法，利用倾斜干涉，精确测量过量部分。在波长调谐的亚纳米分辨率的支持下，可以实现厘米级的精确测距以及微米级的轮廓分辨率。</jats:p>

data.title: Long-period grating on thin-film lithium-niobate waveguide for polarization mode conversion
data.author: Mengke Wang, Wei Jin, Kaixin Chen, Kin Seng Chiang
data.summary:
<jats:p>
                    We design and fabricate a long-period grating (LPG) on a thin-film lithium-niobate (TFLN) rib waveguide for achieving effective conversion between two orthogonally polarized modes. Our experimental device, which employs a 330-µm long dual SiO
                    <jats:sub>2</jats:sub>
                    grating structure, achieves a mode conversion efficiency of ~99% at 1550 nm with a 10-dB bandwidth of ~20 nm, in good agreement with our theoretical results. This compact polarization mode converter, or polarization rotator, can serve as a basic component in TFLN-based photonic circuits. Our study extends the conventional functions of LPGs as mode converters for the same polarization and thus opens up new possibilities in the development of polarization-controlling devices for applications in high-density integrated photonics.
                  </jats:p>
data.title_cn: 用于偏振模式转换的薄膜铌酸锂波导上的长周期光栅
data.abstract_cn:
<贾茨：p>
                    我们在薄膜铌酸锂（TFLN）肋波导上设计并制造了长周期光栅（LPG），以实现两种正交偏振模式之间的有效转换。我们的实验装置采用 330 µm 长的双 SiO2
                    <贾茨：子>2</贾茨：子>
                    光栅结构，在 1550 nm 处实现了约 99% 的模式转换效率，10 dB 带宽为约 20 nm，与我们的理论结果非常吻合。这种紧凑型偏振模式转换器或偏振旋转器可用作基于 TFLN 的光子电路中的基本组件。我们的研究扩展了LPG作为相同偏振模式转换器的传统功能，从而为开发用于高密度集成光子学应用的偏振控制器件开辟了新的可能性。
                  </贾茨：p>

data.title:
Coupled plasmonic-passivation luminescence enhancement in InGaN quantum
				wells with Ag/AlN capping
data.author: David S. Pate, Joshua N. Blum, Iftikhar Ahmad, Vitaliy Avrutin, Ümit Özgür
data.summary:
<jats:p>Ag/AlN is investigated as an advantageous metal/dielectric combination
					for enhancing the radiative efficiency of InGaN multi-quantum well
					(MQW) structures via both passivation and plasmonic mechanisms.
					Steady-state and time-resolved photoluminescence (PL) measurements
					facilitate separation of these coupled effects, demonstrating almost
					complete elimination of parasitic recombination channels via
					AlN-related surface passivation alone. In agreement with theory, an
					additional Ag layer yields PL enhancements of 7.0–8.3× in the top QW
					closest to the plasmonic metal interface, with progressive reduction
					in deeper QWs. The high passivation efficiency of even thin AlN
					enables close proximity of the plasmonic layer and MQW active region,
					with increased spontaneous emission rates as high as 8.1× resulting
					from strengthened resonant coupling to Ag surface plasmons.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: Ag/AlN 封盖的 InGaN 量子阱中的耦合等离子体钝化发光增强
data.abstract_cn:
<jats:p>Ag/AlN 作为一种有利的金属/电介质组合进行了研究
					用于提高InGaN多量子阱的辐射效率
					（MQW）结构通过钝化和等离子体机制。
					稳态和时间分辨光致发光 (PL) 测量
					促进这些耦合效应的分离，证明几乎
					完全消除寄生重组通道
					仅与 AlN 相关的表面钝化。与理论一致，
					额外的 Ag 层使顶部 QW 的 PL 增强 7.0–8.3 倍
					最接近等离子体金属界面，逐渐还原
					在更深的量子阱中。即使很薄的 AlN 也能实现高钝化效率
					使等离激元层和 MQW 有源区域非常接近，
					自发发射率高达 8.1×
					来自与银表面等离子体激元的强化共振耦合。</jats:p>

data.title: Tunable 300 W single-frequency 2 μm fiber amplifier
data.author: Reagan R. D. Weeks, Ryan A. Lane, Brian M. Anderson
data.summary:
<jats:p>
                    We present an all-fiber design for a Tm-based fiber amplifier that can
					tune over 1992–2065 nm with 300–350 W single-frequency (<100 kHz)
					output. Over 180 W is achieved out to 2085 nm with <10% ASE content
					without utilizing ASE spectral filters. The amplifier employs both Tm-
					and Tm/Ho-doped gain fibers in two preamplifier stages in addition to
					longer sections of Tm fiber to extend the bandwidth of the Tm-based
					high-power amplifier to longer wavelengths (>2050 nm). Efficiencies
					of ∼55% are realized across the full
					bandwidth. Roll-off occurs beyond 2085 nm where ASE becomes
					intractable. The amplifier has an average M
                    <jats:sup>2</jats:sup>
                    value of 1.39 at high power due to
					the presence of light guided within the fiber pedestal. Estimates of
					the pedestal light and higher-order mode contents are provided.
                  </jats:p>

data.title: Programmable solvent-responsive PDMS microstructures via 3D direct laser writing
data.author: Qingbo Jiao, Yimin Zhang, Wenbo Wang, Ge Jiang, Wei Wang, Mengdan Qian
data.summary: <jats:p>This study addresses the three-dimensional (3D) fabrication of polydimethylsiloxane (PDMS) for intelligent micromechanical systems through a novel PDMS-based photoresist compatible with two-photon polymerization (2PP). By optimizing a 2PP system, photosensitivity and processability were significantly enhanced, enabling complex 3D structures with sub-micron precision. Using programmable 2PP direct laser writing (DLW) and by controlling the processing parameters and scanning strategies, we established a quantitative model for structural fidelity and achieved spatial control over the crosslinking density. Thus, solvent-responsive components used for encrypted micropillar arrays and smart microvalves were successfully fabricated, demonstrating the precise and controllable deformation upon solvent stimulation. Excellent cytocompatibility is also confirmed by biocompatibility tests. This research breaks through conventional PDMS microfabrication limitations, providing innovative material solutions and processing pathways for intelligent micro-systems in soft robotics and biomedical fields.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 通过 3D 直接激光写入可编程溶剂响应 PDMS 微结构
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>这项研究通过与双光子聚合 (2PP) 兼容的新型基于 PDMS 的光致抗蚀剂，解决了用于智能微机械系统的聚二甲基硅氧烷 (PDMS) 的三维 (3D) 制造问题。通过优化 2PP 系统，光敏性和可加工性显着增强，从而实现亚微米精度的复杂 3D 结构。使用可编程2PP直接激光写入（DLW）并通过控制加工参数和扫描策略，我们建立了结构保真度的定量模型并实现了交联密度的空间控制。因此，成功制造了用于加密微柱阵列和智能微阀的溶剂响应组件，展示了溶剂刺激时精确且可控的变形。生物相容性测试也证实了优异的细胞相容性。该研究突破了传统PDMS微加工的局限性，为软体机器人和生物医学领域的智能微系统提供了创新的材料解决方案和加工途径。</jats:p>

data.title: Incidence-insensitive freeform reflector for arbitrary distributions
data.author: Fuxu Wang, Qiankun Wang, Hengyang Li, Yulong Zhang, Xiahui Tang, Gang Xu, Yingxiong Qin
data.summary: <jats:p>Freeform surfaces enable the transformation of a given light source into an arbitrarily specified intensity distribution. However, conventional designs, typically based on mappings between predefined sources and targets, exhibit high sensitivity to slight variations in the incident profile, thereby limiting their practical applicability. Here, we propose an integration-based freeform reflector design method that eliminates the requirement for prior incident specifications. The global freeform is composed of multiple sub-regions with original or flip-symmetry optimal-transmission mappings, constrained by the area-preserving principle through grid distortion. The boundaries of each sub-region exhibit curved features, ensuring <jats:italic>C</jats:italic><jats:sup>1</jats:sup>-continuity across the entire surface. In contrast to conventional methods, our generated surface demonstrates excellent tolerance to changes in beam size, geometry, energy distribution, and wavelength. The mean relative error remains around 0.17 under diverse input conditions, indicating close agreement with the target distribution. Additionally, the smoothness of the surface enhances manufacturability and enables it to withstand higher input power with minimal output loss. Our work bridges the gap between theoretical design and practical deployment, facilitating its adoption in illumination and high-power laser systems and opening, to our knowledge, new directions in beam-shaping research.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 适用于任意分布的入射不敏感自由形状反射器
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>自由曲面可以将给定光源转换为任意指定的强度分布。然而，传统的设计通常基于预定义的源和目标之间的映射，对事件轮廓的微小变化表现出高敏感性，从而限制了它们的实际适用性。在这里，我们提出了一种基于集成的自由形状反射器设计方法，消除了对先前事件规范的要求。全局自由形式由具有原始或翻转对称最优传输映射的多个子区域组成，通过网格畸变受到面积保留原则的约束。每个子区域的边界呈现弯曲特征，确保<jats:italic>C</jats:italic><jats:sup>1</jats:sup>在整个表面上的连续性。与传统方法相比，我们生成的表面对光束尺寸、几何形状、能量分布和波长的变化表现出出色的耐受性。在不同的输入条件下，平均相对误差保持在 0.17 左右，表明与目标分布非常一致。此外，表面的光滑度提高了可制造性，使其能够以最小的输出损耗承受更高的输入功率。我们的工作弥合了理论设计和实际部署之间的差距，促进其在照明和高功率激光系统中的采用，并据我们所知，开辟了光束整形研究的新方向。</jats:p>

data.title: Photonic logic tensor computing beyond Tbit/s per core
data.author: Wenkai Zhang, Bo Wu, Wentao Gu, Hailong Zhou, Weida Hu, Ting He, Liao Chen, Wenchan Dong, Dongmei Huang, Yang Zhao, Wei Wang, Naidi Cui, Qiansheng Wang, Xi Xiao, Jianji Dong, Xinliang Zhang
data.summary: <jats:p>The soaring demand for computing resources has spurred great interest in photonic computing with higher speed and larger computing capacity. Photonic logic gates are of crucial importance due to the fundamental role of Boolean logic in modern digital computing systems. However, most photonic logic schemes struggle to exhibit the capability of massively parallel processing and flexible reconfiguration, owing to weak and fixed nonlinearity in optical elements. Here, we propose a photonic logic tensor computing architecture for the first time and fabricate the photonic universal logic tensor core (PULTC) with a parallel logic computing capacity beyond Tbit/s. Ten wavelength channels and four spatial channels are designed in the PULTC, where the logic computing speed in each channel can reach 50 Gbit/s. After the nonlinear mapping of microring modulators, arbitrary logic operations can be achieved by configuring the Mach–Zehnder interferometer mesh. We further develop a photonic logic tensor card and demonstrate various functions including cellular automata, image encryption and decryption, and image edge extraction. Our work offers an innovative route for photonic universal logic computing with high-parallel capability and propels the practical applications of photonic logic computing.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 每核光子逻辑张量计算超过 Tbit/s
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>对计算资源的飙升需求激发了人们对更高速度和更大计算能力的光子计算的极大兴趣。由于布尔逻辑在现代数字计算系统中的基本作用，光子逻辑门至关重要。然而，由于光学元件的非线性较弱且固定，大多数光子逻辑方案难以展现大规模并行处理和灵活重构的能力。在这里，我们首次提出了光子逻辑张量计算架构，并制造了并行逻辑计算能力超过Tbit/s的光子通用逻辑张量核心（PULTC）。 PULTC中设计了10个波长通道和4个空间通道，每个通道的逻辑计算速度可以达到50 Gbit/s。微环调制器进行非线性映射后，可以通过配置马赫-曾德尔干涉仪网格来实现任意逻辑运算。我们进一步开发了光子逻辑张量卡并演示了各种功能，包括元胞自动机、图像加密和解密以及图像边缘提取。我们的工作为具有高并行能力的光子通用逻辑计算提供了一条创新途径，推动了光子逻辑计算的实际应用。</jats:p>

data.title: Statistically stationary random light for high-security encryption
data.author: Shuqin Lin, Xinlei Zhu, Yijie Shen, Fei Wang, Xianfeng Chen, Greg Gbur, Yangjian Cai, Jiayi Yu
data.summary: <jats:p>In the modern landscape of the internet, the secure storage and transmission of information are key objectives. Optical encryption is a long-standing method for improving information security; however, existing optical encryption strategies are unable to reliably recover encrypted information following free-space transmission. We propose an encryption protocol that utilizes the statistical features of random light fields to overcome the limitations of existing approaches. This protocol entails continuously refreshing the white complex noise to generate a colored complex noise set that carries encrypted information. Users can recover information by determining the spatial coherence structure of the ciphertext at the receiving end. Furthermore, the proposed protocol exhibits resilience against external noise attacks within the transmission channel, and the protocol’s unlimited key set makes it resistant to computer brute-force attacks. We hope that optical coherence engineering will extend the capabilities of existing optical encryption protocols, paving the way for future optical encryption technology.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 用于高安全性加密的统计平稳随机光
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>在现代互联网环境中，信息的安全存储和传输是关键目标。光加密是一种由来已久的提高信息安全的方法；然而，现有的光学加密策略无法可靠地恢复自由空间传输后的加密信息。我们提出了一种利用随机光场的统计特征来克服现有方法的局限性的加密协议。该协议需要不断刷新白色复合噪声以生成携带加密信息的彩色复合噪声集。用户可以通过在接收端确定密文的空间相干结构来恢复信息。此外，所提出的协议对传输通道内的外部噪声攻击表现出弹性，并且该协议的无限密钥集使其能够抵抗计算机暴力攻击。我们希望光相干工程能够扩展现有光加密协议的功能，为未来的光加密技术铺平道路。</jats:p>

data.title: Ultralow-power single-pass all-optical photon router
data.author: Jérémy Berroir, Tridib Ray, Alban Urvoy, Julien Laurat
data.summary:
<jats:p>We demonstrate an approach for routing guided single photons by combining atom trapping
					and transverse light confinement with an optical nanofiber. The
					direction of photon propagation, either reflection or transmission, is
					controlled by a femtojoule-level beam.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 超低功耗单通全光光子路由器
data.abstract_cn:
<jats:p>我们展示了一种通过结合原子捕获来路由引导单光子的方法

data.title: Helfrich deformation-induced waveguide effect and Bragg band dynamics in cholesteric liquid crystals
data.author: Chi-Tang Huang, Pravinraj Selvaraj, Su-Hui Cheng, Ko-Ting Cheng
data.summary: <jats:p>Self-assembled architectures in soft matter, such as cholesteric liquid crystals, exhibit remarkable optical and photonic properties, which facilitate the advanced manipulation of polarization, phase, and orbital angular momentum. Cholesteric liquid crystal materials are highly responsive to external stimuli and can undergo various deformations, such as Helfrich deformation, focal conic structures, and heliconical structures, resulting in substantial optical modifications. Although previous studies have focused on spectral blue shifts in Bragg bands associated with the appearance of Helfrich deformation in cholesteric liquid crystal bulks, their interpretations often lack comprehensive scientific explanations for the diverse optical phenomena observed during deformation. Here, we reveal an optical phenomenon at the edges of Bragg transmittance and reflectance bands under Helfrich deformation. Simulation and experimental results show that the waveguide effect predominates the optical response during the initial deformation stage. These findings enhance our understanding of the intricate interplay between mechanical deformation and optical behavior in cholesteric liquid crystals, thereby advancing the knowledge of light–matter interactions in soft photonic systems.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 胆甾型液晶中 Helfrich 变形引起的波导效应和布拉格带动力学
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>软物质中的自组装结构，例如胆甾型液晶，表现出显着的光学和光子特性，这有助于对偏振、相位和轨道角动量的高级操纵。胆甾型液晶材料对外部刺激高度敏感，可以发生各种变形，例如赫尔弗里希变形、焦锥结构和螺旋结构，从而导致显着的光学修改。尽管先前的研究重点关注与胆甾型液晶块中赫尔弗里希变形的出现相关的布拉格带的光谱蓝移，但他们的解释往往缺乏对变形过程中观察到的各种光学现象的全面科学解释。在这里，我们揭示了赫尔弗里希变形下布拉格透射带和反射带边缘的光学现象。仿真和实验结果表明，波导效应在初始变形阶段的光学响应中占主导地位。这些发现增强了我们对胆甾型液晶中机械变形和光学行为之间复杂相互作用的理解，从而增进了对软光子系统中光与物质相互作用的认识。</jats:p>

data.title: Monolithic piezoelectrically tunable hybrid integrated laser with sub-fiber laser coherence
data.author: Andrey S. Voloshin, Alaina Attanasio, Anat Siddharth, Simone Bianconi, Andrea Bancora, Vladimir Shadymov, Sebastien Leni, Rui Ning Wang, Johann Riemensberger, Sunil A. Bhave, Tobias J. Kippenberg
data.summary:
<jats:p>Ultra-low noise lasers are
essential tools in various applications, including data communication,
light detection and ranging (LiDAR), quantum computing and sensing,
and optical metrology. Recent advances in integrated photonics,
specifically the development of the ultra-low loss silicon nitride ($Si<jats:sub>3</jats:sub>N<jats:sub>4</jats:sub>$) platform, have allowed attaining
performance that exceeds conventional legacy laser systems, including
the phase noise of fiber lasers. This platform can be combined with
the monolithic integration of piezoelectric materials, enabling
frequency-agile low-noise lasers. However, this approach has not yet
surpassed the trade-off between ultra-low frequency noise and
frequency agility. Here, we overcome this challenge and demonstrate a
fully integrated laser based on the $Si<jats:sub>3</jats:sub>N<jats:sub>4</jats:sub>$ platform with frequency noise lower
than that of a fiber laser while maintaining the capability for
high-speed modulation of the laser frequency. The laser achieves an
output power of 30 mW with an integrated linewidth of
4.3 kHz and an intrinsic linewidth of 3 Hz,
demonstrating phase noise performance that is on par with or lower
than commercial fiber lasers. Frequency agility is accomplished via a
monolithically integrated piezoelectric aluminum nitride
micro-electro-mechanical system (MEMS) actuator, which enables a flat
frequency actuation bandwidth extending up to 400 kHz. Such a
MEMS device is one of the largest fabricated structures, featuring
MHz-level bandwidth, which is significantly higher than the typical
kHz-level bandwidth of similarly sized mm-scale MEMS devices. The
chirp nonlinearity of the frequency-modulated output reaches 0.08%
without any linearization or pre-distortion, making it compliant with
the requirement for long-range FMCW LiDAR. This ultra-low noise and
frequency-agility combination is a useful feature enabling tight laser
locking for frequency metrology, fiber sensing, and coherent sensing
applications. Our results demonstrate the ability of “next generation”
integrated photonic circuits (beyond silicon) to exceed the
performance of legacy laser systems in terms of coherence and
frequency actuation.</jats:p>

data.title: High-speed 3D imaging with a 25-camera multifocus microscope
data.author: Eduardo Hirata Miyasaki, Antone A. Bajor, Gustav M. Pettersson, Maximilian L. Senftleben, Kaitlyn E. Fouke, Thomas G. W. Graham, Demis D. John, Jennifer R. Morgan, Gal Haspel, Sara Abrahamsson
data.summary:
<jats:p>
                    High-speed volumetric imaging of whole-organism dynamics is often
					constrained by trade-offs between speed, resolution, and imaging
					depth. We present the M25 microscope, a 25-camera-array,
					aberration-corrected refocusing multifocus imaging system that
					captures 3D volumes simultaneously across 25 focal planes using a
					synchronized array of machine-vision cameras. Each camera incorporates
					a custom-blazed grating to correct chromatic dispersion, enabling a
					simplified, sensitive, and scalable multifocus setup for large fields
					of view while maintaining high spatial resolution across the imaging
					volume. M25 achieves imaging speeds of >100 volumes per second over imaging
					volumes of . This method enables both
					noninvasive, label-free brightfield and highly sensitive fluorescence
					imaging. We demonstrate its capabilities in 3D particle tracking,
					fluorescent and brightfield imaging of
                    <jats:italic toggle="yes">D.
					melanogaster</jats:italic>
                    larval dynamics, and
                    <jats:italic toggle="yes">C.
					elegans</jats:italic>
                    locomotion and neural activity. This method enables
					fast and sensitive 3D imaging for biological studies and has potential
					applications across a broad range of diffractive imaging
					modalities.
                  </jats:p>

data.title: Role of atomic electronic structure defects  in initiating laser-induced modification and failure of brittle-hard fused silica optics
data.author: Dinghuai Yang, Zhichao Liu, Linjie Zhao, Jian Cheng, Mingjun Chen, Shengfei Wang, Feng Geng, Yazhou Sun, Qiao Xu
data.summary: <jats:p>Laser-induced modification and failure are prone to occur on fused silica surfaces, seriously restricting their high-performance applications. However, it remains challenging to predict where and which type of damage would occur under specific laser conditions since the dominant traceable micro-structures in fused silica and corresponding influencing mechanisms have not been determined. It hinders effective solutions for damage issues. Herein, the damage and steady-state photoluminescence features of fused silica were explored to determine the dominant micro-structures. Furthermore, the influence mechanisms of these micro-structures under laser irradiation were studied based on the developed electron-transition and particle-in-cell plasma simulation models. It was, to our knowledge, first found that the electronic structure defects could govern the occurrence and types of laser-induced modification/failure. Accordingly, a non-destructive modification/failure prediction strategy based on steady-state photoluminescence detection was first proposed, whose accuracy was more than 90%. Furthermore, it was found that the initial electronic structure defects and laser intensities jointly determine the steady-state free-electron densities. Two vital intrinsic critical free-electron densities were found and defined (“first” and “second” free-electron densities). We found that the initial electronic defects could only induce defect “slow proliferation” as the steady-state free-electron density is smaller than the first critical value. The stress-induced damage could be induced when the steady-state free-electron density reaches the first critical value. The plasma ablative damage would be caused as the steady-state free-electron density reaches the second critical value. This work is meaningful for addressing the laser-induced damage issues of fused silica and other similar silicate glass, which could promote their application in intense-laser fields.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 原子电子结构缺陷在引发激光诱导脆硬熔融石英光学器件的改性和失效中的作用
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>熔融石英表面容易发生激光诱导的改性和失效，严重限制了其高性能应用。然而，由于熔融石英中主要的可追踪微结构和相应的影响机制尚未确定，预测在特定激光条件下会在何处以及哪种类型的损伤发生仍然具有挑战性。它阻碍了损害问题的有效解决。在此，探索了熔融石英的损伤和稳态光致发光特征，以确定主要的微观结构。此外，基于所开发的电子跃迁和细胞内粒子等离子体模拟模型，研究了激光照射下这些微结构的影响机制。据我们所知，首次发现电子结构缺陷可以控制激光引起的修改/失效的发生和类型。据此，首次提出了基于稳态光致发光检测的无损修改/失效预测策略，其准确率达到90%以上。此外，还发现初始电子结构缺陷和激光强度共同决定稳态自由电子密度。发现并定义了两个重要的固有临界自由电子密度（“第一”和“第二”自由电子密度）。我们发现，当稳态自由电子密度小于第一临界值时，初始电子缺陷只能引起缺陷“缓慢扩散”。当稳态自由电子密度达到第一临界值时，就会引起应力诱导损伤。当稳态自由电子密度达到第二临界值时，就会引起等离子体烧蚀损伤。该工作对于解决熔融石英和其他类似硅酸盐玻璃的激光损伤问题具有重要意义，可促进其在强激光领域的应用。</jats:p>

data.title: Transportable single-crystal silicon ultra-stable cavity toward space applications
data.author: Xian-Qing Zhu, Xiao-Min Zhai, Yong Xie, Yuan Miao, Hai-Wei Yu, De-Quan Kong, Wen-Lan Song, Yi-Wen Zhang, Yi Hu, Xing-Yang Cui, Xiao Jiang, Bao-Yu Yang, Jian-Jun Jia, Juan Yin, Sheng-Kai Liao, Rong Shu, Cheng-Zhi Peng, Ping Xu, Han-Ning Dai, Yu-Ao Chen, Jian-Wei Pan
data.summary: <jats:p>Ultra-stable lasers with extremely low-frequency noise are essential for space-based precision metrology. Transportable single-crystal silicon optical reference cavities offer lower thermal noise floors in compact volumes, making them ideal candidates for ultra-stable lasers deployed in space. However, achieving low vibration sensitivity in transportable designs remains challenging due to the anisotropic mechanical properties of silicon. In this work, we present a finite element method (FEM) optimized design for transportable single-crystal silicon cavities, featuring a 112.5 mm long spacer supported by an Invar six-point mounting frame, and a predicted thermal noise floor of 8.9×10<jats:sup>−17</jats:sup>. The assembly successfully withstood in-vehicle transportation and cryogenic thermal cycling tests. Moreover, we have established an ultra-stable laser system based on the cavity operating at 124 K, experimentally measured its total vibration sensitivity of 4.9(1)×10<jats:sup>−10</jats:sup>/g, and estimated the fractional frequency instability of 4×10<jats:sup>−16</jats:sup> for averaging times ranging from 0.5 to 100 s. These results demonstrate that our cavity design takes the first step in the way for future ultra-stable lasers for space-based precision metrology and fundamental physics experiments.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 可移动单晶硅超稳定腔面向太空应用
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>具有极低频噪声的超稳定激光器对于天基精密计量至关重要。可移动的单晶硅光学参考腔在紧凑的体积中提供较低的热噪声本底，使其成为在太空中部署的超稳定激光器的理想选择。然而，由于硅的各向异性机械特性，在可运输设计中实现低振动灵敏度仍然具有挑战性。在这项工作中，我们提出了一种针对可移动单晶硅腔的有限元法 (FEM) 优化设计，其特点是由 Invar 六点安装框架支撑的 112.5 毫米长垫片，以及预测的热噪声本底为 8.9×10<jats:sup>−17</jat:sup>。该组件成功地经受了车内运输和低温热循环测试。此外，我们还建立了基于124 K工作腔的超稳定激光系统，通过实验测量其总振动灵敏度为4.9(1)×10<jat:sup>−10</jat:sup>/g，并估计平均时间范围为0.5至100 s的分数频率不稳定性为4×10<jat:sup>−16</jat:sup>。这些结果表明，我们的腔体设计为未来用于天基精密计量和基础物理实验的超稳定激光器迈出了第一步。</jats:p>

data.title: Photonic origami of silica on a silicon chip with microresonators and concave mirrors
data.author: Manya Malhotra, Ronen Ben-Daniel, Fan Cheng, Tal Carmon
data.summary: <jats:p>A 3D printing of high-quality silica photonic structures is particularly challenging, as surface roughness at the nanoscale can severely degrade optical performance through scattering losses. Here, we develop a technique to fold ultrasmooth silica on silicon chips into such desired 3D structures. A laser-induced, surface-tension-driven method achieves folding with 20 nm alignment accuracy, enabling origami-like polylines and helices with integrated 0.5 nm smooth photonic devices. The technique allows for the fabrication of record length-to-thickness ratio structures, incorporating concave micromirrors with a numerical aperture of 0.41 and microresonators with quality factors exceeding 8×10<jats:sup>6</jats:sup>. This on-chip silica origami approach offers a pathway to transform planar electro-opto-mechanical circuits into high-quality 3D configurations.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 带有微谐振器和凹面镜的硅芯片上的二氧化硅光子折纸
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>高质量二氧化硅光子结构的 3D 打印尤其具有挑战性，因为纳米级的表面粗糙度会通过散射损失严重降低光学性能。在这里，我们开发了一种技术，可将硅芯片上的超光滑二氧化硅折叠成所需的 3D 结构。激光诱导、表面张力驱动的方法实现了 20 nm 对准精度的折叠，通过集成的 0.5 nm 光滑光子器件实现类似折纸的折线和螺旋。该技术可以制造创纪录的长度与厚度比的结构，结合数值孔径为0.41的凹面微镜和品质因数超过8×10<jats:sup>6</jats:sup>的微谐振器。这种片上二氧化硅折纸方法提供了将平面光电机械电路转变为高质量 3D 配置的途径。</jats:p>

data.title: Vibrational photothermal imaging: theory, instrumentation, and applications
data.author: Jiaze Yin, Pin-Tian Lyu, Rylie Bolarinho, Yifan Zhu, Xiaowei Ge, Hongli Ni, Ji-Xin Cheng
data.summary: <jats:p>Optical spectroscopic imaging is vital in biophotonics and materials science, yet achieving label-free, high-sensitivity molecular imaging remains a significant challenge. Vibrational photothermal microscopy has emerged as a high-sensitivity label-free approach. By measuring the heat generated during the nonradiative relaxation of vibrationally excited molecules, vibrational photothermal microscopy has achieved micromolar detection sensitivity. Recent advancements in mid-infrared excitation have driven rapid progress in this field by enabling submicron-resolution chemical bond imaging. This review discusses the theoretical principles, contrast mechanisms, and instrumentation strategies of mid-infrared photothermal microscopy and introduces other emerging techniques in the vibrational photothermal microscopy family. Broad applications as a versatile chemical imaging tool are summarized.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 振动光热成像：理论、仪器和应用
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>光学光谱成像在生物光子学和材料科学中至关重要，但实现无标记、高灵敏度分子成像仍然是一个重大挑战。振动光热显微镜已成为一种高灵敏度无标记方法。通过测量振动激发分子非辐射弛豫过程中产生的热量，振动光热显微镜已经实现了微摩尔检测灵敏度。中红外激发的最新进展通过实现亚微米分辨率的化学键成像推动了该领域的快速进展。本综述讨论了中红外光热显微镜的理论原理、对比机制和仪器策略，并介绍了振动光热显微镜家族中的其他新兴技术。总结了作为多功能化学成像工具的广泛应用。</jats:p>

data.title: High-gain optical parametric amplification with a continuous-wave pump using a domain-engineered thin-film lithium niobate waveguide
data.author: Mengwen Chen, Chenyu Wang, Kunpeng Jia, Xiao-Hui Tian, Jie Tang, Chunxi Zhu, Xiaowen Gu, Zexing Zhao, Zikang Wang, Zhilin Ye, Ji Tang, Yong Zhang, Zhong Yan, Xuewen Wang, Guang Qian, Biaobing Jin, Zhenlin Wang, Shi-Ning Zhu, Zhenda Xie
data.summary: <jats:p>While thin-film lithium niobate (TFLN) is known for efficient signal generation, on-chip signal amplification remains challenging from fully integrated optical communication circuits. Here we demonstrate the continuous-wave-pump optical parametric amplification (OPA) using an x-cut domain-engineered TFLN waveguide, with high gain over the telecom band up to 13.9 dB, and test it for high signal-to-noise ratio signal amplification using a commercial optical communication module pair. Fabricated in wafer scale using a process that is common for devices including modulators, this OPA device marks an important step in TFLN photonic integration.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 使用域工程薄膜铌酸锂波导的连续波泵进行高增益光学参量放大
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>虽然薄膜铌酸锂 (TFLN) 以高效信号生成而闻名，但片上信号放大对于完全集成的光通信电路仍然具有挑战性。在这里，我们演示了使用 x 切域设计的 TFLN 波导的连续波泵光参量放大 (OPA)，在电信频段上具有高达 13.9 dB 的高增益，并使用商用光通信模块对对其进行高信噪比信号放大测试。该 OPA 器件采用调制器等器件常见的工艺进行晶圆级制造，标志着 TFLN 光子集成迈出了重要一步。</jats:p>

data.title: Dynamic focus metalens for adaptive beam power control in terahertz wireless communication and sensing
data.author: Adam Pander, Hibiki Kagami, Daisuke Kitayama, Hiroshi Hamada, Hiroyuki Takahashi
data.summary: <jats:p>Terahertz waves from 0.1 to 0.5 THz are promising candidates for high-speed, high-capacity wireless communication networks and high-resolution sensing applications; however, with the increase in operating frequency, atmospheric attenuation and free-space losses are significant issues to overcome. Commonly used dielectric and metasurface lenses have attracted considerable attention for the enhancement of beam power characteristics, but these solutions still lack the adjustability necessary for dynamic operation, which is necessary for the development of high-efficiency systems. Here, we present a 0.3 THz band adjustable focus lens that allows for dynamic control of the focal length and beam width in response to the operating conditions. The dynamic focus lens is based on a polarization-independent 3-layer ABA-type Jerusalem cross geometry, which allows for thinner, lightweight, and more efficient devices. In the experimental verification, we have confirmed that dynamic tuning of focus can provide over 10 dB (900%) power increase and a focal length tuning ratio of 1:22 (<jats:italic>f</jats:italic>=0.05−1.1m). We also confirmed that the lens can operate in a wide 40 GHz (0.28–0.32 THz) frequency range, which allowed for transmission data rates of over 123 Gbps, the highest ever achieved for metasurface devices in communication. This work will have a significant impact on the development of stable communication in future high-speed wireless networks operating in terahertz bands to adjust performance in response to environmental conditions. It will also support the further development of high-resolution imaging and sensing applications.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 用于太赫兹无线通信和传感中自适应光束功率控制的动态聚焦超透镜
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>0.1 至 0.5 THz 的太赫兹波是高速、大容量无线通信网络和高分辨率传感应用的有希望的候选者；然而，随着工作频率的增加，大气衰减和自由空间损失是需要克服的重大问题。常用的介电和超表面透镜因增强光束功率特性而引起了相当大的关注，但这些解决方案仍然缺乏动态操作所需的可调节性，而动态操作是开发高效系统所必需的。在这里，我们展示了一款 0.3 THz 波段可调焦镜头，可以根据操作条件动态控制焦距和光束宽度。动态聚焦镜头基于偏振无关的 3 层 ABA 型耶路撒冷十字几何结构，可实现更薄、更轻、更高效的设备。在实验验证中，我们已经证实动态焦点调节可以提供超过10 dB（900%）的功率提升和1:22的焦距调节比（<jats:italic>f</jats:italic>=0.05−1.1m）。我们还确认该透镜可以在 40 GHz（0.28-0.32 THz）的宽频率范围内运行，从而实现超过 123 Gbps 的传输数据速率，这是通信领域超表面设备所达到的最高速率。这项工作将对未来太赫兹频段高速无线网络稳定通信的发展产生重大影响，以根据环境条件调整性能。它还将支持高分辨率成像和传感应用的进一步开发。</jats:p>

data.title: Separable integrated frequency control of a microcomb
data.author: Jin-Yu Liu, Hao Tian, Qing-Xin Ji, Shuman Sun, Wei Zhang, Joel Guo, Warren Jin, John E. Bowers, Andrey B. Matsko, Mohammad Mirhosseini, Kerry J. Vahala
data.summary:
<jats:p>The revolutionary impact of optical
					frequency combs in fields as
					diverse as timekeeping and
					spectroscopy hinges on a way
					to independently control comb line spacing and spectral position.
					However, achieving such control in microcombs remains challenging. In
					this work, we demonstrate separable control of these parameters in a
					microcomb using a single integrated actuation mechanism. As a proof of
					concept, we fully frequency-lock a microcomb to a high-stability
					reference cavity and apply it to spectroscopy and microwave
					generation. This approach significantly simplifies the implementation
					of frequency-stabilized microcombs across a broad range of
					applications.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 微梳的可分离集成频率控制
data.abstract_cn:
<jats:p>光学的革命性影响
					场中的频率梳为
					计时和
					光谱学取决于某种方式
					独立控制梳状线间距和光谱位置。
					然而，在微梳中实现这种控制仍然具有挑战性。在
					在这项工作中，我们演示了对这些参数的单独控制
					使用单一集成驱动机构的微梳。作为证明
					概念，我们将微梳完全频率锁定到高稳定性
					参考腔并将其应用于光谱和微波
					一代。这种方法显着简化了实施
					频率稳定微梳的范围广泛
					应用程序。</jats:p>

data.title: Protecting collective qubits from non-Markovian dephasing
data.author: Antoine Covolo, Valentin Magro, Mathieu Girard, Sébastien Garcia, Alexei Ourjoumtsev
data.summary:
<jats:p>In quantum technologies, qubits encoded as collective atomic or
					solid-state excitations present important practical advantages, such
					as strong directional coupling to light. Unfortunately, they are
					affected by inhomogeneities between the emitters, which make them
					decay into dark states. In most cases, this process is non-Markovian.
					Through a simple formalism, we unveil a regime where this decay is
					suppressed by a combination of driving and non-Markovianity. We
					experimentally demonstrate this “driving protection” using a Rydberg
					superatom, making its coherent Rabi oscillations last about 14 times
					longer than the free lifetime of the collective qubit.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 保护集体量子位免受非马尔可夫失相的影响
data.abstract_cn:
<jats:p>在量子技术中，量子比特被编码为集体原子或
					固态激发具有重要的实际优势，例如
					与光的强定向耦合。不幸的是，他们是
					受到发射器之间不均匀性的影响，这使得它们
					衰变成黑暗状态。在大多数情况下，这个过程是非马尔可夫的。
					通过简单的形式主义，我们揭示了一种衰败的政权
					受到驱动性和非马尔可夫性的共同抑制。我们
					使用里德伯实验证明这种“驾驶保护”
					超原子，使其相干拉比振荡持续约 14 次
					比集体量子位的自由寿命更长。</jats:p>

data.title: Phase locking of laser arrays based on physics-aware unsupervised learning
data.author: Haoyu Liu, Jun Li, Kun Jin, Bowang Shu, Yuqiu Zhang, Zhongquan Nie, Jian Wu, Jinyong Leng, Pu Zhou
data.summary: <jats:p>Phase locking of laser arrays is of fundamental importance for the flexible generation of free-space structured light, particularly in scenarios requiring high-power output and rapid switching. However, conventional supervised learning approaches encounter two critical limitations: the prohibitive cost of obtaining phase labels in real-world systems and the performance degradation attributed to the domain gap between simulated and real data. To address these challenges, we introduce an unsupervised learning framework that integrates a physical model to eliminate arduous and time-consuming labeling work. This framework features an elegantly designed incremental training strategy, which leverages unlabeled data collected from actual setups, achieving an impressive 94% improvement in dynamic phase locking for a 397-channel laser array. Experimental evaluations demonstrate that our method outperforms existing techniques, significantly boosting resilience against sensor noise and optical aberrations. Across diverse large-scale laser array configurations, we further validate the advantages of the proposed method through three applications: coherent beam combining, structured light generation, and free-space optical communication, highlighting its broad applicability and practical significance.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 基于物理感知无监督学习的激光阵列锁相
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>激光阵列的锁相对于自由空间结构光的灵活生成至关重要，特别是在需要高功率输出和快速切换的场景中。然而，传统的监督学习方法遇到两个关键的限制：在现实系统中获取阶段标签的成本高昂，以及由于模拟数据和真实数据之间的域差距而导致的性能下降。为了应对这些挑战，我们引入了一个无监督学习框架，该框架集成了物理模型，以消除繁重且耗时的标记工作。该框架采用精心设计的增量训练策略，利用从实际设置中收集的未标记数据，使 397 通道激光阵列的动态锁相性能实现了令人印象深刻的 94% 的改进。实验评估表明，我们的方法优于现有技术，显着提高了针对传感器噪声和光学像差的恢复能力。在不同的大规模激光阵列配置中，我们通过相干光束合成、结构光生成和自由空间光通信三个应用进一步验证了该方法的优势，凸显了其广泛的适用性和实际意义。</jats:p>

data.title: Anisotropically multiplanar-focal photon-sieve splitter from extreme ultraviolet to soft X-ray
data.author: Keyang Cheng, Huaiyu Cui, Ziyi Zhang, Yuni Zheng, Dongdi Zhao, Qi Li, Yongpeng Zhao, Junyong Zhang
data.summary: <jats:p>The radiation ranging from extreme ultraviolet (EUV) to soft X-ray has important applications in many fields, including lithography and high-resolution imaging. However, many high-level applications have been limited by the scarcity of traditional refractive and reflective light field modulation due to the strong absorption of all solids. The photon sieves (PS) replace the concentric Fresnel rings with regularly distributed pinholes to enhance structural flexibility, demonstrating advantages in light field modulation from EUV to soft X-ray. Here, we propose the concept of multiplanar-focal photon-sieve splitter (MPFPSS) applied to the short wavelength radiation that can successfully generate three focal spots on two focal planes anisotropically. In the verification experiment in the EUV band, the sizes of the focal spots on both the monofocal plane and the bifocal plane derived by use of the quadratic phase factor are in close agreement with the theoretical values. The MPFPSS demonstrates excellent performance in light field modulation, which holds significant importance for applications in the field of EUV and X-ray, such as interferometry and diffraction imaging.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 从极紫外到软 X 射线的各向异性多平面焦点光子筛分束器
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>从极紫外 (EUV) 到软 X 射线的辐射在许多领域都有重要的应用，包括光刻和高分辨率成像。然而，由于所有固体的强吸收性，传统折射和反射光场调制的稀缺性限制了许多高级应用。光子筛（PS）用规则分布的针孔取代同心菲涅尔环，以增强结构灵活性，展示了从 EUV 到软 X 射线的光场调制的优势。在这里，我们提出了应用于短波长辐射的多平面焦光子筛分光器（MPFPSS）的概念，它可以成功地在两个焦平面上各向异性地产生三个焦点。在EUV波段的验证实验中，利用二次相位因子得到的单焦点平面和双焦点平面上的焦点尺寸与理论值非常吻合。 MPFPSS在光场调制方面表现出优异的性能，这对于干涉测量和衍射成像等EUV和X射线领域的应用具有重要意义。</jats:p>

data.title: Tailoring ultrahigh index plasmonic combinatorial metamaterials for SEIRA and SERS by tuning the fill fraction
data.author: Nicolas Spiesshofer, Elle Wyatt, Zoltan Sztranyovszky, Caleb Todd, Taras V. Mykytiuk, James W. Beattie, Rowena Davies, Rakesh Arul, Viv Lindo, Thomas F. Krauss, Angela Demetriadou, Jeremy J. Baumberg
data.summary: <jats:p>Plasmonic materials with strong mid-infrared resonances allow enhanced molecular sensing, but obtaining the required high field enhancements in easily constructed geometries is challenging. Multilayer aggregates (MLaggs) of close-packed gold nanoparticles (AuNPs) exhibit strong extinction resonances that enhance both surface-enhanced Raman (SERS) and IR absorption (SEIRA) spectroscopies. Here, we show that these simply fabricated MLaggs behave as low-loss high refractive index (<jats:italic>n</jats:italic>) metamaterials in the mid-infrared and that they can reach a refractive index of <jats:italic>n</jats:italic>>10. By admixing silver nanoparticles (AgNPs) with AuNPs and co-aggregating them, we demonstrate combinatorial metamaterials with near-perfect absorption and controlled linewidth. By selective dissolution, we are able to control the aggregate fill fraction and tune both the SEIRA resonance and the refractive index. Dissolution of the AgNPs leads to more porous aggregates, which enable adsorption and detection of larger analytes, making MLaggs useful for healthcare sensing applications.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 通过调整填充分数为 SEIRA 和 SERS 定制超高折射率等离子体组合超材料
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>具有强中红外共振的等离激元材料可以增强分子传感，但在易于构建的几何形状中获得所需的高场增强具有挑战性。密堆积金纳米颗粒 (AuNP) 的多层聚集体 (MLaggs) 表现出强烈的消光共振，可增强表面增强拉曼 (SERS) 和红外吸收 (SEIRA) 光谱。在这里，我们证明这些简单制造的 MLagg 在中红外区域表现为低损耗高折射率 (<jat:italic>n</jat:italic>) 超材料，并且它们的折射率可以达到 <jat:italic>n</jat:italic>>10。通过将银纳米颗粒 (AgNP) 与 AuNP 混合并将它们共聚集，我们展示了具有近乎完美吸收和受控线宽的组合超材料。通过选择性溶解，我们能够控制骨料填充分数并调整 SEIRA 共振和折射率。 AgNP 的溶解会产生更多的多孔聚集体，从而能够吸附和检测较大的分析物，从而使 MLaggs 可用于医疗保健传感应用。</jats:p>

data.title: Mid-infrared nonlinear pinhole imaging
data.author: Yanan Li, Kun Huang, Jianan Fang, Zhuohang Wei, Heping Zeng
data.summary: <jats:p>Pinhole imaging is the most primitive and simplest lensless imaging paradigm, capable of transcending the physical limitations of conventional lens optics. This modality is particularly attractive for accessing a virtually infinite depth of focus or operating at extreme wavelengths. Here, we devise and implement a mid-infrared (MIR) pinhole imaging system at 3.07 µm based on nonlinear spatial filtering. Instead of using a physical aperture, the involved pinhole is optically formed by a near-infrared pump at 1.03 µm within a nonlinear crystal, which allows flexible and precise control over the effective aperture size to optimize imaging performance. Meanwhile, the MIR rays passing through the nonlinear pinhole are spectrally upconverted to facilitate sensitive imaging via a silicon camera. Consequently, the implemented upconversion pinhole imaging enables a large depth of field of over 35 cm, beyond the reach of typical lens-based upconversion imagers. Furthermore, depth-resolving imaging across a large depth range is demonstrated in both the reflection and transmission modes based on time-of-flight and trigonometric techniques, respectively. The achieved capabilities—featuring large operation depth, wide field-of-view, and flexible adaptability to various illumination conditions—highlight the potential of the presented MIR imaging architecture for expansive scene detection and motion-aware applications in industrial inspection and night vision.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 中红外非线性针孔成像
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>针孔成像是最原始、最简单的无透镜成像范例，能够超越传统镜头光学的物理限制。这种模式对于获得几乎无限的焦深或在极端波长下工作特别有吸引力。在这里，我们设计并实现了基于非线性空间滤波的 3.07 µm 中红外 (MIR) 针孔成像系统。所涉及的针孔不是使用物理孔径，而是由非线性晶体内 1.03 µm 的近红外泵浦以光学方式形成，从而可以灵活、精确地控制有效孔径尺寸，以优化成像性能。同时，穿过非线性针孔的中红外射线被光谱上转换，以便于通过硅相机进行灵敏成像。因此，所实现的上转换针孔成像可实现超过 35 厘米的大景深，超出了典型的基于镜头的上转换成像器的范围。此外，分别基于飞行时间和三角技术的反射和透射模式演示了大深度范围内的深度分辨成像。所实现的功能（具有大操作深度、宽视场和对各种照明条件的灵活适应性）突出了所提出的 MIR 成像架构在工业检测和夜视中广泛的场景检测和运动感知应用的潜力。</jats:p>

data.title: Fidelity-preserving enhancement of ptychography with foundational text-to-image models
data.author: Ming Du, Volker Rose, Junjing Deng, Dileep Singh, Si Chen, Mathew Cherukara
data.summary: <jats:p>Ptychographic phase retrieval enables high-resolution imaging of complex samples but often suffers from artifacts such as grid pathology and multislice crosstalk, which degrade reconstructed images. We propose a plug-and-play (PnP) framework that integrates physics model-based phase retrieval with text-guided image editing using foundational diffusion models. By employing the alternating direction method of multipliers, our approach ensures consensus between data fidelity and artifact removal subproblems, maintaining physical consistency while enhancing image quality. Artifact removal is achieved using a text-guided diffusion image editing method (LEDITS++) with a pre-trained foundational diffusion model, allowing users to specify artifacts for removal in natural language. Demonstrations on simulated and experimental datasets show significant improvements in artifact suppression and structural fidelity, validated by metrics such as peak signal-to-noise ratio and diffraction pattern consistency. This work highlights the combination of text-guided generative models and model-based phase retrieval algorithms as a transferable and fidelity-preserving method for high-quality diffraction imaging.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 使用基础文本到图像模型保真增强叠印术
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>叠层相位检索能够对复杂样本进行高分辨率成像，但经常会受到网格病理和多层串扰等伪影的影响，从而降低重建图像的质量。我们提出了一种即插即用（PnP）框架，该框架将基于物理模型的相位检索与使用基础扩散模型的文本引导图像编辑相集成。通过采用乘法器的交替方向方法，我们的方法确保了数据保真度和伪影消除子问题之间的共识，在提高图像质量的同时保持物理一致性。伪影去除是使用文本引导扩散图像编辑方法 (LEDITS++) 和预先训练的基础扩散模型来实现的，允许用户用自然语言指定要去除的伪影。模拟和实验数据集的演示显示了伪影抑制和结构保真度方面的显着改进，并通过峰值信噪比和衍射图案一致性等指标进行了验证。这项工作强调了文本引导生成模型和基于模型的相位检索算法的结合作为高质量衍射成像的可转移和保真度方法。</jats:p>

data.title: Deep learning optimized dual-analyte detection-based biosensor for monitoring pregnancy stage using a urine sample
data.author: Kawsar Ahmed, Md. Shohidullah, Md. Mamun Ali, Francis M. Bui, Li Chen, Santosh Kumar
data.summary: <jats:p>This study presents a hybrid deep learning (DL) approach for designing and optimizing a photonic crystal fiber (PCF)-based surface plasmon resonance (SPR) multi-analyte biosensor. Using a simulation based on the finite element method (FEM), we generated a comprehensive data set that captures various sensor parameters and refractive index (RI) values. A hybrid recurrent neural network long-short-term memory (RNN-LSTM) model was developed to predict confinement loss (CL), which showed superior performance with an MSE of 0.0014, an MAE of 0.0188, and an R<jats:sup>2</jats:sup> of 0.9510 compared to other DL and machine learning (ML) models. The proposed model shows a maximum amplitude sensitivity (AS) of 3102.41 RIU<jats:sup>−1</jats:sup>, a wavelength sensitivity (WS) of 10,000 nm/RIU, and a sensor resolution (SR) of 1 × 10<jats:sup>−5</jats:sup>. The effectiveness of the model was validated through extensive analysis, including ablation studies and SHAP-based explainability analysis. Our findings highlight the potential of DL to improve multi-analyte biosensor design and performance prediction.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 基于深度学习优化的双分析物检测生物传感器，用于使用尿液样本监测妊娠阶段
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>这项研究提出了一种混合深度学习 (DL) 方法，用于设计和优化基于光子晶体光纤 (PCF) 的表面等离子共振 (SPR) 多分析物生物传感器。通过基于有限元法 (FEM) 的模拟，我们生成了一个全面的数据集，可捕获各种传感器参数和折射率 (RI) 值。开发了一种混合循环神经网络长期短期记忆 (RNN-LSTM) 模型来预测限制损失 (CL)，与其他深度学习和机器学习 (ML) 模型相比，该模型表现出优异的性能，MSE 为 0.0014，MAE 为 0.0188，R<jats:sup>2</jat:sup> 为 0.9510。所提出的模型显示最大振幅灵敏度 (AS) 为 3102.41 RIU<jats:sup>−1</jats:sup>，波长灵敏度 (WS) 为 10,000 nm/RIU，传感器分辨率 (SR) 为 1 × 10<jats:sup>−5</jat:sup>。该模型的有效性通过广泛的分析得到了验证，包括消融研究和基于 SHAP 的可解释性分析。我们的研究结果凸显了深度学习在改进多分析物生物传感器设计和性能预测方面的潜力。</jats:p>

data.title: Integrated fixation and stimulus channel for adaptive optics ophthalmoscopy
data.author: Marcel T. Bernucci, Yan Liu, Qiuzhi Ji, James A. Crowell, Kristen Bowles-Johnson, Matthew J. Keller, Donald T. Miller
data.summary: <jats:p>Adaptive optics (AO) ophthalmoscopes allow high-resolution imaging of retinal                     structure and function at the cellular level. Due to their high                     magnification and small field-of-view (FOV), these systems require                     precise fixation and light delivery to control the retinal region                     being imaged and stimulated. We present a high-efficiency fixation and                     stimulus channel for AO ophthalmoscopy, offering an extended working                     distance, wide steering range, and broad dioptric correction. For                     stimulation, the channel delivers intense, near-monochromatic light                     flashes across much of the visible spectrum. Our design uses all stock                     components, except for a 3D-printed conic mount and a few machined                     parts. We balance key system trade-offs and demonstrate design                     performance through several AO optical coherence tomography (AO-OCT)                     structural and functional imaging examples. Although originally                     developed for the Indiana AO-OCT system, these design principles can                     be readily applied to other AO ophthalmoscopic platforms.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 用于自适应光学检眼镜的集成固定和刺激通道
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>自适应光学 (AO) 检眼镜可以在细胞水平上对视网膜结构和功能进行高分辨率成像。由于其高放大倍率和小视场 (FOV)，这些系统需要精确的固定和光传输来控制成像和刺激的视网膜区域。我们为 AO 检眼镜提供高效的固定和刺激通道，提供更长的工作距离、更宽的转向范围和更广泛的屈光矫正。为了刺激，该通道在大部分可见光谱中发出强烈的、近乎单色的闪光。我们的设计使用所有库存组件，除了 3D 打印的圆锥底座和一些机加工零件。我们平衡关键系统的权衡，并通过几个 AO 光学相干断层扫描 (AO-OCT) 结构和功能成像示例展示设计性能。虽然最初是为印第安纳州 AO-OCT 系统开发的，但这些设计原理可以轻松应用于其他 AO 检眼镜平台。</jats:p>

data.title: Resolution-enhanced transport of intensity phase imaging using contrast transfer function reformulation and SNR-guided deconvolution
data.author: Sibi Chakravarthy Shanmugavel, Yunhui Zhu
data.summary: <jats:p>The transport of intensity equation (TIE) is a powerful phase imaging technique. However, its formulation fails to account for the off-axial transfer function due to the paraxial approximation. To address the resulting image degradation, we analyze TIE phase retrieval using the contrast transfer function (CTF) framework. The attenuation of high-frequency components, leading to the loss of fine structural details, is assessed and restored through Wiener deconvolution. Simulations and experiment results demonstrate significant enhancements in sharpness, contrast, and structural clarity. We showcase enhanced phase imaging of cheek cells, revealing finer subcellular details and achieving diffraction-limited performance, contributing to advances in super-resolution phase imaging.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 使用对比度传递函数重构和信噪比引导的反卷积来增强强度相位成像的分辨率增强传输
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>强度传输方程 (TIE) 是一种强大的相位成像技术。然而，由于近轴近似，其公式未能考虑离轴传递函数。为了解决由此产生的图像质量下降问题，我们使用对比度传递函数 (CTF) 框架分析 TIE 相位检索。高频分量的衰减导致精细结构细节的损失，通过维纳反卷积进行评估和恢复。模拟和实验结果表明清晰度、对比度和结构清晰度显着增强。我们展示了脸颊细胞的增强相位成像，揭示了更精细的亚细胞细节并实现了衍射极限性能，为超分辨率相位成像的进步做出了贡献。</jats:p>

data.title: High-resolution three-dimensional quantitative photoacoustic and ultrasound imaging of subcutaneous microvasculature in extremities
data.author: Xing Long, Xinyue Huang, Meng Yang, Stanislav Emelianov, Changhui Li
data.summary:
<jats:p>
                    Visualizing and monitoring morphological and functional information of
					microvasculature, including arterioles and venules, plays a crucial
					role in assessing vascular-related diseases. Clinical angiography
					methods have limitations in observing small peripheral microvessels
					down to 100 μm. Here, this study achieved
					three-dimensional (3D) non-invasive imaging of the subcutaneous
					microvascular network and monitored hemodynamic change by using an
					ultrasound (US)/photoacoustic (PA) dual-modality imaging system. Not
					only were the microvasculature and subcutaneous tissues in the
					extremities visualized with high resolution, but also the quantitative
					oxygen saturation (sO
                    <jats:sub>2</jats:sub>
                    ) of microvessels was measured. To
					monitor the hemodynamic change in microvasculature, vascular occlusion
					was performed to simulate vascular-related disease, and successfully
					measured multiple parameters, such as average PA amplitude, oxygenated
					hemoglobin (HbO
                    <jats:sub>2</jats:sub>
                    ), deoxygenated hemoglobin (Hb), and
					sO
                    <jats:sub>2</jats:sub>
                    , during normal perfusion, vascular occlusion, and
					reperfusion processes, respectively. Based on the preliminary results,
					the high-frequency 3D US/PA dual-modality imaging shows great
					potential in early diagnosis and therapeutic monitoring of
					microvascular-related diseases.
                  </jats:p>
