data.title: Multi-layered model for simulating the in vivo terahertz response of human skin
data.author: Benjamin G. Page, Jacob J. Young, Agrima Agarwal, Xiangyu Guo, Joseph Hardwicke, Emma Pickwell-MacPherson
data.summary:
<jats:p>
                    Quantitative methods of evaluating the state of skin are highly beneficial for both diagnosis and treatment monitoring. The development of such methods relies on understanding how changes in skin properties affect the quantitative response. Effective modelling is often a crucial step in building this understanding. This work introduces a multi-layered model for simulating the
                    <jats:italic>in vivo</jats:italic>
                    terahertz response of skin, demonstrating how variations in skin properties may alter the measured signal. Furthermore, we hypothesise that the observed attenuation in the terahertz signal during an
                    <jats:italic>in vivo</jats:italic>
                    measurement is primarily a result of skin deformation and flattening under compression by the imaging window. Finally, we fit our model to measured data and extract optimised values for a skin deformation parameter.
                  </jats:p>

data.title: Convolutional neural network-based differentiation of intraocular inflammatory cells with ultrahigh-resolution OCT
data.author: Jiachi Hong, Siyu Chen, Amy Pohodich, Tejpal Gill, Xubo Song, Yifan Jian, Eric Suhler, David Huang, Yan Li
data.summary: <jats:p>The differential diagnosis of uveitis is broad and often challenging. A key indicator of intraocular inflammation is the presence of cells in the aqueous or vitreous humor. We developed a lightweight convolutional neural network (CNN) model capable of classifying intraocular inflammatory cell types using ultrahigh-resolution optical coherence tomography (OCT). The model was trained and optimized using OCT images of known cell types—mononuclear cells and granulocytes—and achieved an accuracy of 88.4 ± 0.6%, with an area under the receiver operating characteristic (ROC) curve of 94.3 ± 0.4%. The inflammatory cell compositions predicted by the model were consistent with clinical diagnoses in uveitis patients. This approach offers a promising tool for the diagnosis and monitoring of intraocular inflammation in uveitis.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 基于卷积神经网络的超高分辨率 OCT 分化眼内炎症细胞
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>葡萄膜炎的鉴别诊断范围广泛且常常具有挑战性。眼内炎症的一个关键指标是房水或玻璃体液中细胞的存在。我们开发了一种轻量级卷积神经网络（CNN）模型，能够使用超高分辨率光学相干断层扫描（OCT）对眼内炎症细胞类型进行分类。该模型使用已知细胞类型（单核细胞和粒细胞）的 OCT 图像进行训练和优化，准确率达到 88.4±0.6%，受试者工作特征 (ROC) 曲线下面积为 94.3±0.4%。该模型预测的炎症细胞组成与葡萄膜炎患者的临床诊断一致。这种方法为葡萄膜炎眼内炎症的诊断和监测提供了一种有前途的工具。</jats:p>

data.title: Synthetic-data-driven LSTM framework for tracing cardiac pulsation in optical signals
data.author: Jingyi Wu, Shaojie Bai, Zeynep Ozkaya, Justin A. Patel, Emily Skog, Alexander Ruesch, Matthew A. Smith, Jana M. Kainerstorfer
data.summary: <jats:p>Optical monitoring of cardiac pulsations using near-infrared                     spectroscopy (NIRS), photoplethysmography (PPG), and diffuse                     correlation spectroscopy (DCS) is often hindered by motion artifacts                     and noise. We introduce a synthetic-data-driven framework using a long                     short-term memory (LSTM) network to trace and denoise pulsatile                     optical waveforms without reliance on annotated clinical datasets.                     Physiologically realistic pulsatile signals are generated, corrupted                     with parameterized artifacts, and used to train the LSTM model.                     Applied to experimental NIRS, PPG, and DCS signals, the model                     recovered beat-to-beat morphology more effectively than widely used                     wavelet and temporal derivative distribution repair (TDDR) filters.                     Heart rate (HR) extraction from LSTM-processed signals closely matched                     ECG-derived measurements (mean absolute error = 0.59 bpm, root mean                     square error = 0.74 bpm). This flexible approach shows potential for                     rapid adaptation across various devices and noise conditions.</jats:p>

data.title: Near-infrared-II pulsed laser diode array for spectral photoacoustic imaging of deep tissue oxygenation
data.author: Vinoin Devpaul Vincely, Miller A. Dickerson, Catherine E. Hawkins, Carolyn L. Bayer
data.summary:
<jats:p>
                    Spectral photoacoustic imaging (sPAI) has the potential to detect clinically relevant measurements of blood oxygenation, non-invasively in real time. The unique advantage of sPAI is its ability to probe optical chromophores at extended imaging depths compared to purely optical modalities. PA imaging has previously been demonstrated using benchtop nanosecond pulsed solid-state lasers; however, their size and high cost limit the potential for clinical translation. Microfabricated pulsed laser diodes (PLDs) are miniaturized laser sources that can be fabricated and integrated at relatively low cost; however, microfabricated PLDs have been minimally investigated for the generation of photoacoustic signals due to the significantly lower energies they typically provide. In this work, we integrated an array of PLD diodes with optical excitation in the second near-infrared window, demonstrating deep imaging depths that exceed the imaging depths expected based on fluence alone. Using five PLDs integrated in series at a fluence of 61.5 µJ/cm
                    <jats:sup>2</jats:sup>
                    , a maximum imaging depth of 4.26 cm was achieved with a detectable CNR in a porcine tissue phantom. Additionally, spectrally unmixed hemoglobin oxygenation measurements were accurate up to a depth of 3.11 cm with ∼10% accuracy. We validated device performance using an in vivo rat model, demonstrating a detectable SNR up to a depth of 4.13 cm and accurate tissue oxygenation assessment up to 3.85 cm from the kidney under layers of porcine tissue. Our device demonstrates the feasibility of microfabricated PLDs for clinically relevant photoacoustic imaging depths.
                  </jats:p>
data.title_cn: 用于深层组织氧合光谱光声成像的近红外-II 脉冲激光二极管阵列
data.abstract_cn:
<贾茨：p>
                    光谱光声成像（sPAI）有潜力以非侵入方式实时检测临床相关的血氧测量值。与纯光学方式相比，sPAI 的独特优势是能够在扩展的成像深度下探测光学发色团。 PA 成像先前已使用台式纳秒脉冲固态激光器进行了演示；然而，它们的尺寸和高成本限制了临床转化的潜力。微加工脉冲激光二极管（PLD）是小型化激光源，可以以相对较低的成本制造和集成；然而，由于微制造的 PLD 通常提供的能量明显较低，因此对于产生光声信号的研究很少。在这项工作中，我们在第二个近红外窗口中集成了具有光学激发功能的 PLD 二极管阵列，证明了深度成像深度超出了仅基于注量的预期成像深度。使用五个串联集成的 PLD，通量为 61.5 µJ/cm
                    <贾茨：sup>2</贾茨：sup>
                    ，在猪组织模型中可检测到的 CNR 实现了 4.26 cm 的最大成像深度。此外，光谱未混合血红蛋白氧合测量的准确度可达 3.11 cm 的深度，精度约为 10%。我们使用体内大鼠模型验证了设备性能，证明了可检测到的 SNR 深度可达 4.13 cm，并且可在距猪组织层下的肾脏 3.85 cm 处进行准确的组织氧合评估。我们的设备展示了微加工 PLD 用于临床相关光声成像深度的可行性。
                  </贾茨：p>

data.title: Optical and simulated visual outcomes of two presbyopia-correcting intraocular lenses tested in clinically relevant decentration and tilt conditions
data.author: Fátima Cuellar, Fidel Vega, David Madrid, José F. Alfonso, Maria S. Millan
data.summary: <jats:p>We evaluated the effect of intraocular lens (IOL) misalignment on image quality under clinically relevant conditions (0.2, 0.4 mm decentration and 2°, 4° tilt). Two presbyopia-correcting IOLs, an extended depth of focus (EDOF) (Alcon Vivity) and a diffractive multifocal (Alcon PanOptix), were tested. Through-focus modulation transfer function (MTF)-based measures were taken using an on-bench model eye with average corneal spherical aberration and apertures of 3.0 and 4.5 mm. Optical image quality and simulated visual acuity (VA) were assessed for both aligned and misaligned IOLs. The aligned EDOF lens showed superior distance vision quality compared to the multifocal, particularly with the 4.5 mm pupil. The EDOF lens was, however, more sensitive to decentration than the multifocal, which showed very low sensitivity across far, intermediate, and near regions with both apertures. Degradation with IOL tilt occurred at a slower rate than with decentration. Despite the optical degradation produced by mild misalignment (up to 0.4 mm decentration and 4° tilt), the predicted VA demonstrates that these effects should be negligible on postoperative vision with a 3 mm pupil. This holds true not only at a far distance, but also at the relevant intermediate and near foci.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 在临床相关偏心和倾斜条件下测试的两种老花眼矫正人工晶状体的光学和模拟视觉结果
data.abstract_cn: <jat:p>我们评估了临床相关条件（0.2、0.4 mm 偏心和 2°、4° 倾斜）下人工晶状体 (IOL) 错位对图像质量的影响。测试了两种老花眼矫正人工晶状体，一种是扩展焦深 (EDOF)（爱尔康 Vivity），一种是衍射多焦点人工晶状体（爱尔康 PanOptix）。使用平均角膜球面像差和孔径为 3.0 和 4.5 mm 的台式模型眼进行基于离焦调制传递函数 (MTF) 的测量。对对准和未对准 IOL 的光学图像质量和模拟视力 (VA) 进行了评估。与多焦点镜片相比，对齐的 EDOF 镜片表现出卓越的远距离视觉质量，特别是在 4.5 mm 瞳孔的情况下。然而，EDOF 镜片比多焦点镜片对偏心更敏感，多焦点镜片在两个光圈的远、中和近区域都显示出非常低的灵敏度。 IOL 倾斜引起的退化速度比偏心引起的退化速度慢。尽管轻度错位（最多 0.4 mm 偏心和 4° 倾斜）会导致光学退化，但预测的 VA 表明，对于 3 mm 瞳孔的术后视力，这些影响可以忽略不计。这不仅适用于远距离，而且适用于相关的中间和近焦点。</jats:p>

data.title: Label-free histopathological diagnosis of frozen sections based on multi-excitation and broad-emission autofluorescence imaging
data.author: Yongtai Chen, Yiming Bi, Changjiang Zhou, Jiawei Song, Miao Qi, Ying Gu, Yizhou Tan, Ji Qi
data.summary: <jats:p>Tumor surgery requires rapid intraoperative histopathological diagnosis to guide treatment and improve patient prognosis. Autofluorescence (AF) imaging offers a label-free approach with strong potential for rapid intraoperative use; however, most studies to date have been performed on deparaffinized sections based on bandpass emission settings. Its compatibility with frozen sections—which is essential for time-constrained intraoperative settings—remains unclear. Here, we systematically compared AF imaging of frozen sections with conventional deparaffinized sections, finding that the bandpass-filtered AF signal of frozen sections was weak and susceptible to photobleaching. To address this issue, we demonstrated multi-excitation and broad-emission (MEBE) AF imaging of frozen sections and showed that MEBE AF imaging of frozen sections enabled reliable tissue morphology assessment. This approach potentially provides diagnostic quality comparable to standard H&E staining and paves the way for rapid intraoperative histopathological diagnosis. We further evaluated the approach in liver disease models and found that MEBE AF imaging accurately delineated tumor boundaries in liver cancer and assessed injury severity in acute liver injury, consistent with histopathological confirmation. Our study bridges MEBE AF imaging of frozen and deparaffinized sections, along with preliminary exploration in liver disease diagnosis. The findings will advance AF-based histopathology for clinical translation, enhancing surgical efficiency and patient prognosis.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 基于多激发和宽发射自发荧光成像的冰冻切片无标记组织病理学诊断
data.abstract_cn: <jat:p>肿瘤手术需要术中快速组织病理学诊断，以指导治疗并改善患者预后。自发荧光（AF）成像提供了一种无标记方法，具有在术中快速使用的巨大潜力；然而，迄今为止的大多数研究都是基于带通发射设置对脱蜡切片进行的。它与冰冻切片的兼容性（这对于时间有限的术中环境至关重要）仍不清楚。在这里，我们系统地比较了冰冻切片与传统脱蜡切片的 AF 成像，发现冰冻切片的带通滤波 AF 信号较弱且容易发生光漂白。为了解决这个问题，我们演示了冷冻切片的多激发和宽发射（MEBE）AF 成像，并表明冷冻切片的 MEBE AF 成像能够实现可靠的组织形态评估。这种方法可能提供与标准 H&E 染色相当的诊断质量，并为快速术中组织病理学诊断铺平道路。我们进一步评估了肝病模型中的方法，发现 MEBE AF 成像准确地描绘了肝癌中的肿瘤边界，并评估了急性肝损伤中的损伤严重程度，与组织病理学证实一致。我们的研究将冷冻切片和脱蜡切片的 MEBE AF 成像与肝病诊断的初步探索结合起来。这些发现将推动基于 AF 的组织病理学的临床转化，提高手术效率和患者预后。</jats:p>

data.title: Noninvasive prediction of photon fluence rate in targeted brain regions for personalized transcranial photobiomodulation dosage: model development and in silico evaluation
data.author: Yu-Chia Chang, Bo-Yong Lin, Yu-Peng Hsieh, Tzu-Chia Kao, Wen-Yih Isaac Tseng, Li-Da Huang, Kung-Bin Sung
data.summary: <jats:p>Transcranial photobiomodulation (tPBM) shows promise in delivering beneficial effects to the brain. However, accurately estimating the stimulus energy reaching the targeted brain region remains difficult due to individual differences in anatomy and optical properties. We present a noninvasive method that combines diffuse reflectance spectroscopy with deep learning to predict the fluence rate of the stimulus light. Incorporating tissue layer thicknesses into the model significantly enhances prediction accuracy, reducing errors to approximately 13%, compared to 49% when assuming a constant irradiance at the scalp surface. By eliminating the need for expensive magnetic resonance imaging, our approach offers a scalable solution for optimizing irradiation parameters in future tPBM applications.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 无创预测目标大脑区域的光子注量率，以实现个性化经颅光生物调节剂量：模型开发和计算机评估
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>经颅光生物调节（tPBM）有望为大脑带来有益的影响。然而，由于解剖学和光学特性的个体差异，准确估计到达目标大脑区域的刺激能量仍然很困难。我们提出了一种非侵入性方法，将漫反射光谱与深度学习相结合来预测刺激光的注量率。将组织层厚度纳入模型可显着提高预测准确性，将误差降低至约 13%，而假设头皮表面的辐照度恒定时误差为 49%。通过消除对昂贵的磁共振成像的需求，我们的方法为优化未来 tPBM 应用中的辐照参数提供了可扩展的解决方案。</jats:p>

data.title: Automated measurement of cardiomyocyte monolayer contraction using the Exeter Multiscope
data.author: Sharika Mohanan, David Horsell, Taylor Watters, Mohammadreza Ghasemi, Lewis Henderson, Caroline Müllenbroich, Gil Bub, Francis Burton, Godfrey Smith, Alexander D. Corbett
data.summary:
<jats:p>
                    Previously, we introduced a microscope design that enabled rapid, random-access well plate imaging [
                    <jats:mixed-citation publication-type="journal">
                      <jats:source>eLife</jats:source>
                      ,
                      <jats:volume>10</jats:volume>
                      ,
                      <jats:fpage>e56426</jats:fpage>

Here, we implement this design in a low-cost, compact, and portable prototype (the Exeter Multiscope) and apply it to the problem of capturing the contraction of cardiomyocyte monolayers, which have been plated into nine wells within a 96-well plate. Using a transmissive rather than reflective geometry, each well is sampled using 500 × 500 pixels across a 1.4 × 1.4 mm field of view, acquired in three colours at 3.7 Hz per well. The use of multiple illumination wavelengths provides post-hoc focus selection, further increasing the level of automation. The performance of the Exeter Multiscope is benchmarked against industry standard methods using a commercial microscope with a motorised stage and demonstrates that the Multiscope can acquire data almost 40 times faster. The data from both Multiscope and the commercial systems are processed by a ‘pixel variance’ algorithm that uses information from the pixel value variability over time to determine the timing and amplitude of tissue contraction. This algorithm is also benchmarked against an existing algorithm that employs an absolute difference measure of tissue contraction.

                    ]。在这里，我们在低成本、紧凑和便携式原型（Exeter Multiscope）中实现了这种设计，并将其应用于捕获心肌细胞单层收缩的问题，该心肌细胞单层已被铺在 96 孔板的 9 个孔中。使用透射而非反射几何结构，在 1.4××1.4mm 视场中使用 500 × 500 像素对每个孔进行采样，并以每孔 3.7 Hz 的频率以三种颜色采集。多种照明波长的使用提供了事后焦点选择，进一步提高了自动化水平。 Exeter Multiscope 的性能以使用带有电动载物台的商用显微镜的行业标准方法为基准，并表明 Multiscope 采集数据的速度几乎提高了 40 倍。来自 Multiscope 和商业系统的数据均通过“像素方差”算法进行处理，该算法使用像素值随时间变化的信息来确定组织收缩的时间和幅度。该算法还以采用组织收缩的绝对差测量的现有算法为基准。
                  </贾茨：p>

data.title: Translational photoacoustic and ultrasound imaging catheter for characterizing gastrointestinal inflammation and fibrosis: a study with a pig model in vivo
data.author: Yaocai Huang, Laura A. Johnson, Xiaorui Peng, Yao Lee, Xueding Wang, Peter D. R. Higgins, Guan Xu
data.summary: <jats:p>Our previous studies demonstrated that a prototype photoacoustic (PA) and ultrasound (US) imaging catheter can differentiate intestinal inflammation and fibrosis. However, its compatibility with clinical endoscopic procedures has not been validated. Here, we present a translational PA-US dual-modality imaging catheter with a reduced diameter to fit the biopsy channel of standard adult colonoscopes and therapeutic upper endoscopes (∼3.7 mm). The catheter integrates an angle-tipped optical fiber (600-µm core) for PA illumination and a miniaturized 48-element ultrasound array operating at a center frequency of ∼9 MHz for signal reception. These components are enclosed in a hydrostatic balloon (12 mm diameter, 15 mm length when fully inflated) to ensure acoustic coupling with the intestinal lumen. The system was upgraded from our previous setup by incorporating a more portable optical parametric oscillator (OPO) laser and a Verasonics imaging platform. The imaging catheter was positioned at the disease locations in a pig model of esophageal fibrosis induced by argon plasma coagulation (APC). Multi-wavelength PA imaging and US imaging were performed to resolve the tissue components. The results demonstrate the catheter’s ability to assess inflammation and fibrosis in the gastrointestinal tract during a standard clinical endoscopy procedure.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 用于表征胃肠道炎症和纤维化的平移光声和超声成像导管：一项猪模型体内研究
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>我们之前的研究表明，原型光声 (PA) 和超声 (US) 成像导管可以区分肠道炎症和纤维化。然而，其与临床内窥镜手术的兼容性尚未得到验证。在这里，我们提出了一种直径减小的平移 PA-US 双模态成像导管，以适应标准成人结肠镜和治疗性上段内窥镜的活检通道 (∼3.7 mm)。该导管集成了用于 PA 照明的尖角光纤（600 µm 芯）和用于信号接收的中心频率为 ∼9 MHz 的小型 48 元件超声阵列。这些组件封装在静压球囊（直径为 12 mm，完全膨胀时长度为 15 mm）中，以确保与肠腔的声学耦合。该系统在我们之前的设置基础上进行了升级，加入了更便携的光学参量振荡器 (OPO) 激光器和 Verasonics 成像平台。将成像导管放置在氩气等离子体凝固（APC）诱导的食管纤维化猪模型的疾病部位。进行多波长 PA 成像和超声成像来解析组织成分。结果表明，该导管能够在标准临床内窥镜检查过程中评估胃肠道炎症和纤维化。</jats:p>

data.title: Photoacoustic imaging combined with robotics: a review of current works
data.author: Xiaorui Peng, Kyoungmo Koo, Guangshen Ma, Mark Draelos, Xueding Wang
data.summary: <jats:p>Photoacoustic imaging (PAI) is a hybrid imaging modality that combines optical excitation with ultrasound (US) detection to achieve high-resolution, high-contrast imaging of biological tissues. As a non-ionizing and scalable imaging technique, PAI has been widely applied in biomedical research and clinical diagnostics, enabling functional and molecular imaging of a variety of medical conditions. In recent years, the rapid advancement of medical robotics has introduced new possibilities for PAI, particularly in the technologies of automated scanning, teleoperated robotics systems, and microrobots. This review surveys the latest developments at the intersection of PAI and robotics, categorizing them by integration level and application domain, with a primary focus on biomedical and clinical implementations. We conclude with perspectives on how these emerging technologies may drive future innovations in imaging, intervention, and healthcare robotics.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 光声成像与机器人技术相结合：当前工作回顾
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>光声成像 (PAI) 是一种混合成像方式，它将光学激发与超声 (US) 检测相结合，以实现生物组织的高分辨率、高对比度成像。作为一种非电离、可扩展的成像技术，PAI 已广泛应用于生物医学研究和临床诊断，能够对各种医疗状况进行功能和分子成像。近年来，医疗机器人技术的快速发展为PAI带来了新的可能性，特别是在自动扫描、遥控机器人系统和微型机器人技术方面。本综述调查了 PAI 和机器人技术交叉领域的最新发展，按集成级别和应用领域对它们进行分类，主要关注生物医学和临床实施。最后，我们对这些新兴技术如何推动成像、干预和医疗保健机器人领域的未来创新进行了展望。</jats:p>

data.title: High-power organic light-emitting diodes for photodynamic therapy in a mouse model of oral squamous cell carcinoma
data.author: Jiechen Zhang, Shun Zhi, Yunlei Xu, Yingguang Zhu, Yonglan Hu, Ruoyu Zhang, Haixia Qiu, Ying Gu, Defu Chen
data.summary:
<jats:p>
                    Effective light delivery with precise control is critical for achieving safe and efficient photodynamic therapy (PDT). Organic light-emitting diodes (OLEDs) represent an attractive novel light source for PDT due to their large-area, uniform irradiation, and conformal adaptability to irregular lesion geometries. However, conventional OLEDs suffer from low power density, which limits their therapeutic efficacy. In this study, we optimized the multilayer structure of an OLED device, achieving a stable light output of up to 60 mW/cm
                    <jats:sup>2</jats:sup>
                    —a significant advancement expected to facilitate the development of OLED-based PDT (OLED-PDT). In both
                    <jats:italic>in vitro</jats:italic>
                    and
                    <jats:italic>in vivo</jats:italic>
                    studies using an oral squamous cell carcinoma (SCC-25) xenografted mouse model, the high-power OLED device demonstrated significant therapeutic efficacy. The treatment effectively suppresses tumor cell proliferation and angiogenesis while inducing apoptosis, thereby inhibiting tumor progression. Moreover, OLED-PDT shows excellent biosafety, with no detectable damage to normal organs. These findings highlight the promising potential of high-power OLEDs as a next-generation light source for precise and safe PDT.
                  </jats:p>
data.title_cn: 高功率有机发光二极管用于口腔鳞状细胞癌小鼠模型的光动力治疗
data.abstract_cn:
<贾茨：p>
                    有效的光传输和精确的控制对于实现安全高效的光动力治疗 (PDT) 至关重要。有机发光二极管 (OLED) 因其大面积、均匀照射以及对不规则病变几何形状的保形适应性而成为 PDT 有吸引力的新型光源。然而，传统OLED的功率密度较低，这限制了它们的治疗功效。在这项研究中，我们优化了OLED器件的多层结构，实现了高达60 mW/cm的稳定光输出
                    <贾茨：sup>2</贾茨：sup>
                    ——这一重大进步预计将促进基于 OLED 的 PDT（OLED-PDT）的发展。在两者中
                    <jats:italic>体外</jats:italic>
                    和
                    <jats:italic>体内</jats:italic>
                    使用口腔鳞状细胞癌 (SCC-25) 异种移植小鼠模型进行的研究中，高功率 OLED 设备显示出显着的治疗效果。该治疗有效抑制肿瘤细胞增殖和血管生成，同时诱导细胞凋亡，从而抑制肿瘤进展。此外，OLED-PDT显示出优异的生物安全性，对正常器官没有可检测到的损害。这些发现凸显了高功率 OLED 作为下一代精确、安全 PDT 光源的巨大潜力。
                  </贾茨：p>

data.title: NO-ergic mechanisms of age differences in photostimulation of lymphatic drainage, filtration, and clearance
data.author: Anastasiia Semyichkina-Glushkovskaia, Inna Blokhina, Ivan Fedosov, Alexander Shirokov, Maria Tsoy, Alexander Dubrovsky, Alexander Dmitrenko, Andrey Terskov, Daria Zlatogorskaya, Viktoria Adushkina, Arina Evsukova, Matvey Tuzhilkin, Inna Elizarova, Anastasiia Kalabukhova, Egor Ilyukov, Dmitry Myagkov, Dmitry Tuktarov, Sergey Popov, Timophey Inozemcev, Oxana Semyachkina-Glushkovskaya, Jürgen Kurths
data.summary: <jats:p>Photobiomodulation (PBM) is recognized as a promising, noninvasive, and safe therapy for brain diseases. However, age is a limiting factor for effective phototherapy of brain pathology. The mechanisms of decreasing efficiency of therapeutic effects of PBM in the aging brain remain poorly understood. Recently, it has been shown that PBM of brain lymphatic drainage by stimulation of the nitric oxide (NO) production in the lymphatic endothelium plays a key role in the PBM-therapy of brain diseases. In this study, we clearly show that PBM increases the NO production in the lymphatic endothelial cells and the contractility of the afferent (drainage function) and efferent (filtration function) cervical lymphatic vessels (cLVs), which is significantly suppressed after the NO blockade in 3- and 12-month-old mice. However, 24-month-old mice are insensitive to both factors, PBM and its suppression by the NO blockade. In old mice, a decrease in sensitivity to PBM is associated with age-related lymphatic endothelium dysfunction, including changes in the cLV morphology (hyperplasia), a decrease in the NO production, and the contractility of cLVs, leading to reduced lymphatic removal of beta amyloid from the brain. These results suggest that the combined therapy, including PBM with an increase in NO production in the lymphatic endothelium, can substantially improve the effectiveness of the stimulating effects of PBM on brain drainage and the removal of toxic metabolites from its tissues, which might generally contribute to improving phototherapy of brain diseases in the elderly.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 淋巴引流、过滤和清除的光刺激年龄差异的NO能机制
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>光生物调节 (PBM) 被认为是一种有前景、无创且安全的脑部疾病治疗方法。然而，年龄是有效脑部病理光疗的限制因素。 PBM 在衰老大脑中治疗效果降低的机制仍知之甚少。最近，研究表明，通过刺激淋巴内皮细胞产生一氧化氮（NO）来进行脑淋巴引流的 PBM 在脑部疾病的 PBM 治疗中发挥着关键作用。在这项研究中，我们清楚地表明，PBM 增加了淋巴内皮细胞中 NO 的产生以及传入（引流功能）和传出（过滤功能）颈部淋巴管 (cLV) 的收缩性，而在 3 个月和 12 个月大的小鼠中，在 NO 阻断后，这种收缩性显着受到抑制。然而，24 个月大的小鼠对 PBM 及其 NO 阻断的抑制这两个因素都不敏感。在老年小鼠中，对 PBM 敏感性的降低与年龄相关的淋巴管内皮功能障碍有关，包括 cLV 形态的变化（增生）、NO 产生的减少以及 cLV 的收缩性，导致淋巴管从大脑中清除 β 淀粉样蛋白的能力减少。这些结果表明，联合治疗，包括PBM与增加淋巴内皮NO产生，可以显着提高PBM对脑引流和从组织中清除有毒代谢物的刺激作用的有效性，这可能总体上有助于改善老年人脑部疾病的光疗。</jats:p>

data.title: Rapid spectral shaping for time domain and swept source full field OCT
data.author: Dimitri Roueff, Pedro Mecê, Olivier Thouvenin
data.summary:
<jats:p>
                    Full-field optical coherence tomography (FFOCT) has recently regained attention thanks to the development of high-resolution dynamic OCT and cross-talk-free swept source FFOCT. However, the choice of wavelength and axial resolution is often a limiting factor with few existing commercial solutions. Here, we developed a novel method to provide rapid spectral shaping for FFOCT imaging. Combining a supercontinuum laser, a fast controllable acousto-optic tunable filter (AOTF), and a multimode fiber with passive and active mode mixing, we obtained an extremely flexible light source compatible with FFOCT. By tuning the AOTF frequency and integrating the resulting wavelength over one camera exposure time, it becomes possible to build any spectrum of interest in the 575-1000 nm range in time domain FFOCT. Alternatively, the designed source module enables achieving swept source FFOCT at up to 100 kfps at an unprecedented axial resolution of 1.1
                    <jats:italic>μm</jats:italic>
                    .
                  </jats:p>
data.title_cn: 用于时域和扫频源全场 OCT 的快速光谱整形
data.abstract_cn:
<贾茨：p>
                    由于高分辨率动态 OCT 和无串扰扫频源 FFOCT 的发展，全视场光学相干断层扫描 (FFOCT) 最近重新受到关注。然而，波长和轴向分辨率的选择通常是现有商业解决方案的限制因素。在这里，我们开发了一种为 FFOCT 成像提供快速光谱整形的新方法。结合超连续谱激光器、快速可控声光可调谐滤波器（AOTF）以及具有被动和主动模式混合的多模光纤，我们获得了与 FFOCT 兼容的极其灵活的光源。通过调整 AOTF 频率并在一台相机曝光时间内积分所得波长，可以在时域 FFOCT 中构建 575-1000nm 范围内的任何感兴趣的光谱。或者，设计的源模块能够以高达 100 kfps 的速度以前所未有的 1.1 轴向分辨率实现扫频源 FFOCT
                    <jats:斜体>μm</jats:斜体>
                    。
                  </贾茨：p>

data.title: Assessing liquid light guides in diffuse correlation spectroscopy systems
data.author: Yuanzhe Zhang, Mingliang Pan, Chenxu Li, Ziao Jiao, Yuanyuan Hua, Ahmet T. Erdogan, Robert K. Henderson, David Day-Uei Li
data.summary: <jats:p>Diffuse correlation spectroscopy (DCS) is a widely used noninvasive optical technique for measuring tissue blood flow. Accurate blood flow estimation with DCS requires a high signal-to-noise ratio (SNR), but achieving high SNR is often limited by safety constraints on the optical irradiance (maximum permissible exposure) that can be delivered to tissue. To overcome this limitation, we investigated the possibility of replacing the conventional multi-mode fiber (MMF) with a liquid light guide (LLG) for illumination. The LLG provides a more uniform illumination profile and higher photon throughput to the tissue under the same irradiance limit, resulting in a significantly increased detected photon count rate and enhanced SNR. In experiments under identical power-density conditions, the LLG-based system achieved approximately a three-fold increase in SNR compared to the traditional MMF configuration. This improvement arises from the uniform beam profile and efficient light delivery of the LLG, which permits safe use of higher total power. These results indicate that LLG illumination effectively enhances DCS sensitivity without exceeding safety limits, potentially enabling more sensitive and accurate blood flow monitoring in biomedical applications.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 评估漫反射相关光谱系统中的液体光导
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>漫相关光谱 (DCS) 是一种广泛使用的用于测量组织血流的无创光学技术。使用 DCS 进行准确的血流估计需要高信噪比 (SNR)，但实现高 SNR 通常受到可传递到组织的光学辐照度（最大允许曝光）的安全限制的限制。为了克服这一限制，我们研究了用液体光导 (LLG) 代替传统多模光纤 (MMF) 进行照明的可能性。 LLG 在相同的辐照度限制下为组织提供更均匀的照明轮廓和更高的光子吞吐量，从而显着提高检测到的光子计数率并增强信噪比。在相同功率密度条件下的实验中，与传统 MMF 配置相比，基于 LLG 的系统的 SNR 提高了大约三倍。这种改进源于 LLG 的均匀光束轮廓和高效光传输，从而允许安全使用更高的总功率。这些结果表明，LLG 照明有效增强了 DCS 的灵敏度，且不超过安全限度，有可能在生物医学应用中实现更灵敏、更准确的血流监测。</jats:p>

data.title: Brain-SAM: a general automatic SAM-based segmentation model for brain science images
data.author: Shilong Zhang, Peicong Gong, Hong Zhang, Jieyu Li, Shukang Bi, Anan Li, Qingming Luo, Zhao Feng, Chi Xiao
data.summary: <jats:p>Segmentation and analysis of microscopic optical images is a fundamental task in the field of biomedicine. However, efficiently, accurately, and robustly segmenting regions of interest in these images presents a significant challenge. The segment anything model (SAM) has demonstrated remarkable generalization capabilities in natural image segmentation tasks, revealing its potential for segmenting microscopic optical images. In this study, we propose Brain-SAM, a general automatic segmentation model based on SAM for the automatic segmentation of microscopic optical images. Specifically, we introduce an automatic prompt encoder to enable high-throughput automated segmentation of these images. Additionally, we propose a segmentation optimizer to further enhance the model’s segmentation performance. Testing on eight benchmark datasets, representing common scenarios in microscopic optical image segmentation, shows that Brain-SAM outperforms specialized segmentation models in the vast majority of segmentation tasks. Notably, on the Brain, Tek and Lectin3d datasets, Brain-SAM achieved IoU scores of 98.07%, 93.13% and 88.49% respectively, along with Dice scores of 99.03%, 96.44% and 93.89%. Moreover, we provide a series of rich, publicly available brain science image datasets created using fluorescence microscopic optical tomography (fMOST) technology.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: Brain-SAM：一种基于 SAM 的脑科学图像通用自动分割模型
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>显微光学图像的分割和分析是生物医学领域的一项基本任务。然而，高效、准确且稳健地分割这些图像中的感兴趣区域提出了重大挑战。分段任何模型（SAM）在自然图像分割任务中表现出了卓越的泛化能力，揭示了其分割显微光学图像的潜力。在本研究中，我们提出了 Brain-SAM，这是一种基于 SAM 的通用自动分割模型，用于显微光学图像的自动分割。具体来说，我们引入了自动提示编码器来实现这些图像的高吞吐量自动分割。此外，我们提出了一个分割优化器来进一步增强模型的分割性能。对代表微观光学图像分割中常见场景的八个基准数据集进行的测试表明，Brain-SAM 在绝大多数分割任务中都优于专门的分割模型。值得注意的是，在 Brain、Tek 和 Lectin3d 数据集上，Brain-SAM 的 IoU 分数分别为 98.07%、93.13% 和 88.49%，Dice 分数分别为 99.03%、96.44% 和 93.89%。此外，我们还提供了一系列使用荧光显微光学断层扫描（fMOST）技术创建的丰富的、公开的脑科学图像数据集。</jats:p>

data.title: Circumferential multi-contrast mapping of the aqueous outflow pathway in human eyes facilitated by circular-scan optical coherence tomography angiography
data.author: Zhaoyu Gong, Yaping Shi, Matthew D. Holliman, Jingjiang Xu, Yi Zhang, Ruikang K. Wang
data.summary: <jats:p>The corneoscleral limbus contains essential aqueous channels and veins that form the primary aqueous outflow pathway, making it a critical focus of glaucoma research. Optical coherence tomography (OCT) has emerged as a powerful tool for investigating this pathway, but conventional imaging is typically performed in segments and restricted to a single functional contrast. Such approaches are limited in evaluating the overall condition of the outflow system, which contributes circumferentially asymmetrically to the aqueous outflow and is composed of multiple tissues requiring different OCT functional extensions. To address these limitations, we propose a circumferential, multi-contrast mapping framework for in vivo analysis of limbal vasculature and aqueous outflow structures/functions. The workflow begins with a rapid panoramic OCT angiography scan using a circular-scan anterior segment OCT (CircAS-OCT) system to generate a global limbal reference map. This reference is then used to guide the stitching of sectional scans acquired from high-resolution OCT devices and protocols. In two normal subjects, the method successfully enabled circumferential, multi-contrast mapping of selected outflow-related structures and processes, including depth-resolved limbal vasculature, collector channel orifice positions, trabecular meshwork regions, and trabecular motion strength, with results aligning well with established anatomical knowledge. By combining circumferential coverage and cross-function integration, our approach provides a versatile imaging platform with strong potential for comprehensive assessment of the aqueous outflow pathway, supporting diagnostic and surgical strategies in glaucoma management.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 圆形扫描光学相干断层扫描血管造影促进人眼房水流出路径的圆周多对比映射
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>角巩膜缘包含重要的房水通道和静脉，形成主要的房水流出通道，使其成为青光眼研究的关键焦点。光学相干断层扫描 (OCT) 已成为研究该通路的强大工具，但传统成像通常分段进行，并且仅限于单一功能对比度。这种方法在评估流出系统的整体状况方面受到限制，该系统对房水流出产生圆周不对称的影响，并且由需要不同 OCT 功能扩展的多个组织组成。为了解决这些局限性，我们提出了一种圆周、多对比映射框架，用于角膜缘脉管系统和房水流出结构/功能的体内分析。工作流程首先使用循环扫描眼前节 OCT (CircAS-OCT) 系统进行快速全景 OCT 血管造影扫描，以生成全局角膜缘参考图。然后，该参考用于指导从高分辨率 OCT 设备和协议获取的截面扫描的拼接。在两名正常受试者中，该方法成功地对选定的流出相关结构和过程进行了圆周、多对比映射，包括深度分辨角膜缘脉管系统、收集通道孔位置、小梁网区域和小梁运动强度，结果与既定的解剖学知识很好地吻合。通过结合圆周覆盖和跨功能集成，我们的方法提供了一个多功能成像平台，具有强大的潜力，可以全面评估房水流出路径，支持青光眼治疗中的诊断和手术策略。</jats:p>

data.title: Resolution enhancement in quantitative phase microscopy
data.author: Vicente Micó, Juanjuan Zheng, Javier Garcia, Zeev Zalevsky, Peng Gao
data.summary:
Quantitative phase microscopy (QPM), a technique combining phase imaging and microscopy, enables visualization of the 3D topography in reflective samples, as well as the inner structure or refractive index distribution of transparent and translucent samples. Similar to other imaging modalities, QPM is constrained by the conflict between numerical aperture (NA) and field of view (FOV): an imaging system with a low NA has to be employed to maintain a large FOV. This fact severely limits the resolution in QPM up to 0.82λ/NA, λ being the illumination wavelength. Consequently, finer structures of samples cannot be resolved by using modest NA objectives in QPM. Aimed to that, many approaches, such as oblique illumination, structured illumination, and speckle illumination (just to cite a few), have been proposed to improve the spatial resolution (or the space–bandwidth product) in phase microscopy by restricting other degrees of freedom (mostly time). This paper aims to provide an up-to-date review on the resolution enhancement approaches in QPM, discussing the pros and cons of each technique as well as the confusion on resolution definition claims on QPM and other coherent microscopy methods. Through this survey, we will review the most appealing and useful techniques for superresolution in coherent microscopy, working with and without lenses and with special attention to QPM. Note that, throughout this review, with the term “superresolution” we denote enhancing the resolution to surpass the limit imposed by diffraction and proportional to λ/NA, rather than the physics limit λ/(2n
 med
 ), with n
 med
 being the refractive index value of the immersion medium.
data.title_cn: 定量相显微镜的分辨率增强
data.abstract_cn:
定量相位显微镜 (QPM) 是一种将相位成像和显微镜相结合的技术，可以实现反射样品中 3D 形貌以及透明和半透明样品的内部结构或折射率分布的可视化。与其他成像方式类似，QPM 受到数值孔径 (NA) 和视场 (FOV) 之间冲突的限制：必须采用低 NA 的成像系统来维持大 FOV。这一事实严重限制了 QPM 的分辨率高达 0.82λ/NA，其中 λ 是照明波长。因此，在 QPM 中使用适度的 NA 物镜无法解析更精细的样品结构。为此，人们提出了许多方法，例如倾斜照明、结构照明和散斑照明（仅举几例），通过限制其他自由度（主要是时间）来提高相位显微镜中的空间分辨率（或空间带宽积）。本文旨在对 QPM 中的分辨率增强方法进行最新综述，讨论每种技术的优缺点以及 QPM 和其他相干显微镜方法的分辨率定义声明中的混淆。通过这项调查，我们将回顾相干显微镜中最有吸引力和最有用的超分辨率技术，使用和不使用镜头，并特别关注 QPM。请注意，在本次综述中，“超分辨率”一词表示增强分辨率以超越衍射所施加的限制并与 λ/NA 成正比，而不是物理极限 λ/(2n
 医学
 ), 与 n
 医学
 是浸没介质的折射率值。

data.title: Overcoming the diffraction limit by multi-photon interference: a tutorial
data.author: Joachim Stöhr
data.summary: The nature of light, extending from the optical to the x-ray regime, is reviewed from a diffraction point of view by comparing field-based statistical optics and photon-based quantum optics approaches. The topic is introduced by comparing historical diffraction concepts based on wave interference, Dirac’s notion of photon self-interference, Feynman’s interference of space–time photon probability amplitudes, and Glauber’s formulation of coherence functions based on photon detection. The concepts are elucidated by a review of how the semiclassical combination of the disparate photon and wave concepts have been used to describe light creation, diffraction, and detection. The origin of the fundamental diffraction limit is then discussed in both wave and photon pictures. By use of Feynman’s concept of probability amplitudes associated with independent photons, we show that quantum electrodynamics, the complete theory of light, reduces in lowest order to the conventional wave formalism of diffraction. As an introduction to multi-photon effects, we then review fundamental one- and two-photon experiments and detection schemes, in particular the seminal Hanbury Brown–Twiss experiment. The formal discourse of the paper starts with a treatment of first-order coherence theory. In first order, the statistical optics and quantum optics formulations of coherence are shown to be equivalent. This is elucidated by a discussion of Zernike’s powerful theorem of partial coherence propagation, a cornerstone of statistical optics, followed by its quantum derivation based on the interference of single-photon probability amplitudes. The treatment is then extended to second-order coherence theory, where the equivalence of wave and particle descriptions is shown to break down. This is illustrated by considering two photons whose space–time probability amplitudes are correlated through nonlinear birth processes, resulting in entanglement or cloning. In both cases, the two-photon diffraction patterns are shown to exhibit resolution below the conventional diffraction limit, defined by the one-photon diffraction patterns. The origin of the reduction is shown to arise from the interference of two-photon probability amplitudes. By comparing first- and second-order diffraction, it is shown that the conventional first-order concept of partial coherence with its limits of chaoticity and first-order coherence has the second-order analogue of partial entanglement, with its limits corresponding to two entangled photons (“entangled biphotons”) and two cloned photons (“cloned biphotons”), the latter being second-order coherent. The concept of cloned biphotons is extended to the case of n cloned photons, resulting in a 1/n reduction of the diffraction limit. In the limit of nth-order coherence, all photons within the nth-order collective state are shown to propagate on particle like trajectories, reproducing the 0th-order ray-optics picture. These results are discussed in terms of the linearity of quantum mechanics and Heisenberg’s space–momentum uncertainty principle. A general concept of coherence based on photon density is developed that in first order is equivalent to the conventional wave-based picture.
data.title_cn: 通过多光子干涉克服衍射极限：教程
data.abstract_cn: 通过比较基于场的统计光学和基于光子的量子光学方法，从衍射的角度回顾了从光学延伸到 X 射线范围的光的性质。通过比较基于波干涉的历史衍射概念、狄拉克的光子自干涉概念、费曼的时空光子概率振幅干涉以及格劳伯基于光子探测的相干函数公式来介绍该主题。通过回顾如何使用不同光子和波概念的半经典组合来描述光的产生、衍射和检测来阐明这些概念。 The origin of the fundamental diffraction limit is then discussed in both wave and photon pictures.通过使用费曼与独立光子相关的概率振幅概念，我们证明了量子电动力学（完整的光理论）以最低阶简化为传统的衍射波形式。作为多光子效应的介绍，我们随后回顾了基本的单光子和双光子实验和检测方案，特别是开创性的汉伯里·布朗-特威斯实验。 The formal discourse of the paper starts with a treatment of first-order coherence theory. In first order, the statistical optics and quantum optics formulations of coherence are shown to be equivalent.通过讨论泽尼克强大的部分相干传播定理（统计光学的基石）以及基于单光子概率振幅干涉的量子推导，可以阐明这一点。然后将处理扩展到二阶相干理论，其中波和粒子描述的等价性被证明是不成立的。这是通过考虑两个光子来说明的，这两个光子的时空概率幅度通过非线性诞生过程相关，从而导致纠缠或克隆。在这两种情况下，双光子衍射图样的分辨率都低于由单光子衍射图样定义的传统衍射极限。 The origin of the reduction is shown to arise from the interference of two-photon probability amplitudes.通过一阶和二阶衍射的比较，表明传统的部分相干的一阶概念及其混沌性和一阶相干的极限具有部分纠缠的二阶模拟，其极限对应于两个纠缠光子（“纠缠双光子”）和两个克隆光子（“克隆双光子”），后者是二阶相干的。克隆双光子的概念被扩展到n个克隆光子的情况，导致衍射极限减少1/n。在 n 阶相干性的极限下，n 阶集体态内的所有光子都显示出在类粒子轨迹上传播，再现了 0 阶射线光学图像。这些结果根据量子力学的线性和海森堡的空间动量不确定原理进行了讨论。 A general concept of coherence based on photon density is developed that in first order is equivalent to the conventional wave-based picture.

data.title: Graphene-based materials in the infrared and terahertz detector families: a tutorial
data.author: A. Rogalski
data.summary: The extraordinary electronic and two-dimensional materials make them promising candidates to replace traditional photodetectors in infrared and terahertz spectral ranges. This paper reviews the latest achievements in graphene detectors in competition with traditional commercially dominated ones in different applications. It is shown that the performance of graphene-based infrared and terahertz detectors is lower in comparison with those detectors existing on the global market. The high sensitivity of hybrid photodetectors does not coincide with a fast response time, which limits real detector functions. The most effective single graphene detectors operated at room temperature are terahertz detectors, which utilize plasma rectification phenomena in field effect transistors. The challenges facing the development of focal-plane arrays in the future are also considered. Special attention is directed toward the main trends in the development of arrays in the near future—an increase in the pixel count to above 108 pixels, with pixel size decreasing to about 5 μm for both cooled and uncooled long-wavelength infrared arrays. To date, these questions have not been considered in literature devoted to graphene-based infrared and terahertz detectors.
data.title_cn: 红外和太赫兹探测器系列中的石墨烯材料：教程
data.abstract_cn: 非凡的电子和二维材料使它们成为替代红外和太赫兹光谱范围内传统光电探测器的有希望的候选者。本文回顾了石墨烯探测器在不同应用中与传统商业主导探测器竞争的最新成果。结果表明，与全球市场上现有的探测器相比，基于石墨烯的红外和太赫兹探测器的性能较低。混合光电探测器的高灵敏度与快速响应时间并不相符，这限制了探测器的实际功能。在室温下运行的最有效的单石墨烯探测器是太赫兹探测器，它利用场效应晶体管中的等离子体整流现象。还考虑了未来焦平面阵列发展面临的挑战。特别关注近期阵列发展的主要趋势——冷却和非冷却长波红外阵列的像素数增加到 108 个像素以上，像素尺寸减小到 5 μm 左右。迄今为止，有关基于石墨烯的红外和太赫兹探测器的文献尚未考虑这些问题。

data.title: Electromagnetic metasurfaces: physics and applications
data.author: Shulin Sun, Qiong He, Jiaming Hao, Shiyi Xiao, Lei Zhou
data.summary: Metasurfaces are ultrathin metamaterials consisting of planar electromagnetic (EM) microstructures (e.g., meta-atoms) with pre-determined EM responses arranged in specific sequences. Based on careful structural designs on both meta-atoms and global sequences, one can realize homogenous and inhomogeneous metasurfaces that can possess exceptional capabilities to manipulate EM waves, serving as ideal candidates to realize ultracompact and highly efficient EM devices for next-generation integration-optics applications. In this paper, we present an overview on the development of metasurfaces, including both homogeneous and inhomogeneous ones, focusing particularly on their working principles, the fascinating wave-manipulation effects achieved both statically and dynamically, and the representative applications so far realized. Finally, we also present our own perspectives on possible future directions of this fast-developing research field in the conclusion.
data.title_cn: 电磁超表面：物理与应用
data.abstract_cn: 超表面是超薄超材料，由平面电磁 (EM) 微结构（例如超原子）组成，具有按特定序列排列的预定电磁响应。基于对元原子和全局序列的仔细结构设计，人们可以实现均质和非均质超表面，这些超表面具有操纵电磁波的卓越能力，是实现下一代集成光学应用的超紧凑和高效电磁设备的理想候选者。在本文中，我们概述了超表面的发展，包括均质和非均质表面，特别关注其工作原理、静态和动态实现的令人着迷的波操纵效果以及迄今为止实现的代表性应用。最后，我们还在结论中对这个快速发展的研究领域未来可能的发展方向提出了自己的看法。

data.title: Polarization and hyperspectral imaging matter for newly emerging perspectives in optical image processing: guest editorial
data.author: J. Aval, A. Alfalou, C. Brosseau
data.summary: In this note, we briefly discuss the opportunities to use polarized light and hyperspectral imaging as additional degrees of freedom in optical polarimetric image processing. The additional polarization and spectral information in recognition technologies allow them to identify visually indistinguishable features in a scene within a large region of interest.
data.title_cn: 偏振和高光谱成像对于光学图像处理中新兴的观点很重要：客座社论
data.abstract_cn: 在本文中，我们简要讨论了使用偏振光和高光谱成像作为光学偏振图像处理中附加自由度的机会。识别技术中的附加偏振和光谱信息使他们能够识别大范围感兴趣区域内场景中视觉上无法区分的特征。

data.title: When metasurface meets hologram: principle and advances
data.author: Qiang Jiang, Guofan Jin, Liangcai Cao
data.summary: Holography has numerous applications because of its capability of arbitrary wavefront modulation. Computer-generated holograms (CGHs) take it a big step forward. Conventional holography engineers the wavefront via phase accumulation, suffering from large size, low resolution, and small viewing angle. Metasurfaces, ultrathin two-dimensional metamaterials with subwavelength features, can manipulate the amplitude, phase, and polarization of the light, solving the above issues. In this review, advances of holography, CGH algorithms, and the principles of various metasurfaces are presented. Metasurface holography, realized by encoding the hologram in the metasurface, is investigated. Information multiplexing methods of metasurface holograms, including wavelength-multiplexed, polarization-multiplexed, complex amplitude modulated, nonlinear, and dynamic metasurfaces, are presented. The challenges and outlook of metasurface holograms are discussed.
data.title_cn: 当超表面遇见全息图：原理与进展
data.abstract_cn: 全息术由于其任意波前调制的能力而具有广泛的应用。计算机生成的全息图（CGH）向前迈出了一大步。传统的全息技术通过相位累积来设计波前，但存在尺寸大、分辨率低和视角小的问题。超表面，即具有亚波长特征的超薄二维超材料，可以操纵光的振幅、相位和偏振，解决上述问题。在这篇综述中，介绍了全息术、CGH 算法和各种超表面的原理的进展。研究了通过在超表面中编码全息图来实现的超表面全息术。提出了超表面全息图的信息复用方法，包括波长复用、偏振复用、复调幅、非线性和动态超表面。讨论了超表面全息图的挑战和前景。

data.title: Perspective on light-induced transport of particles: from optical forces to phoretic motion
data.author: Pavel Zemánek, Giorgio Volpe, Alexandr Jonáš, Oto Brzobohatý
data.summary: Propulsive effects of light, which often remain unnoticed in our daily-life experience, manifest themselves on spatial scales ranging from subatomic to astronomical. Light-mediated forces can indeed confine individual atoms, cooling their effective temperature very close to absolute zero, as well as contribute to cosmological phenomena such as the formation of stellar planetary systems. In this review, we focus on the transport processes that light can initiate on small spatial scales. In particular, we discuss in depth various light-induced mechanisms for the controlled transport of microscopic particles; these mechanisms rely on the direct transfer of momentum between the particles and the incident light waves, on the combination of optical forces with external forces of other nature, and on light-triggered phoretic motion. After a concise theoretical overview of the physical origins of optical forces, we describe how these forces can be harnessed to guide particles either in continuous bulk media or in the proximity of a constraining interface under various configurations of the illuminating light beams (radiative, evanescent, or plasmonic fields). Subsequently, we introduce particle transport techniques that complement optical forces with counteracting forces of non-optical nature. We finally discuss particle actuation schemes where light acts as a fine knob to trigger and/or modulate phoretic motion in spatial gradients of non-optical (e.g., electric, chemical, or temperature) fields. We conclude by outlining possible future fundamental and applied directions for research in light-induced particle transport. We believe that this comprehensive review can inspire diverse, interdisciplinary scientific communities to devise novel, unorthodox ways of assembling and manipulating materials with light.
data.title_cn: 光诱导粒子传输的视角：从光力到泳动
data.abstract_cn: 光的推进效应在我们的日常生活中常常被忽视，但它却在从亚原子到天文的空间尺度上表现出来。光介导的力确实可以限制单个原子，将其有效温度冷却到非常接近绝对零，并有助于宇宙学现象，例如恒星行星系统的形成。 In this review, we focus on the transport processes that light can initiate on small spatial scales. In particular, we discuss in depth various light-induced mechanisms for the controlled transport of microscopic particles;这些机制依赖于粒子和入射光波之间动量的直接传递、光学力与其他性质的外力的结合以及光触发的泳动。在对光学力的物理起源进行了简明的理论概述之后，我们描述了如何利用这些力来引导连续体介质中或在照明光束的各种配置（辐射、倏逝或等离子体场）下的约束界面附近的粒子。 Subsequently, we introduce particle transport techniques that complement optical forces with counteracting forces of non-optical nature.最后，我们讨论粒子驱动方案，其中光充当精细旋钮来触发和/或调制非光学（例如电、化学或温度）场的空间梯度中的泳动运动。 We conclude by outlining possible future fundamental and applied directions for research in light-induced particle transport.我们相信，这项全面的综述可以激励多元化、跨学科的科学界设计出新颖的、非正统的方法来用光组装和操纵材料。

data.title: Waves, modes, communications, and optics: a tutorial
data.author: David A. B. Miller
data.summary: Modes generally provide an economical description of waves, reducing complicated wave functions to finite numbers of mode amplitudes, as in propagating fiber modes and ideal laser beams. But finding a corresponding mode description for counting the best orthogonal channels for communicating between surfaces or volumes, or for optimally describing the inputs and outputs of a complicated optical system or wave scatterer, requires a different approach. The singular-value decomposition approach we describe here gives the necessary optimal source and receiver “communication modes” pairs and device or scatterer input and output “mode-converter basis function” pairs. These define the best communication or input/output channels, allowing precise counting and straightforward calculations. Here we introduce all the mathematics and physics of this approach, which works for acoustic, radio-frequency, and optical waves, including full vector electromagnetic behavior, and is valid from nanophotonic scales to large systems. We show several general behaviors of communications modes, including various heuristic results. We also establish a new “M-gauge” for electromagnetism that clarifies the number of vector wave channels and allows a simple and general quantization. This approach also gives a new modal “M-coefficient” version of Einstein’s A&B coefficient argument and revised versions of Kirchhoff’s radiation laws. The article is written in a tutorial style to introduce the approach and its consequences.
data.title_cn: 波、模式、通信和光学：教程
data.abstract_cn: 模式通常提供对波的经济描述，将复杂的波函数简化为有限数量的模式振幅，如传播光纤模式和理想激光束。但是，找到相应的模式描述来计算表面或体积之间通信的最佳正交通道，或者最佳地描述复杂光学系统或波散射体的输入和输出，需要不同的方法。我们在这里描述的奇异值分解方法给出了必要的最佳源和接收器“通信模式”对以及设备或散射体输入和输出“模式转换器基函数”对。这些定义了最佳的通信或输入/输出通道，允许精确计数和简单计算。在这里，我们介绍了这种方法的所有数学和物理知识，该方法适用于声波、射频和光波，包括全矢量电磁行为，并且从纳米光子尺度到大型系统都有效。我们展示了通信模式的几种一般行为，包括各种启发式结果。我们还建立了一种新的电磁学“M-gauge”，它阐明了矢量波通道的数量，并允许简单而通用的量化。这种方法还给出了爱因斯坦 A&B 系数论证的新模态“M 系数”版本以及基尔霍夫辐射定律的修订版本。这篇文章以教程的形式来介绍该方法及其后果。

data.title: Mathematics of vectorial Gaussian beams
data.author: Uri Levy, Yaron Silberberg, Nir Davidson
data.summary: Since the development of laser light sources in the early 1960s, laser beams are everywhere. Laser beams are central in many industrial applications and are essential in ample scientific research fields. Prime scientific examples are optical trapping of ultracold atoms, optical levitation of particles, and laser-based detection of gravitational waves. Mathematically, laser beams are well described by Gaussian beam expressions. Rather well covered in the literature to date are basic expressions for scalar Gaussian beams. In the past, however, higher accuracy mathematics of scalar Gaussian beams and certainly high-accuracy mathematics of vectorial Gaussian beams were far less studied. The objective of the present review then is to summarize and advance the mathematics of vectorial Gaussian beams. When a weakly diverging Gaussian beam, approximated as a linearly polarized two-component plane wave, say (Ex,By), is tightly focused by a high-numerical-aperture lens, the wave is “depolarized.” Namely, the prelens (practically) missing electric field Ey,Ez components suddenly appear. This is similar for the prelens missing Bx,Bz components. In fact, for any divergence angle (θd<1), the ratio of maximum electric field amplitudes of a Gaussian beam Ex:Ez:Ey is roughly 1:θd2:θd4. It follows that if a research case involves a tightly focused laser beam, then the case analysis calls for the mathematics of vectorial Gaussian beams. Gaussian-beam-like distributions of the six electric–magnetic vector field components that nearly exactly satisfy Maxwell’s equations are presented. We show that the near-field distributions with and without evanescent waves are markedly different from each other. The here-presented nearly exact six electric–magnetic Gaussian-beam-like field components are symmetric, meaning that the cross-sectional amplitude distribution of Ex(x,y) at any distance (z) is similar to the By(x,y) distribution, Ey(x,y) is similar to Bx(x,y), and a 90° rotated Ez(x,y) is similar to Bz(x,y). Components’ symmetry was achieved by executing the steps of an outlined symmetrization procedure. Regardless of how tightly a Gaussian beam is focused, its divergence angle is limited. We show that the full-cone angle to full width at half-maximum intensity of the dominant vector field component does not exceed 60°. The highest accuracy field distributions to date of the less familiar higher-order Hermite–Gaussian vector components are also presented. Hermite–Gaussian E-B vectors only approximately satisfy Maxwell’s equations. We have defined a Maxwell’s-residual power measure to quantify the approximation quality of different vector sets, and each set approximately (or exactly) satisfies Maxwell’s equations. Several vectorial “applications,” i.e., research fields that involve vector laser beams, are briefly discussed. The mathematics of vectorial Gaussian beams is particularly applicable to the analysis of the physical systems associated with such applications. Two user-friendly “Mathematica” programs, one for computing six high-accuracy vector components of a Hermite–Gaussian beam, and the other for computing the six practically Maxwell’s-equations-satisfying components of a focused laser beam, supplement this review.
data.title_cn: 矢量高斯光束的数学
data.abstract_cn: 自 20 世纪 60 年代初开发激光光源以来，激光束无处不在。激光束是许多工业应用的核心，也是众多科学研究领域的重要组成部分。主要的科学例子是超冷原子的光学捕获、粒子的光学悬浮以及基于激光的引力波检测。从数学上讲，激光束可以用高斯光束表达式很好地描述。迄今为止，文献中相当详细地介绍了标量高斯光束的基本表达式。然而，在过去，对标量高斯光束的高精度数学以及矢量高斯光束的高精度数学的研究要少得多。本综述的目的是总结和推进矢量高斯光束的数学。当弱发散的高斯光束（近似为线偏振二分量平面波，例如（Ex，By））被高数值孔径透镜紧密聚焦时，该波被“消偏振”。即，预透镜（实际上）缺失的电场 Ey、Ez 分量突然出现。这与缺少 Bx、Bz 组件的预透镜类似。事实上，对于任何发散角（θd<1），高斯光束的最大电场幅度之比 Ex:Ez:Ey 大致为 1:θd2:θd4。由此可见，如果研究案例涉及紧密聚焦的激光束，则案例分析需要矢量高斯光束的数学计算。提出了几乎完全满足麦克斯韦方程组的六个电磁矢量场分量的高斯束状分布。我们表明，有和没有倏逝波的近场分布彼此明显不同。这里提出的几乎精确的六个电磁高斯束场分量是对称的，这意味着任何距离 (z) 处 Ex(x,y) 的横截面幅度分布与 By(x,y) 分布相似，Ey(x,y) 与 Bx(x,y) 相似，旋转 90° 的 Ez(x,y) 与 Bz(x,y) 相似。组件的对称性是通过执行概述的对称化过程的步骤来实现的。无论高斯光束聚焦得多么紧密，它的发散角都是有限的。我们表明，主矢量场分量的半高强度处的全锥角与全宽不超过 60°。还介绍了迄今为止不太熟悉的高阶埃尔米特-高斯矢量分量的最高精度场分布。 Hermite-Gaussian E-B 向量仅近似满足麦克斯韦方程组。我们定义了麦克斯韦剩余功率度量来量化不同向量集的逼近质量，并且每个向量集近似（或精确）满足麦克斯韦方程组。简要讨论了几种矢量“应用”，即涉及矢量激光束的研究领域。矢量高斯光束的数学特别适用于与此类应用相关的物理系统的分析。两个用户友好的“Mathematica”程序，一个用于计算厄米高斯光束的六个高精度矢量分量，另一个用于计算聚焦激光束的六个实际上满足麦克斯韦方程组的分量，补充了这篇评论。

data.title: Anomalies in light scattering
data.author: Alex Krasnok, Denis Baranov, Huanan Li, Mohammad-Ali Miri, Francesco Monticone, Andrea Alú
data.summary: Scattering of electromagnetic waves lies at the heart of most experimental techniques over nearly the entire electromagnetic spectrum, ranging from radio waves to optics and X-rays. Hence, deep insight into the basics of scattering theory and understanding the peculiar features of electromagnetic scattering is necessary for the correct interpretation of experimental data and an understanding of the underlying physics. Recently, a broad spectrum of exceptional scattering phenomena attainable in suitably engineered structures has been predicted and demonstrated. Examples include bound states in the continuum, exceptional points in PT-symmetrical non-Hermitian systems, coherent perfect absorption, virtual perfect absorption, nontrivial lasing, non-radiating sources, and others. In this paper, we establish a unified description of such exotic scattering phenomena and show that the origin of all these effects can be traced back to the properties of poles and zeros of the underlying scattering matrix. We provide insights on how managing these special points in the complex frequency plane provides a powerful approach to tailor unusual scattering regimes.
data.title_cn: 光散射异常
data.abstract_cn: Scattering of electromagnetic waves lies at the heart of most experimental techniques over nearly the entire electromagnetic spectrum, ranging from radio waves to optics and X-rays.因此，深入了解散射理论的基础知识并理解电磁散射的特殊特征对于正确解释实验数据和理解基础物理是必要的。最近，在适当的工程结构中可实现的广泛的异常散射现象已被预测和证明。例子包括连续体中的束缚态、PT对称非厄米系统中的异常点、相干完美吸收、虚拟完美吸收、非平凡激光、非辐射源等。 In this paper, we establish a unified description of such exotic scattering phenomena and show that the origin of all these effects can be traced back to the properties of poles and zeros of the underlying scattering matrix.我们提供了关于如何管理复杂频率平面中的这些特殊点提供了一种强大的方法来定制不寻常的散射机制的见解。

data.title: Parametric upconversion imaging and its applications
data.author: Ajanta Barh, Peter John Rodrigo, Lichun Meng, Christian Pedersen, Peter Tidemand-Lichtenberg
data.summary: This paper provides an extensive survey of nonlinear parametric upconversion infrared (IR) imaging, from its origin to date. Upconversion imaging is a successful innovative technique for IR imaging in terms of sensitivity, speed, and noise performance. In this approach, the IR image is frequency upconverted to form a visible/near-IR image through parametric three-wave mixing followed by detection using a silicon-based detector or camera. In 1968, Midwinter first demonstrated upconversion imaging from short-wave-IR (1.6 μm) to visible (484 nm) wavelength using a bulk lithium niobate crystal. This technique quickly gained interest, and several other groups demonstrated upconversion imaging further into the mid- and far-IR with significantly improved quantum efficiency. Although a few excellent reviews on upconversion imaging were published in the early 1970s, the rapid progress in recent years merits an updated comprehensive review. The topic includes linear imaging, nonlinear optics, and laser science and has shown diverse applications. The scope of this article is to provide in-depth knowledge of upconversion imaging theory. An overview of different phase matching conditions for the parametric process and the sensitivity of the upconversion detection system are discussed. Furthermore, different design considerations and optimization schemes are outlined for application-specific upconversion imaging. The article comprises a historical perspective of the technique, its most recent technological advances, specific outstanding issues, and some cutting-edge applications of upconversion in IR imaging.
data.title_cn: 参数化上转换成像及其应用
data.abstract_cn: 本文对非线性参量上转换红外 (IR) 成像从起源至今进行了广泛的调查。上转换成像在灵敏度、速度和噪声性能方面是一项成功的红外成像创新技术。在这种方法中，红外图像通过参数三波混合进行频率上转换，形成可见光/近红外图像，然后使用硅基探测器或相机进行检测。 1968 年，Midwinter 首次展示了使用块状铌酸锂晶体从短波红外 (1.6 µm) 到可见光 (484 nm) 波长的上转换成像。这项技术很快引起了人们的兴趣，其他几个小组进一步展示了中红外和远红外的上转换成像，并显着提高了量子效率。尽管 20 世纪 70 年代初发表了一些关于上转换成像的优秀评论，但近年来的快速进展值得更新的全面评论。该主题包括线性成像、非线性光学和激光科学，并展示了多种应用。本文的范围是提供上转换成像理论的深入知识。讨论了参数过程的不同相位匹配条件和上转换检测系统的灵敏度的概述。此外，针对特定应用的上转换成像概述了不同的设计考虑因素和优化方案。本文介绍了该技术的历史观点、最新技术进展、具体的突出问题以及上转换在红外成像中的一些前沿应用。

data.title: Emerging material systems for integrated optical Kerr frequency combs
data.author: Andre Kovach, Dongyu Chen, Jinghan He, Hyungwoo Choi, Adil Han Dogan, Mohammadreza Ghasemkhani, Hossein Taheri, Andrea M. Armani
data.summary: <jats:p>The experimental realization of a Kerr frequency comb represented the convergence of research in materials, physics, and engineering. This symbiotic relationship continues to underpin efforts in comb innovation today. While the initial focus developing cavity-based frequency combs relied on existing microresonator architectures and classic optical materials, in recent years, this trend has been disrupted. This paper reviews the latest achievements in frequency comb generation using resonant cavities, placing them within the broader historical context of the field. After presenting well-established material systems and device designs, the emerging materials and device architectures are examined. Specifically, the unconventional material systems as well as atypical device designs that have enabled tailored dispersion profiles and improved comb performance are compared to the current state of art. The remaining challenges and outlook for the field of cavity-based frequency combs are evaluated.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 用于集成光学克尔频率梳的新兴材料系统
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>克尔频率梳的实验实现代表了材料、物理和工程研究的融合。这种共生关系继续支撑着当今梳子创新的努力。虽然开发基于腔的频率梳的最初重点依赖于现有的微谐振器架构和经典光学材料，但近年来，这种趋势已被打破。本文回顾了使用谐振腔产生频率梳的最新成就，并将它们置于该领域更广泛的历史背景中。在提出完善的材料系统和器件设计之后，我们将研究新兴的材料和器件架构。具体来说，将非常规材料系统以及非典型器件设计与当前的技术水平进行了比较，这些设计实现了定制的色散分布和改进的光梳性能。评估了基于腔的频率梳领域的剩余挑战和前景。</jats:p>

data.title: Mathematical foundations of 2-dimensional diffraction: a biquaternionic approach
data.author: Marco Antonio Pérez-de la Rosa, Wanderson Maia Pimenta
data.summary: <jats:p>This paper presents what we believe to be a novel theoretical framework for analyzing two-dimensional (2D) diffraction phenomena using biquaternions. We introduce a rigorous mathematical development of the 2D integral theorem of Helmholtz and Kirchhoff, the 2D biquaternionic Fresnel-Kirchhoff diffraction formula, and the 2D biquaternionic Rayleigh-Sommerfeld diffraction formula. The proposed approach offers several advantages over traditional methods, including a more concise and elegant representation of the diffraction process.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 二维衍射的数学基础：一种双元数方法
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>本文提出了我们认为使用双四元数分析二维 (2D) 衍射现象的新颖理论框架。我们介绍了亥姆霍兹和基尔霍夫二维积分定理、二维双四元数菲涅耳-基尔霍夫衍射公式和二维双四元数瑞利-索末菲衍射公式的严格数学发展。与传统方法相比，所提出的方法具有多种优势，包括更简洁、更优雅地表示衍射过程。</jats:p>

data.title: Dynamic tuning of soliton microcomb repetition rate without direct cavity actuation
data.author: Usman A. Javid, Michal Chojnacky, David A. Long, Kartik Srinivasan, Grégory Moille
data.summary: <jats:p>Optical frequency combs (OFCs) bridge the optical and microwave domains through their repetition rate. While stable repetition rates serve metrology, many applications require dynamic tuning. OFCs are typically not directly actuated but instead controlled indirectly through modifications of the cavity properties housing the OFC. On-chip physical resonator actuation, however, requires complex heterogeneous integration of piezoelectric, electro-optic, or thermal components, which can be challenging for foundry-based mass-fabrication. Here, we present an all-optical alternative to directly modulate an integrated microcomb’s repetition rate using Kerr-induced synchronization (KIS) with a modulated reference laser capturing one comb tooth, without actuating or perturbing the microring resonator. The repetition rate, determined by the main and reference pump frequencies, responds linearly to the reference frequency modulation according to optical frequency division. This enables arbitrary waveform coherent transfer to the OFC repetition rate using only a foundry-fabricated, passive silicon nitride microring resonator. This simplified approach will facilitate tunable microwave synthesis, spectroscopy, and ranging applications.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 无需直接腔驱动即可动态调谐孤子微梳重复率
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>光学频率梳 (OFC) 通过其重复率桥接光学和微波域。虽然稳定的重复率有助于计量，但许多应用需要动态调整。 OFC 通常不会被直接驱动，而是通过修改容纳 OFC 的腔体特性来间接控制。然而，片上物理谐振器驱动需要压电、电光或热元件的复杂异构集成，这对于基于铸造的大规模制造来说可能具有挑战性。在这里，我们提出了一种全光学替代方案，使用克尔诱导同步（KIS）和捕获一个梳齿的调制参考激光来直接调制集成微梳的重复率，而无需驱动或扰动微环谐振器。由主泵浦频率和参考泵浦频率决定的重复率根据光频分线性响应于参考频率调制。这使得仅使用铸造厂制造的无源氮化硅微环谐振器就可以将任意波形相干传输到 OFC 重复率。这种简化的方法将促进可调谐微波合成、光谱学和测距应用。</jats:p>

data.title: Reconfigurable silicon photonic filter stage for signal processing and monitoring
data.author: Matan Slook, Saawan Kumar Bag, Leroy Dokhanian, Shai Ben-Ami, Inbar Shafir, Maayan Holsblat, Abhinand Venugopalan, Janosch Meier, Khaleda Mallick, Thomas Schneider, Avi Zadok
data.summary: <jats:p>A reconfigurable silicon-photonic filter stage for the processing and monitoring of input signals is demonstrated and employed. The device consists of a balanced Mach-Zehnder interferometer with two ring resonators nested in each arm and built-in germanium photodetectors at its output ports. The transfer function of the device is adjustable through thermo-optic tuning of optical phase delays within each of the four resonators and between the two interferometer arms. Response examples include bandpass filters of variable bandwidth, as well as narrow bandpass and narrow band-stop shapes. The device is used in the wavelength division demultiplexing of a 16 Gbit/s on-off-keying data channel, with spacing of only 26 GHz between adjacent channels. A basic optical spectrum analyzer is realized by scanning the transmission wavelength of a narrowband filter response and reading the output from the on-chip detector. The device supports agile processing and monitoring input signals.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 用于信号处理和监测的可重构硅光子滤波器级
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>演示并采用了用于处理和监控输入信号的可重构硅光子滤波器级。该设备由一个平衡的马赫-曾德尔干涉仪组成，每个臂中嵌套有两个环形谐振器，并在其输出端口内置锗光电探测器。该器件的传递函数可通过四个谐振器中的每个谐振器内以及两个干涉仪臂之间的光学相位延迟的热光调谐来调节。响应示例包括可变带宽的带通滤波器以及窄带通和窄带阻形状。该器件用于 16 Gbit/s 开关键控数据通道的波分解复用，相邻通道之间的间隔仅为 26 GHz。基本的光谱分析仪是通过扫描窄带滤波器响应的传输波长并读取片上检测器的输出来实现的。该设备支持敏捷处理和监控输入信号。</jats:p>

data.title: Polarization and wavelength-independent coupling structure with an angled cut fiber and an island-shaped silicon spot size converter
data.author: Hayato Sasazawa, Daisuke Nakagawa, Hiroyuki Tsuda
data.summary: <jats:p>We propose and demonstrate an optical coupling structure using an angled cut fiber and an island-shaped silicon spot size converter that has low coupling loss, weak wavelength and polarization dependence, and is suitable for high port count surface mount applications. The coupling structure was designed and optimized via simulation using the 3D-finite domain time domain (FDTD) method. The angled cut fiber and the test silicon chip were fabricated, and the coupling structure was set up. The simulation results showed that the lowest loss was 0.98 dB for a TE wave and 1.09 dB for a TM wave, and the measurement results showed the lowest loss was 5.68 dB for a TE wave and 5.95 dB for a TM wave. The discrepancy between the simulation and experimental losses may be due to the thicker matching liquid layer between the angled-cut fiber facet and silicon waveguide, which differs from the simulation assumption. The remaining difference may be the result of an unparalleled alignment of the facet and the waveguide substrate. The wavelength dependence of the coupling loss, including polarization difference in the wavelength range from 1500 to 1600 nm, was 0.78 dB for the simulation and 1.08 dB for the experiment.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 具有成角度切割光纤和岛状硅光斑尺寸转换器的偏振和波长独立耦合结构
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>我们提出并演示了一种使用成角度切割光纤和岛状硅光斑尺寸转换器的光学耦合结构，该结构具有低耦合损耗、弱波长和偏振依赖性，并且适用于高端口数表面安装应用。使用3D有限域时域（FDTD）方法通过仿真设计和优化耦合结构。制作了斜切光纤和测试硅片，并搭建了耦合结构。仿真结果显示，TE波损耗最低为0.98 dB，TM波损耗最低为1.09 dB；测量结果显示，TE波损耗最低为5.68 dB，TM波损耗最低为5.95 dB。仿真和实验损耗之间的差异可能是由于成角度切割的光纤端面和硅波导之间的匹配液体层较厚，这与仿真假设不同。剩余的差异可能是小面和波导基底的无与伦比的对准的结果。耦合损耗（包括 1500 至 1600 nm 波长范围内的偏振差）的波长依赖性，仿真为 0.78 dB，实验为 1.08 dB。</jats:p>

data.title: Design of an efficient Hα filter using principles of multiple-beam interference
data.author: Kosar Negarestani, Hamidreza Fallah, Morteza Hajimahmoodzadeh
data.summary: <jats:p>The Hα emission line at 656.3 nm is a crucial spectral wavelength for studying astrophysical and solar phenomena, such as ionized hydrogen regions and chromospheres’ activity. To facilitate precise and detailed observations at this wavelength, we designed four high-performance Hα filters. These filters exhibit a full width at half maximum of approximately 1 nm or less and achieve peak transmittance exceeding 95%. Utilizing multiple beam interference based on the Fabry-Perot principle, with niobium pentoxide (Nb<jats:sub>2</jats:sub>O<jats:sub>5</jats:sub>) and magnesium fluoride (MgF<jats:sub>2</jats:sub>) layers, the design ensures exceptional spectral isolation within the 625–740 nm range. This outstanding performance makes the filters highly suitable for advanced astrophysical research and solar imaging.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 利用多光束干涉原理设计高效 Hα 滤波器
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>656.3 nm 处的 Hα 发射线是研究天体物理和太阳现象（例如电离氢区域和色球层活动）的关键光谱波长。为了便于在此波长下进行精确和详细的观察，我们设计了四个高性能 Hα 滤光片。这些滤光片的半峰全宽约为 1 nm 或更小，峰值透射率超过 95%。该设计利用基于法布里-珀罗原理的多光束干涉以及五氧化二铌 (Nb<jats:sub>2</jats:sub>O<jats:sub>5</jats:sub>) 和氟化镁 (MgF<jats:sub>2</jats:sub>) 层，确保在 625–740 nm 范围内实现出色的光谱隔离。这种出色的性能使滤光片非常适合先进的天体物理研究和太阳成像。</jats:p>

data.title: Interaction of optical fields in a resonator-interferometric fibre-optic gyroscope with a broadband light source
data.author: K. A. Ovchinnikov, D. G. Gilev, V. V. Krishtop
data.summary: <jats:p>Fibre-optic resonators enable the miniaturization of fibre-optic gyroscopes (FOGs) by reducing the dimensions of sensing elements. This is achieved by repeatedly passing light through the optical path within the resonator. This paper presents a mathematical model of the optical field interactions in a resonator-interferometric FOG with a broadband light source, which analyzes the effect of insertion loss and the amplitude-frequency response of a sensing element on the formation of the gyroscope output signal. For the first time, we derive an analytical formula for the optical scheme of a gyroscope, which links the output radiation to the Sagnac effect and the modulation signal. A mathematical model is then developed to demonstrate the formation of the output signal based on the optical and mechanical parameters of the scheme and to predict the performance of the gyroscope. The experimental validation involved an RFOG with a resonator diameter of 40 mm and an optical fibre length of 50 m, tested under varying angular velocities and normal environmental conditions. The results show a scale factor deviation of less than 1% in the range of ±200°/s, confirming the accuracy of the model. The bias instability (BI) was 10°/h, while the angle random walk (ARW) was 1.6°/√h. The presented analysis and model facilitate the precise optimisation of resonator-based FOGs.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 谐振器干涉光纤陀螺仪中光场与宽带光源的相互作用
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>光纤谐振器通过减小传感元件的尺寸来实现光纤陀螺仪 (FOG) 的小型化。这是通过使光重复地穿过谐振器内的光路来实现的。本文提出了宽带光源谐振器干涉光纤陀螺中光场相互作用的数学模型，分析了插入损耗和传感元件的幅频响应对陀螺仪输出信号形成的影响。我们首次推导出陀螺仪光学方案的解析公式，该公式将输出辐射与萨尼亚克效应和调制信号联系起来。然后开发一个数学模型来演示基于该方案的光学和机械参数的输出信号的形成，并预测陀螺仪的性能。实验验证涉及谐振器直径为 40 mm、光纤长度为 50 m 的 RFOG，在不同角速度和正常环境条件下进行测试。结果显示，在±200°/s范围内，比例因子偏差小于1%，证实了模型的准确性。偏差不稳定性（BI）为10°/h，角度随机游走（ARW）为1.6°/√h。所提出的分析和模型有助于基于谐振器的光纤陀螺仪的精确优化。</jats:p>

data.title: Third-order aberrations and design method of anamorphic optical systems using the biconic surface
data.author: Qing Wu, GuangWei Shi, Hongbo Wu, Xin Zhang
data.summary: <jats:p>This paper derives the third-order aberration theory for the biconic surface, presents analytical expressions for the third-order aberration coefficients of anamorphic optical systems based on the biconic surface, and proposes qhat we believe to be a new design method for anamorphic optical systems. This method provides an effective approach for the design of compact systems.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 双锥面变形光学系统的三阶像差及设计方法
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>本文推导了双锥面的三阶像差理论，给出了基于双锥面的变形光学系统三阶像差系数的解析表达式，并提出了一种新的变形光学系统设计方法qhat。该方法为紧凑系统的设计提供了一种有效的方法。</jats:p>

data.title: Advancing optical neural networks: photonic crystal perceptrons for ultra-fast AI computing
data.author: Pouya Karami, Salah I. Yahya, Muhammad Akmal Chaudhary, Maher Assaad, Fariborz Parandin, Saeed Roshani, Fawwaz Hazzazi, Fawnizu Azmadi Hussin, Sobhan Roshani
data.summary: <jats:p>This paper presents what we believe to be a novel approach to designing an artificial neuron, specifically a basic perceptron, using two-dimensional photonic crystals for the first time. By utilizing a square lattice of silicon rods in an air background, the proposed structure demonstrates potential for enhanced processing speed, reduced energy consumption, and scalability for more complex AI applications. Various design examples, including threshold detection, linear classification, logical AND gates, and Iris flower classification, are presented to validate the effectiveness of the proposed photonic crystal neuron. The results show that the proposed structure can efficiently solve several computational problems, paving the way for the development of next-generation optical processors for AI applications.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 推进光学神经网络：用于超快速人工智能计算的光子晶体感知器
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>本文提出了一种我们认为是首次使用二维光子晶体设计人工神经元（特别是基本感知器）的新颖方法。通过在空气背景中利用硅棒的方形晶格，所提出的结构展示了提高处理速度、降低能耗以及更复杂的人工智能应用的可扩展性的潜力。提出了各种设计示例，包括阈值检测、线性分类、逻辑与门和鸢尾花分类，以验证所提出的光子晶体神经元的有效性。结果表明，所提出的结构可以有效解决多个计算问题，为开发用于人工智能应用的下一代光学处理器铺平了道路。</jats:p>

data.title: Experimental analysis of temperature response in a Sagnac interferometer using double-sense twisted low-birefringence standard fiber
data.author: A. Santiago-Hernández, Oscar E. Castillo, H. Santiago-Hernández, B. Bravo-Medina, A. B. Beltrán-González, A. Mora-Nuñez, J. A. Jiménez-Morán, D. Virgen-Ramos, A. W. Coronel-Arredondo, J. D. Alcalá-Cortés, O. Pottiez
data.summary: <jats:p>In this work, we present an experimental investigation of the temperature-dependent transmission characteristics of a low-birefringence Sagnac interferometer incorporating a double-sense twisted fiber loop. The study focuses on the influence of wave retarder adjustments within the loop on the interferometric response over a temperature range of 25°C to 50°C. A 10-meter fiber loop, optimized for maximum transmission, exhibited an approximately linear transmission profile, achieving a sensitivity of 10.62µW/°C within the 35–50°C interval. In contrast, the 300-meter loop demonstrated a sinusoidal transmission behavior, with a sensitivity of approximately 140.03µW/°C observed between 30°C and 35°C. The comparative analysis reveals that the short-loop configuration offers stable and predictable linear response characteristics. In contrast, the higher sensitivity of the longer loop restricts its utility to narrower temperature windows. Hysteresis effects were consistently recorded in both configurations, suggesting dynamic thermal responses attributable to coil-induced birefringence. These results underscore the significant influence of temperature on the performance of Sagnac interferometers across a variety of industrial and scientific scenarios.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 双感扭曲低双折射标准光纤萨格纳克干涉仪温度响应实验分析
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>在这项工作中，我们对采用双感扭曲光纤环的低双折射萨格纳克干涉仪的温度相关传输特性进行了实验研究。该研究重点关注环路内波延迟器调整对 25°C 至 50°C 温度范围内干涉响应的影响。针对最大传输进行优化的 10 米光纤环路表现出近似线性的传输曲线，在 35–50°C 区间内实现了 10.62μW/°C 的灵敏度。相比之下，300 米环路表现出正弦传输行为，在 30°C 至 35°C 之间观察到的灵敏度约为 140.03μW/°C。比较分析表明，短环配置提供了稳定且可预测的线性响应特性。相反，较长环路的较高灵敏度限制了其在较窄温度窗口的使用。两种配置均一致地记录了滞后效应，表明动态热响应可归因于线圈引起的双折射。这些结果强调了温度对萨格纳克干涉仪在各种工业和科学场景中的性能的显着影响。</jats:p>

data.title: Study of electromagnetic wave transmission due to temporal modulation of permittivity in a spatially confined region of a medium
data.author: Sarvesh Kumar, V. Subramanian
data.summary: <jats:p>The paper investigates the scattering caused by a temporally modulated permittivity in a spatially confined region of a medium due to an external source. A realistic model of temporal variation of electrical permittivity in an arbitrarily bounded over space, causal medium—compliant with the Kramer-Kronig relation—has been adopted to study the transmission across such a perturbed region. The transmission through the modulated region is compared with the corresponding results obtained from an equivalent Fabry-Pérot etalon to gauge the difference between the resulting structural and temporal scattering. The temporal modulation was found to induce dispersive behavior in a non-dispersive medium. Additionally, it is observed that an incident Gaussian pulse on the modulated region causes the medium to transmit pulses for a longer duration than an equivalent non-dispersive slab.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 研究介质空间受限区域中介电常数时间调制引起的电磁波传输
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>本文研究了由于外部源而在介质的空间受限区域中由时间调制介电常数引起的散射。在任意边界的空间因果介质中，介电常数随时间变化的现实模型（符合 Kramer-Kronig 关系）已被用来研究跨这种扰动区域的传输。将通过调制区域的传输与从等效法布里-珀罗标准具获得的相应结果进行比较，以测量所产生的结构散射和时间散射之间的差异。人们发现时间调制会在非色散介质中引起色散行为。此外，据观察，调制区域上的入射高斯脉冲会导致介质传输脉冲的持续时间比等效的非色散平板更长。</jats:p>

data.title: Optical measurement of refractive index gradients with position-sensitive detectors
data.author: Baoqi Wei, Jianyong Zhang, Qi Wang, Yan Zhou, Liyan Li, Yongjie Wang
data.summary: <jats:p>This study proposes a PSD-based method for refractive index gradient measurement with advantages of miniaturization and real-time capability. By integrating laser beam deflection principles with PSD detection, we establish a theoretical model correlating spot displacement with refractive index gradients and construct a measurement system achieving 2.22 × 10<jats:sup>−5</jats:sup> refractive index unit (RIU)/m resolution. Theoretical analysis addresses beam deviation caused by collimation misalignment (θ<jats:sub>0</jats:sub>), proposing an improved method. Ray-tracing simulations demonstrate significantly relaxed collimation requirements: displacement resolution reaches 1μm when |θ<jats:sub>0</jats:sub>|<1.3°. Validation using stratified saline solutions shows integrated PSD gradient measurements agree with refractometer (PRM-2000α) data within <1 × 10<jats:sup>−5</jats:sup> RIU error.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 使用位置敏感探测器对折射率梯度进行光学测量
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>本研究提出了一种基于PSD的折射率梯度测量方法，具有小型化和实时性的优点。通过将激光束偏转原理与PSD检测相结合，我们建立了光斑位移与折射率梯度相关的理论模型，并构建了实现2.22 × 10<jats:sup>-5</jat:sup>折射率单位(RIU)/m分辨率的测量系统。理论分析针对准直失准（θ<jats:sub>0</jats:sub>）引起的光束偏差问题，提出了一种改进方法。光线追踪模拟表明准直要求显着放宽：当 |θ<jats:sub>0</jats:sub>|<1.3° 时，位移分辨率达到 1μm。使用分层盐溶液进行的验证表明，集成 PSD 梯度测量结果与折光仪 (PRM-2000α) 数据一致，误差范围为 <1 × 10<jats:sup>−5</jats:sup> RIU 误差。</jats:p>

data.title: Predicting laser-induced surface modifications on metals in laser surface processing using a hybrid deep learning approach
data.author: K. Rani, N. Ozaki, K. Hashimoto, R. Kodama, Y. Miyake, H. Nakamura, H. Nagatomo
data.summary: <jats:p>Laser-induced surface modification (LISM) is essential for precise surface functionalization in laser surface processing (LSP). This study examines the performance of a hybrid deep learning model, which combines a convolutional neural network (CNN) with a multi-layer perceptron (MLP), to enhance the accuracy of predicting laser-induced surface modification (LISM) on various metals. The CNN is designed to extract the intricate features from laser-irradiated surface images (LISI) of metals, while the MLP processes numerical and categorical values of laser intensity to learn the complex relationships. The proposed CNN-MLP model was trained and validated on a diverse dataset generated by nanosecond Nd: YAG pulsed laser irradiation at varying energy levels. The model demonstrated superior performance, achieving an accuracy of over 99% in predicting LISM on metals, whether modified or unmodified, and outperforming standalone deep learning models in terms of generalization and predictive reliability. This research presents an effective pathway toward intelligent LSP systems, supporting process automation, enhanced quality assurance, and significantly less reliance on trial-and-error experimentation.</jats:p>
data.title_cn: 使用混合深度学习方法预测激光表面加工中激光诱导的金属表面改性
data.abstract_cn: <jats:p>激光诱导表面改性 (LISM) 对于激光表面加工 (LSP) 中的精确表面功能化至关重要。本研究检验了混合深度学习模型的性能，该模型将卷积神经网络 (CNN) 与多层感知器 (MLP) 相结合，以提高预测各种金属激光诱导表面改性 (LISM) 的准确性。 CNN 旨在从金属的激光照射表面图像 (LISI) 中提取复杂的特征，而 MLP 处理激光强度的数值和分类值以了解复杂的关系。所提出的 CNN-MLP 模型在不同能量水平的纳秒 Nd: YAG 脉冲激光照射生成的多样化数据集上进行了训练和验证。该模型表现出卓越的性能，无论经过修改还是未经修改，在预测金属 LISM 时的准确率都超过 99%，并且在泛化和预测可靠性方面优于独立的深度学习模型。这项研究为智能 LSP 系统提供了一条有效途径，支持流程自动化、增强质量保证，并显着减少对试错实验的依赖。</jats:p>

data.title: Analysis of practical phase sensing with quantum interferometers
data.author: Fahad S. Alghannam
data.summary:
<jats:p>
                    In phase sensing with quantum interferometers, likelihood estimation is used to obtain the estimated value of the measured phase. Moreover, the precision for such sensors depends on the total phase difference between the two paths of the interferometer. To determine the optimal operation parameters of the interferometer, Fisher information analysis is required. Both objectives, i.e., likelihood estimation and performance optimization, require knowledge of the probabilities for different events as a function of the phase difference
                    <jats:bold>
                      <jats:italic toggle="yes">τ</jats:italic>
                    </jats:bold>
                    . In this article, we derive expressions for these probabilities considering the effects of practical parameters such as the interferometer’s visibility, the optical pulse width, and the effect of imperfect detectors. Furthermore, we depict Fisher information curves for some chosen input states showing the effects of reduced visibility and short pulse widths.
                  </jats:p>
